column2: To prevent monsters from emerging, let's block the door leading to the main entrance. There should be a lever nearby for opening and closing it.

column1:
家族も故郷も失い、救いを求めて心臓を捧げ
得たものがこんな傀儡だったとは――
工作や戦いの腕が優れているとはいえ
当時は愕然としたものだ
column2:
To lose my family and hometown, seeking salvation and dedicating my heart,
only to receive a puppet such as this...
Although their inherent skill in crafting and combat are outstanding, at the time,
I was appalled.

column1:
最奥、《聖滝の間》に入るには
《水流制御室》で滝を止める必要がある――
column2: To enter the innermost area, "Chamber of the Holy Waterfall," you need to stop the waterfall in the "Water Flow Control Room".

column1:
盾を素早く構え敵の攻撃をはじき返す
空中でも発動可能
column2:
Timing your block just as the enemy attacks you,
will deflect their attack.
Can also be activated while in the air.

column1:
敵に密着し、複数の矢を番えて渾身の力で放つ
しがみつき状態からでも可能
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で溜め段階上昇（２→３）
ボタン入力回数減少</COL>
column2:
Tightly bind together all the arrows in the quiver, and
unleash them with your entire body's might.
Can be activated while climbing an enemy.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of the skill.
LV.6: Increases maximum charge (2→3) and reduces number of
button presses needed to advance to the next level of charge.</COL>

column1: タイトチンクエディア
タイトチンクエディア
タイトチンクエディア
タイトチンクエディア
タイトチンクエディア

闇属性の魔力を付与した剣で
逆手に敵を突き、直後に引き抜く
魔印が最大に成長している時、性能上昇
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.6でしがみつき中でも発動可能</COL>
column2:
Thrusts the blade imbued with dark magick into
the target's body before pulling it out.
Damage is increased when the Magick Glyph grows.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Increases damage of skill.
LV.6 Can be used when climbing.</COL>

column1:
上空に対して鋭い突きを繰り出す
空中の敵などに有効
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃範囲拡大／攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
Thrust your blade with great force into the air.
Especially effective against aerial enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.
Increases number of hits.</COL>

column1:
投げつけた対象にダメージと
状態異常【油濡れ】を与える
column2:
Throw this to cause damage on impact.
Causes the "Tarred" debilitation.

column1:
投げつけた対象にダメージと
状態異常【毒】を与える
column2:
Throw this to cause damage on impact.
Causes the "Poison" debilitation.

column1:
投げつけた対象にダメージと
状態異常【水濡れ】を与える
column2:
Throw this to cause damage on impact.
Causes the "Drenched" debilitation.

column1:
投げつけた対象にダメージと
状態異常【延焼】を与える
column2:
Throw this to cause damage on impact.
Causes the "Caught Fire" debilitation.

column1:
投げつけた対象にダメージと
状態異常【延焼】を与える
column2:
Throw this to cause damage on impact.
Causes the "Caught Fire" debilitation.

column1:
投げつけた対象にダメージと
状態異常【延焼】を与える
column2:
Throw this to cause damage on impact.
Causes the "Caught Fire" debilitation.

column1:
構えたシーカーロープを狙った対象に放つ
空中でも発動可能
column2:
Throw the seeker rope towards the target aimed at.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column1:
シーカーロープを放って敵を捕らえ、反動を利用して
激しく斬りこみながら距離を詰める
ボタン追加入力で追撃を繰り出す。空中でも発動可能
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
Throw the Seeker Rope to snag an enemy, using
the recoil to propel yourself towards them, and deliver deadly
slashes all along the way.
Additional button presses will chain the chase.
Can be activated even while in the air.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of the skill.
LV.6: Increases the number of hits.</COL>

column1:
レスタニアの職人の協力によって
作成できるようになった特殊なパペット
チェストの上に置ける大きめサイズ
column2:
Through the cooperation of Lestanian artisans.
A special puppet can now be created.
Large size to be put on a chest.

column1:
レスタニアの職人の協力によって
作成できるようになった特殊なパペット
ベッドに置くのにちょうど良いサイズ
column2:
Through the cooperation of Lestanian artisans.
A special puppet can now be created.
Just the right size to be put on the bed.

column1: スローンズジャケット
スローンズジャケット
スローンズジャケット
スローンズジャケット
スローンズジャケット
トゥレイスリピーデス
トゥレイスリピーデス
トゥレイスリピーデス
トゥレイスリピーデス
トゥレイスリピーデス
リンロッドスクリュウ
リンロッドスクリュウ
リンロッドスクリュウ
リンロッドスクリュウ
リンロッドスクリュウ
サウザントトゥループス
サウザントトゥループス
サウザントトゥループス
サウザントトゥループス
サウザントトゥループス
サウザントスティング
サウザントスティング
サウザントスティング
サウザントスティング
サウザントスティング

ボルド大坑道と同時期に開発された坑道
ここも以前は鉱員の出入りが多かったが
人喰い鬼が出現するようになり寂れてしまった
たびたび騎士団が派遣されているが
いまだ退治完了の報告はない
column2:
This tunnel was developed around the same time as the Volden Large Tunnels. 
In the past, there used to be many miners coming and going, but it has become desolate since man-eating demons started appearing. 
The knight order has been frequently dispatched, but there is still no report of completion of their task.

column1: ここは創造の刺激に満ちていますね
column2: This place is full of inspiration, isn't it?

column1:
この素材に、どれだけの
人間の怨念が込められているか
いや――今まで集めてきた全てが
同じ宿因にあるのだろう
column2:
This material...
Are there remnants of human grudges is trapped within?
It's unpleasant...but it seems to be used for the same purpose as
everything else we've collected up until now in the inn.

column1:
展望城の目前に広がる湿地帯全域を監視
している魔軍拠点。監視対象としている範囲が
広いため、魔軍に使役されるナイトメアが空からも
目を光らせる。要衝である展望城に近いせいか
数多くの兵器が配備されていることがわかっている
column2:
This is a base for the Demon Army that monitors the entire marshy area that stretches in front of the observatory castle. Because the area being monitored is wide, nightmares are used by the Demon Army keep an eye on it from the sky. It is known that a large number of weapons are deployed in the area due to its proximity to the Lookout Castle, which is a key
point.

column1:
この出会い――！
私と覚者様との絆を感じます
column2:
This encounter--!
I feel a bond between me and the Arisen.

column1: “塔”とは一体、どこにあるのだろう？
column2: This "Tower" of his, where the heck is it?
Third Evil Dragon Army Main Unit
Third Evil Dragon Army Main Unit

column1:
彼らはついに黒騎士を倒した。レオという当代一の
英傑の命と引き替えではあるが黒騎士はもういない
　レオの死についての個人的な思いをここに記すのは
やめておこう。年寄りの、とめどなくあふれる悲しみ
で濡れた言葉など誰も読みたくなかろう、今後のこと
を考えようではないか
　セシリーを狙う邪魔者はいなくなった。それでもな
おレスタニアに押し寄せる侵食魔を根絶やしにするに
は、フィンダムに乗り込んで侵食の原因を排除するし
かない
　この地とフィンダムを結ぶゲートが開けばそれも可
能になるだろう。困難を極めるだろうが、できないこ
とはない、レオが身を持って教えてくれたことだ。忘
れるものか
column2:
They finally defeated the Black Knight. Though it came at the cost of Leo, the greatest hero of our time, the Black Knight is no more.
I shall refrain from sharing my personal thoughts on Leo's death here. No one would want to read words soaked in the endless grief of an old man. Let us focus on the future instead.

There are no longer any obstacles targeting Cecily. However, in order to completely eradicate the corrupting demons that continue to invade Lestania, we must board Phindym and eliminate the source of corruption.

If the gate connecting this land and Phindym is opened, it may become possible. It will undoubtedly be a great challenge, but as Leo taught us, nothing is impossible. We must not forget.

column1:
青い顔になって、そんなものを集めるのは
すぐ止めるようにと強く言われた
なんでも、“良くない運命”を引き寄せるとか――
嘘をついている表情ではないが――
にわかに信じがたい
column2:
They became pale in the face, and said that collecting
such things must be stopped at once. 
Doing anything else, would be inviting "bad fate"...
By the look on their face, they weren't lying...
It's still hard to believe though.

column1:
魔物の巣になるばかりの
うち捨てられた建物があった
村に置き去るよりは、そこの方が安心だろう
column2:
There was an abandoned building nearby.
It would be much more secure to put it there, than to leave it
in the village, only for it to become some monster's nest.

column1:
禁域のどこかにあるらしい地下泉
祝福を受けた泉は高位の術師が管理していた
そうだが現在はその場所すら定かでない
column2:
There seems to be an underground spring somewhere in the restricted area.
The blessed spring was managed by a high-ranking sorcerer, but now, even the exact location is uncertain.

column1:
周囲に不快な臭気が漂っている。グリッテン砦から
帰還した者たちにこびりついた臭いだ
　砦でオークとの大規模な戦闘があった。完全なる勝
利との報告を受けたが、このところの敵は勢いづいて
いるように思える
　遠方からもオークの動きが活発になったとの情報が
入っており、騎士の常駐も計画中だ
　長く続いているオークとの戦争は、一進一退という
評価が一般的だが、謁見の間の我々は危機感を覚えて
いる。我々白竜陣営が完全に掌握しているのはこのハ
イデル平原だけになってしまった
　いつの世も、どこへ行っても魔物がいるせいで、オ
ークの行動範囲が多少拡大しても気づく者は少ない
　しかし、それも時間の問題だ。レオ並びにゲルトと
知恵を出し合いなんらかの策を打ち出す必要がある
column2:
There is an unpleasant odor lingering in the air. It's the smell that clings to those who have returned from Fort Gritten.
There was a large-scale battle with the orcs at the fort. We received a report of a complete victory, but it seems that the enemy has gained momentum recently.
We have received information that the orcs' movements have become more active even from a distance, and plans for the permanent presence of knights are underway.

The war with the orcs, which has been going on for a long time, is generally evaluated as a back-and-forth struggle, but we in the Audience Chamber feel a sense of crisis. The Hidell Plains is the only territory that the White Dragon Forces have fully under control.

In any era, wherever you go, there are always monsters, so few people notice even if the orcs' range of action expands slightly.

However, it is only a matter of time. Leo, Gerd, and Ide need to pool their wisdom and come up with some kind of plan.

column1:
渓谷の一軒家の裏手にある井戸
まだ掘削中らしく、水源には届いて
いないようだ
column2:
There is a well in the backyard of the Lone House in the Valley.
It seems that they are still in the process of digging, and it appears that they have not yet reached the water source.

column1:
ディナン低地には美しい霊水を湛えた泉がある
その生命力に魅かれ、度々肉体を持たぬ者が
彷徨い出ては命ある者に襲い掛るという
不自然に白い人影を見かけた場合、泉には
近寄らぬほうがいいだろう
column2:
There is a spring in the lowlands of Deenan that holds beautiful sacred water. 
Drawn to its vitality, beings without physical forms often wander and attack those who have life. 
If you happen to see a strangely white figure, it's best to stay away from the spring.

column1:
キンガル峡谷北部に位置する小塔
通常の拠点ではなく塔の中で暮らすことを
選んだ一族が暮らしている。住人は独自の
文化を継承しているらしく、殆ど小塔の外に
出ないように生活している
column2:
There is a small tower located in the northern part of Kingal Canyon. 
There, a clan has chosen to live inside the tower instead of a regular settlement. 
The residents seem to have inherited their own culture and live their lives mostly without venturing outside the tower.

column1:
戦士の村であるダナ付近にある廟堂
ダナには、自らの武勇の証を立てるため
この廟堂に巣食う魔物を倒してみせるという
文化が存在する。ただし、かつては頻繁に行われて
いたらしいが、現代において使用されることはごく稀
column2:
There is a shrine near the village of warriors, called Dana.
In order to prove their bravery, there is a cultural tradition of defeating the monsters that inhabit this shrine.
However, it is very rare for this tradition to be practiced in modern times.

column1:
ダウ渓谷の滝近くにある浅瀬。ここはもともと
サルファーリザードの棲息地帯だが、とりわけ
大きく強力な個体が確認された。この個体
《タイガーテール・サルファー》については
特に注意する必要がある
column2:
There is a shallow area near the waterfall in Dowe Valley. 
This place was originally a habitat for Sulfur Saurians, but particularly large and powerful individuals have been confirmed. Special attention is needed for one individual specifically, the "Sulfur Tiger-Tail"

column1:
旅人たちの簡易宿としても使われていた経緯がある
自然洞窟。各地の宿が発達したこともあり、百年
ほど前には完全に放棄されている。現在は戦乱により
住処を追われた魔物が棲みついているようだ。魔物
同士は敵対することもなく静かに暮らしているようだが
侵入者とみなした人間には確実に襲い掛かるだろう
column2:
There is a history of a natural cave being used as a simple accommodation for travelers. 
Due to the development of accommodations in various places, it was completely abandoned about a hundred years ago. Currently, it seems that monsters, driven from their homes by war, have taken up residence there. 
The monsters live quietly with no hostility towards each other, but they will surely attack anyone they consider an intruder.

column1:
南の海岸へ続く谷道にある、小鬼のキャンプ地
残虐で体格の大きなホブゴブリンの目撃があり
村人にとって不安の種となっている
また、このキャンプを境に南側は強力な魔物が
多いため、むやみに近づかない方がいい
column2:
There have been sightings of brutal and physically imposing Hobgoblins in the valley path that leads to the southern coast, where the little goblins have set up their camp. 
This has become a cause of concern for the villagers. 
Additionally, on the southern side of this camp, there are powerful enemies, so it is advisable not to approach casually.

column1:
傷ついた魔物の痕跡は、
住処へと続いているようだ――
column2:
There are traces from the wounded monster
It seems to lead towards its den.

column1:
とにかく凶暴性が助長されるもの
侵食前と変わらない行動サイクルを持つもの
そしてこの魔物のように侵食から逃れようと
もがき苦しむもの――
column2: There are those whose aggressiveness is exacerbated, those that maintain the same behavioral cycle as before infection, and those like this creature, who struggle in agony, trying to escape from the corruption.

column1:
侵食されている魔物の行動には、
いくつかのパターンが見られます
column2: There are several patterns observed in the behavior of the infected creatures.

column1:
新たに訪れたこの地で、まだまだ知らない事は多い
素材だけでなく、多くの知識も
持ち帰る事ができそうだ
column2:
There are many things still unknown to me about this
new place. Perhaps I may not only bring materials home, but also a
wealth of knowledge.

column1:
壁に文字が刻まれている――
“高貴なるサマラの指に輝きし光
我が心を魅了し、支配する光
輝きから逃れんと塔に身を隠すが
我が思いはひとときも離れず”
column2:
There are inscriptions on the wall:
"On the noble Samara's fingers, a radiant light shines,
Enchanting and ruling our hearts,
Though I hide in the tower to escape the radiance,
My thoughts never stray for a moment."

column1:
床に文字が刻まれている――
“探究と秘密を愛する者よ
ここより北の洞窟で待つ
高貴なるサマラの指に輝きし光
人の目に余る煌めきサマラに帰るべし”
column2:
There are inscriptions on the floor:
"O seeker of exploration and secrets,
Await in the cave to the north from here,
Where the radiant light shines on the noble fingers of Samara,
Return to Samara with a brilliance beyond human eyes."

column1:
ザンドラの蛮族が縄張りとする彼らの関所、通称
バンデッドホーントで、鉄の巨人が目撃された
彼らが発掘したものなのか、亡都からやって来た
ものかは不明。秘術の流出やバートランドの
新たな脅威となる前に破壊する必要がある
column2: Their checkpoint, known as the Banded Haunt, is the territory of Zandora's barbarians. A giant made of iron was seen there. It is unclear whether they discovered it or if it came from the fallen capital. It is necessary to destroy it before it becomes a new threat of leaked secret arts or Betland.

column1:
その姿は哀れを誘いますが――
侵食によって箍の外れた力は、一瞬でも
気を緩めればこちらが命を落とすほどです
column2: Their appearance evokes pity, but the power unleashed by Corruption is so dangerous that even a momentary lapse in concentration could cost us our lives.

column1:
ウルテカの土地に焼きついた歴史の世界
悪しき竜の影響により、土地の持つ“記憶”
というべきものにも歪みが生じ、本来の
ウルテカの歴史とは異なった姿を見せる
column2:
The world of history engraved into the land of Urteca.
Due to the influence of the Evil Dragon, even the "memories" that the land possesses have become distorted, showing a different appearance from the true history of Urteca.

column1:
メガドシスの土地に焼きついた歴史の世界
悪しき竜が現れたことにより、各地を巡る竜力にも
異変が起きた。その結果、土地の持っている“記憶”
というべきものにすら歪みが生じているようだ
column2:
The world of history engraved into the land of Megado.
Various anomalies have occurred in the Dragon Force that travel across the land, due to the appearance of the evil dragon. 
As a result, even the "memories" that the land holds seem to have become distorted.

column1:
錬金術師テオドールの工房
錬金術に関する様々な書物や研究資材が並ぶ
ディアマンテスに抵抗する者、そして
《アルケミスト》を志す者にとっては重要な
場所である
column2:
The workshop of alchemist Theodor.
Various books and research materials related to alchemy are lined up.
It is an important place for those who resist Diamantes and aspire to be Alchemists.

column1:
小さなほこらの壁面が崩れ、その先に
謎の空間が確認できている。空間は奥に続いている
ため、不要になった貯蔵庫の類を埋めたものでは
ないようだ
column2:
The wall of a small shrine has collapsed, revealing a mysterious space beyond. 
The space continues further back, suggesting that it is not simply filled with unused storage items.

column1:
魔軍の襲撃により抵抗虚しく潰えた村
周囲の小さな集落を繋ぐ役割を果たしていた中心的な
山村だったが、それ故に早期に魔軍の襲撃を受けた
建物は一つ残らず破壊され、放たれた火が未だ燻り
続ける様には生々しい痛ましさが漂う
column2:
The village, which served as the central mountain village connecting the surrounding small settlements, was completely crushed by the raid of the Demon Army. 
Every building was destroyed without exception, and the lingering fire still smolders, carrying a raw and painful sensation.

column1:
アッカーシェラン大陸の西域に広がる大湿地帯
その広さ故に、古来から戦場になることが多い
傷を負って死を待つばかりの兵たちの嘆きが
絶えることがなかったと伝えられている
column2:
The vast swamp spreads to the western region of Acre Selund Continent. 
Due to its size, it has often been a battlefield since ancient times. 
It is said that the lament of soldiers who were only waiting for death while wounded never ceased.

column1:
セラー湖にそびえる禊の神殿・上層部
禊の神殿内部には、失われた都に続く湖底大通路
が存在すると言われるが、長らくその扉は白竜神殿
により管理、封印されてきた
column2:
The upper echelons of the Temple of Purification located on Lake Cera, towering over the lake. 
It is said that within the temple lies a grand underwater passageway leading to the lost city. 
However, for a long time, the doors to this passageway have been guarded and sealed by The White Dragon Temple.

column1:
セラー湖にそびえる禊の神殿・上層部
禊の神殿内部には、失われた都に続く湖底大通路
が存在すると言われるが、長らくその扉は白竜神殿
により管理、封印されてきた
column2:
The upper echelons of the Temple of Purification located on Lake Cera, towering over the lake. 
It is said that within the temple lies a grand underwater passageway leading to the lost city. 
However, for a long time, the doors to this passageway have been guarded and sealed by The White Dragon Temple.

column1:
ドリード城にほど近い廃墟の地下ワイン庫
かつては城に献上するワインが集められて
いたそうだが、現在は見る影もない
column2:
The underground wine cellar, located near Dreed Castle, is now nothing more than a ruin. 
It used to store wines that were once offered to the castle, but now there is no sign of its former glory.

column1:
王家の次期当主がその力を示すために
代々使われてきた地下道。内部には強力な
守護者が配置されているとみられるが、これまで
王家の者以外が足を踏み入れられることは
無かったため、情報に乏しい
column2:
The underground passage that has been used by the next head of the royal family to demonstrate his power. 
It is believed that powerful guardians are placed inside, but there is little information as no one other than the royal family has ever set foot in there.

column1:
王家の命により封鎖されている地下道
王族関連施設に繋がるであろうという
推測以外、情報が無い場所でもある
何らかの意図を持って隠されている場で
あることは確かだ
column2:
The underground passage is sealed off by the royal family's orders. 
It is a place where there is no information other than speculation that it may be connected to facilities related to the royal family. 
It is certain that it is hidden with some intention.

column1:
セラー湖の岸辺にある地下室
もとは禊の神殿からの一時物資保管庫だった
が、神殿が捨てられてからというもの
物資ともども小鬼達に占領されてしまった
column2:
The underground chamber by the shores of Lake Cera originally served as a temporary storage facility for supplies from the Temple of Purification. 
However, since the temple was abandoned, it has been occupied by small monsters, stealing the supplies.

column1:
彼が命尽きる時まで追い求めた宝――
その遺志を継ぎ、形にして納めることで
彼と私、お互いにとって良い弔いになるはずだ
column2:
The treasure that he had chased after until the time of his death...
By carrying on his will, and shaping it, both he and I, will have lavish funerals.

column1: 交通路《グリンデュア近くの岩崩れ》が復旧しました
column2: The transportation route, "Rockslide near Glyndwr" has been restored.

column1:
《芯なる樹》の太い根が伸び、聖域の影響が
色濃く出た遺跡。入口が崩落してはいるが
そのせいもあってか人が入った形跡は最小限に
保たれている
column2:
The thick roots of the "Core Tree" stretch out, and the influence of the Sacred Grounds is strongly felt. 
Although the entrance has collapsed, and perhaps because of that, there are minimal signs of anyone entering.

column1:
隠れ村ピレモス付近にあるグリムゴブリンたちの
縄張り。見よう見まねで作ったらしき、オークや
人間の作るものに似た構造物が散見される
どうやらゴブリンたちもここを拠点とし
人間の動向を見張っているつもりのようだ
column2:
The territory of the Grim Goblins near Hidden Village Piremoth. 
Structures resembling those made by orcs and humans can be seen, apparently made by mimicking. 
It seems that the goblins consider this place their base and are keeping an eye on the movements of humans.

column1:
ポーン遠征隊の戦力がアップする
※特殊なポーン遠征隊支援が使えるようになります
column2:
The strength of the Pawn Expedition Corps has been enhanced.
※ You will be able to use special support from the Expedition Support

column1: 保管ボックス容量が1Ｐ(40枠)増加しました
column2: The storage box capacity has increased by 1P (40 slots)

column1: 精霊竜が怒りに染まっていく――

ポーンの民が渡る、この世ならざる空間
世界の淵辺にあたるとされ、普通の人間には足を
踏み入れるどころか、入口を見ることすらできない
“異界歩き”と呼ばれるポーンがなぜ覚者に応え
現れるのか、それを知るのは竜のみである
column2:
The space where the pawns traverse, a realm unlike this world.
Believed to exist on the edge of the world, beyond the reach of ordinary humans who can't even step inside, let alone see the entrance.
Only the dragons know why the pawns, called 'striders of other worlds', answer to the Arisen.

column1:
解放軍が拠点として使っている小さな集落
元はきこりが使っていたらしき空き家を中心に、
逃げ延びた人たちがテントを張って暮らしているが
いつオークに攻め込まれるかわからない状況にある
column2:
The small settlement used as a base by the Liberation Army.
It originally consisted of vacant houses, seemingly once occupied by lumberjacks. 
Now, people who managed to escape have pitched tents and are living there, constantly facing the uncertainty of when they will be attacked by Orcs.

column1:
解放軍が拠点として使っている小さな集落
元はきこりが使っていたらしき空き家を中心に、
逃げ延びた人たちがテントを張って暮らしているが
いつオークに攻め込まれるかわからない状況にある
column2:
The small settlement used as a base by the Liberation Army.
It originally consisted of vacant houses, seemingly once occupied by lumberjacks. 
Now, people who managed to escape have pitched tents and are living there, constantly facing the uncertainty of when they will be attacked by Orcs.

column1:
解放軍が休憩をとるために設営した小さな小屋
オークたちの襲撃を受けた際に母屋以外は全て
破壊されてしまった。そればかりか、現在は
魔軍が利用している形跡すらみられる
column2:
The small hut set up by the Liberation Army for rest was completely destroyed during the Orc attack, except for the main house.
Not only that, but there are even signs that the Demon Army is currently using it.

column1: 状況が悪化し、獣の将が強き魔物を呼び寄せる――！
column2: The situation worsens as the Beast Master summons powerful enemies!

column1:
フィンダムの状況は深刻だ。芯なる樹が侵食され、
次いで、樹を浄化しようとした竜までもが侵食されて
しまった。竜がセシリーを襲ったのは、悲しいかな、
侵食で正気を失ってしまったことが原因らしい
　竜力を巡らせる樹――、浄化する竜の両方が侵食さ
れたことで、フィンダムを巡る竜力は毒になり果て
た。毒を体内に取り入れた動物は魔物化し、魔物ども
は侵食魔となった
　なんとも壮絶な話だ。元来、フィンダムの人々は、
耐え難い苦難でさえ運命として受け入れることを潔し
とする人々らしい。しかし、今回ばかりは、立ち向か
うことにしたそうだ。その活動の中心にいるのがセシ
リーの父親であるガラダだ
　彼らの戦いは、故郷を救うためであると同時に、自
分たちの生き方を変えようとする闘争でもある
column2:
The situation in Phindym is dire. The core of the tree has been corrupted, and then the dragon, who tried to cleanse the tree, was also corrupted. Unfortunately, it seems that the dragon attacked Cecily because they lost their sanity due to the corruption.
The corruption of both the tree that channels the power of the dragons and the dragon themself has turned the dragon power surrounding Phindym into poison. Animals that have ingested the poison have turned into monsters, known as the infected monsters.

It is a truly tragic story. The people of Phindym have always been known to accept even unbearable hardships as their fate. However, this time they have decided to confront the situation. At the center of their efforts is Cecily's father, Gearóid.

Their fight is not only to save their homeland but also a struggle to change their way of life.

column1:
白い木で作られた簡易な柵は、アンセスターオークが
縄張りを誇示する際に多用されるもの
賢明な旅人であれば忌避すべき“危険”の標である
column2: The simple fence made of white wood is often used by Ancestor Orcs to showcase their territory, and it serves as a "danger" sign that wise travelers should avoid.

column1:
戦士の修行を目的とし、様々な種類の魔物が
わざと放たれている祠。以前は王族を護る者たちが
平時にあってもその腕を鈍らせないようにと鍛練に
励んでいた場所であるが、近年はひたすらに武を
誇る風潮が薄れたため使用されることも減り、内部の
魔物のみが取り残されている
column2:
The shrine, which is intentionally filled with various types of enemies, serves as a training ground for soldiers. 
In the past, it was a place where those who protected the royal family trained to keep their skills sharp even during times of peace. 
However, in recent years, the enthusiasm for showcasing one's martial prowess has diminished, resulting in a decrease in its usage. 
As a result, only the monsters inside the shrine remain.

column1:
モロー樹林北部、特に侵食が進んだ一帯にある
封鎖された森林。侵食前より森の強者が棲むとされ、
人が迷いこむことが無いようにと封鎖されていた場所
奥を確かめた者はいないが、凶暴な魔物が侵食された
状態にあることは確実であり、危険度は高い
column2:
The sealed forest located in the northern part of Morrow Forest, where corruption has particularly advanced.
It is said to be inhabited by powerful beings of the forest, and it was sealed off to prevent people from getting lost. 
No one has ventured deep inside, but it is certain that ferocious monsters have been infected. The level of danger is high.

column1:
モロー樹林北部、特に侵食が進んだ一帯にある
封鎖された森林。侵食前より森の強者が棲むとされ、
人が迷いこむことが無いようにと封鎖されていた場所
奥を確かめた者はいないが、凶暴な魔物が侵食された
状態にあることは確実であり、危険度は高い
column2:
The sealed forest located in the northern part of Morrow Forest, where corruption has particularly advanced.
It is said to be inhabited by powerful beings of the forest, and it was sealed off to prevent people from getting lost. 
No one has ventured deep inside, but it is certain that ferocious monsters have been infected. The level of danger is high.

column1: 辺りに飛散する竜力が反応している――
column2: The scattered Dragon Force in the vicinity is reacting.

column1:
森林奥にひっそりと残された遺跡
いつの時代、何の目的で造られたのか一切が謎に
包まれている。だが、床に敷かれたモザイクの
図案から竜と覚者に関連するのではと推測される
また、竜力が淀みやすい危険な場所でもある
column2:
The ruins that were quietly left behind in the depths of the forest.
The era and purpose of their construction are completely shrouded in mystery.
However, it is speculated that they are related to dragons and the Arisen, based on the mosaic pattern laid on the floor.
It is also a hazardous location where Dragon Force tends to stagnate.

column1:
森深くに人知れず残る、エルフ族の住居跡
独自の高い文化と繁栄を築いた彼らがある時を
境に姿を消した真の理由は、レスタニアに起こった
３００年前の激変と深い繋がりがあるのかも
しれない
column2:
The ruins of the elven civilization, hidden from the knowledge of people, deep in the forest. 
They, who once built their own unique and prosperous culture, disappeared without a trace at some point. 
The true reason for their disappearance may be deeply connected to the great upheaval that occurred in Lestania 300 years ago.

column1:
森深くに人知れず残る、エルフ族の住居跡
独自の高い文化と繁栄を築いた彼らがある時を
境に姿を消した真の理由は、レスタニアに起こった
３００年前の激変と深い繋がりがあるのかも
しれない
column2:
The ruins of the elven civilization, hidden from the knowledge of people, deep in the forest. 
They, who once built their own unique and prosperous culture, disappeared without a trace at some point. 
The true reason for their disappearance may be deeply connected to the great upheaval that occurred in Lestania 300 years ago.

column1:
アッカーシェラン王家に連なる者、または王家の
ためにその力を尽くした英雄たちが眠る遺跡
英霊は王家に危機が迫る時あらば再び
呼び声に応じ、その力を貸すといわれる
column2:
The royal descendants of the Acre Selund family, or the heroes who exerted their power for the sake of the royal family, rest in this shrine. 
When the royal family is in imminent danger, it is said that the heroic spirits respond to the call and lend their power.

column1:
火竜が休息をとる火垂れ山内部へと至る道
基本的には王家の人間が稀に通るのみであり
細工の凝った巨大な門は、代々門番の家系である
バシアス、もしくは王家の人間にしか開門できない
column2:
The road leads to the interior of Firefall Mountain, where the Fire Dragon rests.
Usually, only members of the royal family pass through.
The intricately crafted enormous gate can only be opened by the gatekeeper lineage, the Bacias, or members of the royal family.

column1:
ディナン南部を意味する河岸一帯
銀色の毛を持つ凶暴な猿鬼が徘徊するように
なったようだ
その銀の猿鬼は、エルフ族が森でもっとも
出会いたくない魔物筆頭であったらしい
column2:
The riverbank area that signifies the southern part of Deenan.
Seems to have become a place where a ferocious monkey demon with silver fur wanders.
It seems that this silver monkey demon is the foremost creature that the Elves did not want to encounter in the forest.

column1: 封鎖エリア《メルゴダ護政区》開放
column2: The restricted area "Mergoda Security District" has been unsealed.

column1:
グリッテン砦の修復は着々と進んでいるようだ。幸
いヴァネッサたちハイデル平原守備隊の士気も高いま
まだ
　油断があったことを率直に認め、対策を講じること
で、今回の敵の侵入も良い経験とすることができるだ
ろう
　さて、久しぶりに白竜の前に《ブラッドオーブ》が
運ばれてきた。手に入れたのはレオが気に入っている
新人の覚者だ。なるほど、なかなか見込みがあるにち
がいない
　これで白竜の石化は回復し、進行も速度を下げるだ
ろう。効果は一時的で対症療法に過ぎないが、目下我
々に許された方法は《ブラッドオーブ》以外にはない
のだ
　悲観的な見方をする者もいるようだが、有効な方法
が判明しているだけマシだと考えた方が良いはずだ
column2:
The restoration of Fort Gritten is steadily progressing. Fortunately, the morale of Vanessa and the Hidell Plains Defense Corps remains high. However, we must admit our negligence and take measures to handle the enemy's invasion. It can be considered a valuable experience.
Now, after a long time, the《Blood Orb》has been brought before the White Dragon. Leo's new and promising Arisen acquired it. Indeed, they show great potential.

With this, the petrification of the White Dragon will be healed, slowing down its progress. Although the effect is temporary and only a palliative measure, there is no other method available to us at the moment.

Some may have a pessimistic view, but it is best to consider that we have discovered an effective method.

column1:
古将マグサスを始めとした歴戦の猛者たちが
眠る墓所。水路も兼ねていたが、いつの頃からか
ウィルムが棲みつき、慰霊のために訪れる者は
いなくなった。まれに、副葬品狙いの墓荒らしが
命知らずにも入り込むことがあるらしい
column2:
The resting place of seasoned warriors, including the ancient hero Magusas. 
While also serving as a waterway, it has been inhabited by a Wyrm for quite some time now, and those who used to visit to pay their respects have disappeared. 
Occasionally, grave robbers, driven by the desire for burial artifacts, dare to venture in unknowingly.

column1:
エラン水林を管理するために設えられた科学者の住居
元は恵まれた環境を保全するという側面が強かったが
現在は侵食の被害をいかに食い止めるかという点に
研究の重点が置かれているようだ
column2:
The residence of scientists established to manage the Elan Water Grove. 
Initially, the emphasis was on preserving the rich environment, but now the focus of research seems to be on how to halt the spread of corruption and damage caused by it.

column1:
エラン水林を管理するために設えられた科学者の住居
元は恵まれた環境を保全するという側面が強かったが
現在は侵食の被害をいかに食い止めるかという点に
研究の重点が置かれているようだ
column2:
The residence of scientists established to manage the Elan Water Grove. 
Initially, the emphasis was on preserving the rich environment, but now the focus of research seems to be on how to halt the spread of corruption and damage caused by it.

column1:
セシリーを助けた覚者たちが図らずも渡航した先は
島だったという報告を受け、騎士団を中心とする捜索
隊が船出する予定だった。しかし、各地の魔物退治に
人手を奪われ、思うように進んでいなかった
　そこでわたしは、覚者たちの力を借りるよう、騎士
団に助言し、覚者たちには引き受けるよう根回しをし
ておいた
　結果、騎士団の魔物討伐は軌道に乗り、ほどなく捜
索隊も出せるようになることだろう
　尚、嵐の夜以降に現れるようになった新手の魔物た
ちを、レスタニア土着の魔物と区別するため、以降、
侵食魔と呼ぶこととする
column2:
The report received stated that the Arisen who had helped Cecily unintentionally ended up traveling to an island. A search party, led by the Knights, had planned to set sail. However, due to manpower being taken away for monster subjugation in various places, things weren't going as smoothly as expected.
Therefore, I advised the Knights to seek the assistance of the Arisen and made arrangements for them to take on the task.

As a result, the Knights' monster extermination efforts are on track, and soon the search party will be able to set out.

Furthermore, the newly emerged monsters that appear after stormy nights will be referred to as "Corrupted" in order to distinguish them from the local monsters in Lestania.

column1:
ディナン深層林、南西にあるエルフ族の住居跡
聖なる泉、エルネア・スプリングに近い穏やかな
地のはずが、今や他と同じく野獣の住処に
なっている
column2:
The remains of the Elves dwelling in Deenan Woods, located in the southwest. 
What used to be a peaceful land near the sacred Elnea Spring has now become a dwelling for wild animals, just like everywhere else.

column1:
エルフ族の大規模な住居跡
いくつもの広場や部屋で構成されており、相当数の
エルフがここで暮らしていたことを物語っている
遺跡内部には、特別な水を湛えた井戸が
あるという
column2:
The remains of a large dwelling of the Elven race.
Consists of multiple plazas and rooms, telling the story of a significant number of Elves living here. Inside the ruins, there is said to be a well containing special water.

column1:
エルフ族の大規模な住居跡
いくつもの広場や部屋で構成されており、相当数の
エルフがここで暮らしていたことを物語っている
遺跡内部には、特別な水を湛えた井戸が
あるという
column2:
The remains of a large dwelling of the Elven race.
Consists of multiple plazas and rooms, telling the story of a significant number of Elves living here. Inside the ruins, there is said to be a well containing special water.

column1:
レオに助力を求める提案はロイグのものだ。レオの
保護下にあった時に聞きかじった話を持ち出したらし
い
　レオの放浪の目的は、大勢の覚者に分散された覚者
としての資質、強さを、増強するその特別な方法を探
すことにあった。確かに、その力があれば黒騎士を倒
すことが可能になるのかもしれない
　古文書の中に答えを見つけ、いよいよ実行に移すと
いう頃合いに取り入ることができたのもロイグの手柄
だ
　神殿を去ったレオをどこまで信用していいのか、そ
の判断は行動をともにする覚者たちに任せて、わたし
はセシリーの回復を祈ることにしよう
column2:
The proposal to seek assistance from Leo is Loeg's. It seems that he brought up a story he heard during Leo's protection.
Leo's purpose in his wandering is to find a special method to enhance qualities and strength as an Arisen and to disperse it among many Arisen. Indeed, with that power, it might be possible to defeat the Black Knight.

It was also thanks to Loeg that we were able to intervene at the timing of finding the answer in the ancient documents and finally put it into practice.

As for how much we can trust Leo after leaving the temple, I leave that judgment to the Arisen who will act together with him, and I will pray for Cecily's recovery.

column1:
問題は“失われた鍵”の所在――
鍵がなければ、制御室へ入れないのだ
column2:
The problem is the location of the "lost key" -
Without the key, there is no way to get into the control room!

column1:
フィンダム随一の森林地帯
樹木や草花、多様な獣といった森の恩恵を
受けられるこの地の特性は、反面侵食の影響が
最も色濃く発現する悲劇を招いた。生命力に
溢れていた森は今や赤く立ち枯れている箇所が目立つ
column2:
The premier woodland region of Phindym, where one can enjoy the benefits of the forest, including trees, flowers, and a variety of animals.
However, the characteristic of this land also brings about the tragic manifestation of the most intense corruption and infection.
The once vibrant forest now stands with prominent red decay.

column1:
フィンダム随一の森林地帯
樹木や草花、多様な獣といった森の恩恵を
受けられるこの地の特性は、反面侵食の影響が
最も色濃く発現する悲劇を招いた。生命力に
溢れていた森は今や赤く立ち枯れている箇所が目立つ
column2:
The premier woodland region of Phindym, where one can enjoy the benefits of the forest, including trees, flowers, and a variety of animals.
However, the characteristic of this land also brings about the tragic manifestation of the most intense corruption and infection.
The once vibrant forest now stands with prominent red decay.

column1:
魔軍戦車《カトブレパス》が留められている広場
巨大且つ凶暴、全てを踏み砕きながら進む
カトブレパスだが、魔軍はそれをさらに武装させた
ものを“戦車”として使役している
column2:
The plaza where the demon army's tank, Catoblepas, is stationed.
Gigantic and fierce, it crushes everything in its path.
The demon army has further armed and prepared it as a "tank" for their use.

column1:
ピクシーたちが棲みついていた場所だが
何らかの魔物の襲撃を受けたらしく
数日に渡り、ピクシーたちの騒ぎ声が
周辺に響いていたという。結局のところ
ピクシーたちは一匹残らず逃げ出したようだ
column2:
The place where the Pixies were residing seems to have been attacked by some kind of enemy. 
For several days, the Pixies' restless voices echoed in the surroundings. 
In the end, it appears that all the Pixies fled.

column1:
元はピクシーの群れが棲みついていた洞窟だったが
何らかの侵食魔の襲撃を受けたことがきっかけで
群れ全体に侵食が蔓延してしまったと推測される
侵食の度合から見て、ピクシーたちを襲った魔物は
洞窟の奥に潜んでいるらしい
column2:
The original cave was once inhabited by a group of Pixies, but it was attacked by some kind of corrupted creature, causing the corruption to spread throughout the entire group.
Based on the extent of the corruption, it is speculated that the creature that attacked the Pixies is lurking deep within the cave.

column1:
ディナンの森唯一の住民が暮らす遺跡
エルフの文化や戦闘術を学びたい者に
とっては特に重要な拠点となるだろう
column2:
The only inhabited site in the Deenan Forest.
An especially important base for those who want to learn about Elven culture and the art of warfare.

column1:
廃墟傍にある古井戸
なぜ「閉ざされた」と呼ばれているかに
ついては詳しく知られていない
column2: The old well near the ruins is called "closed," but the detailed reasons are not well known.

column1:
ブリア海岸の岬に立つ古い灯台
洋撃船や漁船の標として、レスタニアの海を
照らし続けてきた。灯台守は代々、退役騎士が
務める習わしとなっており、現在の守番は高名な
《シールドセージ》、ルドルフォである
column2:
The old lighthouse on the cape of Breya Coast.
Shining over the sea of Lestania as a beacon for foreign ships and fishing boats. It is a tradition for retired knights to serve as lighthouse keepers, and the current guardian is the renowned Shield Sage, Rudolfo.

column1:
ブリア海岸の岬に立つ古い灯台
洋撃船や漁船の標として、レスタニアの海を
照らし続けてきた。灯台守は代々、退役騎士が
務める習わしとなっており、現在の守番は高名な
《シールドセージ》、ルドルフォである
column2:
The old lighthouse on the cape of Breya Coast.
Shining over the sea of Lestania as a beacon for foreign ships and fishing boats. It is a tradition for retired knights to serve as lighthouse keepers, and the current guardian is the renowned Shield Sage, Rudolfo.

column1:
魔赤島の自然洞窟
地盤が一部落ち窪んだようになっており
天井部分から青空が見える箇所もある
陽光が差し込む様は幻想的で美しい光景だが
内部は侵食魔が跋扈し、多数の菌胞も確認されている
column2:
The natural caves of Bloodbane Isle have partially sunken and concave terrain, with some areas where the ceiling reveals the blue sky.
The sunlight shining through creates a fantastical and beautiful scene, but the interior is infested with corruption, with numerous fungal spores confirmed as well.

column1:
ボルド小坑道へ続く山道。坑道に住む強力な
オーガ《坑道荒らし》の返り討ちに合い、派遣された
騎士団の骸が残されていることから、そう呼ばれて
いる。小坑道は採掘がまだ可能だが、現在は
近づく鉱員はほとんどいない
column2:
The mountain path continues towards the Volden Narrow Tunnels. 
It is called so because the remains of a knight from the dispatched order were left behind after being defeated by a powerful Ogre "Tunnel Thief" who resides in the tunnel. 
Although mining is still possible in the narrow tunnels, there are hardly any miners approaching them currently.

column1:
汚い字でメモが書き込んである
“ ＜20時　対象を確認＞
　　場所：メガド居住区侯爵邸前
　　人数：2名
　　報告：ターゲットがレジスタンスと接触
　　　　　隠れ家へ向かうと思われるため
　　　　　引き続き、追跡監視の任務続行 ”
以下、同じような記録が淡々と続いている
column2:
The memo is written in messy handwriting.
"<20:00 Target Confirmation>
Location: In front of the Megado Residential District Marquis Mansion
Number of People: 2
Report: Target has made contact with the Resistance and is believed to be heading towards their hideout. The mission of tracking and surveillance will continue."
Similar records continue in a matter-of-fact manner.

column1:
メインクエストが進行可能になりました
一度パーティーを解散してからトラバースに話しかけて下さい
column2:
The main quest is now ready to proceed.
Please talk to Travers once you break up the party.

column1:
亡都メルゴダの王ゴルゴラン、そして政権を握る
ディアマンテスら特別な錬金術師たちが集った
壮麗なる王宮
広い研究所や宮殿は現在も巨人兵が護りつづけ
ており、支配者の影響力を強く残している
column2:
The magnificent palace where Golgorran, the king of the exiled city of Mergoda, and the special alchemists led by Diamantes who hold political power, gathered. 
The large laboratories and palaces are still guarded by Giant soldiers, preserving the strong influence of the rulers.

column1: 殲滅できなかった魔物の残魂が、骸の将の力として吸収される！
column2: The lingering souls of the enemies that couldn't be completely exterminated are absorbed as the power of the Necro Master!

column1:
エルフの青年の命は白竜に捧げられた。結果、目覚
めた白竜の口から、忌まわしきディアマンテスの名が
出たのだ
　３００年以上前にレスタニアを混乱に陥れた錬金術
師。アークの出現以来、わたしが何度も思い浮かべた
名だ
　しかし、敵の真意は相変わらず不明だ。かつてと同
じレスタニアの支配が最終目的だと仮定した場合、で
は、今現在起こっていることの意味はなんだろう。ど
う繋がるのだろう
　神殿の上を第二のアークが横切り、落ちていった。
彼らの計画は未だ進行中ということだろう。謎は増え
るばかりだ
　わたしは大会議の召集を求めることにした。末席
で、神殿の知恵者を自認しながらも何も見通せない不
明を恥じ入る他はない
column2:
The life of the young elf was offered to the White Dragon. As a result, the awakened White Dragon uttered the vile name of Diamantes. 
The alchemist who caused chaos in Lestania over 300 years ago. Ever since the appearance of the Ark, it has been a name that has come to my mind many times.
However, the true intentions of the enemy remain unknown. If we assume that their ultimate goal is the same as before, the domination of Lestania, then what is the meaning of the events happening now? How do they connect?

The second Ark flew across the top of the temple and descended. Their plan must still be in progress. The mysteries only continue to grow.

I have decided to request a grand council. Sitting at the end, ashamed of my inability to see through the uncertainty, despite considering myself a wise person of the temple.

column1:
器に封じられたディアマンテスの命は白竜に捧げら
れ、浄化された
　第一のアークの出現から始まった一連の事変はここ
に終結したと考えても構わないだろう。とはいえ、白
竜の回復への道はまだ半ば。レスタニアの安定はまだ
先のことにちがいない
　不安の種は尽きない。だが、今は、危機を脱した喜
びを分かち合おう
column2:
The life of Diamantes sealed within the artifact was offered to the White Dragon and purified. 
It can be said that the series of events that began with the appearance of the first Ark has come to an end here. However, the path to the White Dragon's recovery is still halfway there. The stability of Lestania is undoubtedly still a future matter. 

The seeds of anxiety are never-ending. However, for now, let us share the joy of having escaped the crisis.

column1:
キースヒルトの命を収めた命の器
清らかな光が静かに満たされている
column2:
The legendary Vessel of Life.
Seems to be filled with light.

column1:
セラー湖の湖底地下洞窟に広がる大水路
禊の神殿本殿と離殿を繋ぐ、水の浄化施設を
兼ねた補助連絡通路だった
あまりに長く、迷う者が絶えなかったため
封鎖されていた
column2: The large waterway that spreads through the underground caverns at the bottom of Lake Cera was a supplementary communication passage that also served as a purification facility for the main and detached shrines of the Temple of Purification. It had been sealed off because many people got lost in its extensive length.

column1:
年老いた奇面獣《ブルータルハーミット》の住処
人々の間ではその恐ろしさが代々語り継がれる
ほどであり、周囲に近寄ろうとする者はまずいない
しかし、魔軍はこの強力な奇面獣をなんとか利用
しようと捕獲を目論んでいるようだ
column2:
The lair of the aged beast, Brutal Hermit.
Its terror has been passed down through generations, so much so that few dare to approach it.
However, the Demon Army seems intent on capturing and somehow harnessing the power of this formidable creature.

column1:
メルゴダ護政区・《特別研究区》の鍵
大石塊と同じ紋章が彫り込まれている
column2:
The key to the Mergoda District's "Special Research District".
A symbol is engraved, reminiscent of large rocks.

column1:
メルゴダ護政区、《軍事指導官室》の鍵
この建物のどこかで使えるかもしれない
column2:
The key to the "Military leaders' room".
It might be usable somewhere in this building.

column1:
ドリード城のどこかにある《礼拝堂》の鍵
騎士団により管理されてきた
column2:
The key to a "chapel" somewhere in Dreed Castle.
It has been managed by the Order.

column1:
メルゴダ護政区、《錬金研究棟》の鍵
目玉を模した模様が刻まれている
column2:
The key to Mergoda District's "Alchemy Research Building".
A pattern imitating the eyeball is engraved

column1:
ディアマンテスが封じられた宮殿の鍵
大きく欠損しており、錬金術による修復が必要
column2:
The key of the Palace where Diamantes was sealed.
It needs to be restored with alchemy.

column1:
村の情報屋が言うことには
今までその姿かたちを見た者はいないらしい
column2:
The information broker in the village said that
there has been nobody that has seen the figure until just now.

column1:
未だ記憶に新しいフィンダムの竜を巡る事件同様ま
ず、空に異変が起こった。突如降り出したのは雨なら
ぬ、紅蓮の火球だった。炎が大地を焼き、民衆は逃げ
惑った
　次に、神殿が襲われた。巨大な目玉が中空に浮か
び、声が殿中に響いた。そして目玉は白竜を愚弄した
のだ。我が脚はすくみ、舌は渇いて悲鳴を上げること
もできなかった
　最初に動き始めたのはやはり覚者たちであった。さ
すがと言わねばなるまい。しかし声は意に介さず、４
名の精鋭覚者たちを連れて姿を消した
　レスタニアは平穏を取り戻したが、行方の知れない
覚者たちの安否は不明のままに無為な夜が過ぎ去って
いった
　やがて彼らは戻り、無事を喜んだのだが、もたらさ
れた報告には驚きと不安を禁じえない。覚者たちは住
民たちがアッカーシェランと呼ぶ大陸に連れ込まれて
いたのだ
　アッカーシェランは戦と絶望に覆われた世界で人々
は“悪しき竜”との戦いに明け暮れているらしい。公
式の記録に残すには覚者たちの話のさらなる吟味が必
要だ。段を改めて記すこととする
column2:
The incident surrounding the dragon in Phindym is still fresh in our memories, and now a strange phenomenon has occurred in the sky. Instead of rain, crimson fireballs began to fall. The flames engulfed the land, causing the people to panic and flee.
Next, the temple was attacked. A massive eyeball floated in the sky, its voice echoing throughout the halls. This eye mocked the White Dragon. I was paralyzed with fear and unable to utter a scream.

The first to take action were, as expected, the Arisen. They truly live up to their reputation. However, the voice paid no heed to our pleas and disappeared, taking four elite Arisen with them.

Lestania eventually regained peace, but we spent countless nights filled with worry for the Arisen whose whereabouts were unknown.

Finally, they returned, and we rejoiced in their safe return. However, their report brought us surprise and anxiety. The Arisen had been taken to a continent called Acre Selund, which the inhabitants believe to be a realm consumed by war and despair, where they are in constant battle with the "Evil Dragon". To officially document this, further scrutiny of the Arisen's accounts is necessary. I will make a note of this for future reference.

column1:
ひょうきんな軽業師、チェスターが住む家
登ることと身ごなしにかけては卓越した
技能を誇る彼に師事すれば、《シーカー》
としてより高みを目指すことができるだろう
column2:
The house where the playful acrobat, Chester, lives.
If you study under him, who excels in climbing and agility, you will be able to aim for greater heights as a Seeker.

column1:
魔女エメラダが住む森林の家
彼女に教えを請うことで
《ソーサラー》として破壊の魔術の
深淵により近づくことができるだろう
column2:
The house in the forest where Witch Emerada lives. 
By seeking her guidance, one can come closer to the abyss of destructive magic as a Sorcerer.

column1:
護政区の研究者であった錬金術師の家
すでに主は不在だが、研究成果や遺物は
遺されているかもしれない
それが、どういった内容であるかは不明
column2:
The home of an alchemist who was a researcher in the Security District.
 The master is already absent, but there may be alchemized research results and artifacts left behind. 
It is unclear what the contents are.

column1:
護政区の研究者であった錬金術師の家
すでに主は不在だが、研究成果や遺物は
遺されているかもしれない
それが、どういった内容であるかは不明
column2:
The home of an alchemist who was a researcher in the Security District.
 The master is already absent, but there may be alchemized research results and artifacts left behind. 
It is unclear what the contents are.

column1:
ポーンの民が集い、新しき覚者との契約を待つ聖堂
聖堂はレスタニアと異界との接点を守るために
偉大な覚者が大昔建造したと伝えられている
現在は里長アルヴァーが管理者を務めており
《プリースト》の導き手カミュも滞在している
column2:
The holy temple where the pawns gather, awaiting the contract with the newly awakened Arisen.
It is said that the temple was built by a great Arisen in ancient times to protect the connection between Lestania and the other realm.
Currently, it is managed by the village elder, Alvar, and the Priest, Camus, also resides there.

column1:
ポーンの民が集い、新しき覚者との契約を待つ聖堂
聖堂はレスタニアと異界との接点を守るために
偉大な覚者が大昔建造したと伝えられている
現在は里長アルヴァーが管理者を務めており
《プリースト》の導き手カミュも滞在している
column2:
The holy temple where the pawns gather, awaiting the contract with the newly awakened Arisen.
It is said that the temple was built by a great Arisen in ancient times to protect the connection between Lestania and the other realm.
Currently, it is managed by the village elder, Alvar, and the Priest, Camus, also resides there.

column1:
エラン水林西部、滝の傍にある高台
有翼の魔物の住み処となっていて常に羽音が
絶えない。周辺は草花の群生地にもなっており
鳥に花にと、遠目に見るだけであれば美しい
光景が広がる
column2:
The high ground in the western part of the Elan Water Grove by the waterfall is the home of winged demons and the sound of their wings is always constant. 
The surrounding area is also home to a cluster of flowers and grasses and is beautiful if only seen from a distance, with birds, flowers, and other beautiful sights.

column1:
王族のみが知りえた隠れ道
有事の際は隠れ家としても使えるよう工夫されて
おり、最低限の施設は整っている
王家の統治が行き届くようになってからは
使われることもなくなり、忘れ去られていた
column2:
The hidden passage that only the royal family knew about was designed to also serve as a hiding place in times of emergency. 
It had the minimum necessary facilities. 
Since the governance of the royal family became more meticulous, it was no longer used and forgotten.

column1: 隠れていた魔物が姿を現した――！

白竜の前に集いし者たちの心がひとつになったのは
久しくなかった
　今回、我々はキースヒルトの仇を打ち、彼の命を奪
還するという目的で一丸となることができたのだ。戦
果は華々しいものだった
　エルフの青年の命は我々の手にあり、オークの総大
将モゴックには大きな痛手を与えることに成功した
　同時に、仇討ちという熱狂の中で無視された幾つか
の意見があったことを記しておかねばならない。ガル
ドノック砦、即ち敵の本拠に攻め込むのは時期尚早で
あるとの意見だ
　敵がエルフの命を使ってしまう前に奪還する必要が
あったことはわたしも認めるし、賛同したが、だから
こそ慎重になるべきではなかったか
　敵の目的が命の収集であるならば、尚更だ。目的達
成のために過程の不備には目をつぶる。これは大変に
危険な兆候なのだ
　勝利の直後だからこそ真摯な態度で省みなくてはな
らない
column2:
The hearts of those who gathered before the White Dragon have become one, which hasn't happened in a long time.
This time, we were able to unite as one with the goal of avenging Kieshildt and reclaiming his life. The victory was impressive.
We have the life of the young Elf in our hands, and we have successfully dealt a major blow to Mogok, the Supreme Commander of the Orcs.

At the same time, I must note that there were several opinions that were ignored in the frenzy of revenge. Some believed that it was premature to attack Gardnox Fortress, the enemy's stronghold.

If the enemy's goal is to collect lives, this is even more reason to be cautious. We should not overlook any flaws in the process for the sake of achieving the objective. This is a very dangerous sign.

Immediately after victory, we must reflect with a sincere attitude.

column1:
ここしばらくの収穫は
我ながら好調すぎるほどだ
日頃の感謝もあり、例の情報屋に話してみたが――
column2:
The harvest here has been great for a while and
I've felt the need to show gratitude because of it.
For example, I spoke to the information broker...

column1:
鉱山の町キノザを象徴する大温泉
労働者から富裕層まで男女問わず広く愛される
レスタニア随一の保養地である。３種ある浴室は
それぞれ内装や泉質が異なり、誰もが一度は
最高級の湯を夢見る
column2:
The great hot spring that symbolizes the mining town of Kinoza, loved by both men and women, from laborers to the wealthy. 
It is the finest resort in Lestania. 
There are three types of baths, each with different interiors and spring qualities, and everyone dreams of experiencing the highest quality hot spring at least once.

column1:
いつもは立ち入りが禁じられている精霊の地への門
が、フィンダムの各族長合意の下、開かれた
　精霊の地を越え、芯なる樹の内部を進み、その中心
部の芯脈と呼ばれる組織を原始の雫で浄化してやれ
ば、フィンダムの苦難は終わるはずなのだ
　しかし、封印されていた葉脈周辺にまで侵食魔が入
り込んでおり、まずはその掃討を先に行うことになっ
たとのこと
　ここに至り、無理は禁物、たとえ遠回りでも確実な
道を歩むべし
column2:
The gate to the sacred land of spirits, which is usually forbidden to enter, has been opened under the agreement of the tribe leaders in Phindym. 
If we cross the land of spirits, advance through the core of the central tree, and purify the tissue called the "Core Vein" with primeval drops, Phindym's hardships should come to an end.

However, the corrupting infection has penetrated to the surroundings of the sealed veins, so first we must carry out its eradication.

At this point, it is crucial to proceed with caution and take the most reliable path, even if it means making a detour.

column1:
オーク軍に対抗するため建造された大砦
統率レオ、副隊長ヴァネッサが率いるこの砦は
覚者隊によって守られ、北部からのオーク進軍
阻止の要となっている。また《ファイター》として
研鑽を目指す者にとっても重要な拠点である
column2:
The fortress, constructed to counter the Orc army.
Led by Commander Leo and Vice Commander Vanessa, it is defended by the Arisen Corps and serves as a crucial stronghold to halt the Orc's advance from the north. 
It is also an important base for those aspiring to become Fighters.

column1:
オーク軍に対抗するため建造された大砦
統率レオ、副隊長ヴァネッサが率いるこの砦は
覚者隊によって守られ、北部からのオーク進軍
阻止の要となっている。また《ファイター》として
研鑽を目指す者にとっても重要な拠点である
column2:
The fortress, constructed to counter the Orc army.
Led by Commander Leo and Vice Commander Vanessa, it is defended by the Arisen Corps and serves as a crucial stronghold to halt the Orc's advance from the north. 
It is also an important base for those aspiring to become Fighters.

column1:
アッカー家が南西方面からの敵を迎え撃つために
建造した砦。“悪しき竜”が現れてからは魔軍の拠点
として使われている。オークたちが西方で集めた
食料や物資の集積場と考えられており、周辺には
防衛点が点在している
column2:
The fortress built by the Acre family to fend off enemies from the southwest. 
It is now being used as a stronghold for the Demon Army since the appearance of the "Evil Dragon." 
It is believed to be a gathering place for food and supplies collected by the Orcs in the west, and there are defense points scattered around.

column1:
ディアマンテスが封じられた元・王の間
レスタニアからメルゴダが切り離されて後も
その影響力は大きく、力までも完全に
封じることはできなかった
column2:
The former king's space where Diamantes was sealed.
Even after Mergoda was separated from Lestania, its influence remained significant and its power could not be completely sealed.

column1:
かつての首都、錬金術師が治めたメルゴダが復活し
た。送り込まれたアーク内の装置と捧げられた命はす
べて都市の復活に使われたのだ
　そのメルゴダへクラウスが旅立っていった。到着
後、向こうで暮らす錬金術師とも相まみえたらしい
　名はテオドール。ディアマンテスと敵対する錬金術
師がいたとは想定外だった。彼らは戦力を必要として
おり、その相談をわたしに持ちかけてきた。異存があ
ろうはずはない
　これでレオが正気のままに協力してくれれば申し分
ないのだが
column2:
The former capital, Mergoda, ruled by alchemists, has been revived. All the devices sent into the Ark and the lives sacrificed were used for the city's revival.
Klaus set off for Mergoda. After arriving, he seems to have encountered alchemists living there.

His name is Theodor. It was unexpected to encounter alchemists who oppose Diamantes. They are in need of reinforcements and have approached me for advice. I have no objections.

If only Leo would cooperate while still in his right mind, there would be no problems.

column1:
テゴル川河岸にある治水路
旧時代に作られた水路の中で、ガルドノック砦に
近いことからいち早く魔物に占拠された
内部は汚水が溢れ、封鎖された当時から酷い状況
だったという。使えるものがあるかは不明
column2:
The flood control ditch on the banks of the Tegor River.
Among the old waterways created during ancient times, it was one of the first to be occupied by monsters due to its proximity to Gardnox Fortress. 
The interior was filled with dirty water and has been in a terrible condition since it was sealed off. 
It is unknown if there is anything usable inside.

column1:
最後の戦いは、壮絶を極めました
侵食の悪魔――
相手はまさに、その言葉にふさわしい怪物でした
column2: The final battle was truly epic. The demon of infection—our adversary was undoubtedly a monster befitting those words.

column1:
周辺を荒らす悪鬼たちが群れる岩窟
ホボリックの小鬼達と対立するゴブリン集団
のほか、凶悪な人喰い鬼もこの洞窟をねぐら
にしている
column2:
The evil demons that rampage in the surrounding areas flock to the cavern. 
In addition, there is a goblin group that opposes the Hobolic goblins. 
Furthermore, brutal man-eating demons also make this cave their lair.

column1:
普通の人間には入口を見ることすらできない
世界の淵辺にあたるとされる空間の深層部
この空間がどのようにして成り立ち、どこに
続いていくのか未だ知る者はいない
column2:
The entrance is not even visible to ordinary people. 
It is the deep part of a space considered to be the edge of the world. 
No one yet knows how this space is formed or where it leads.

column1:
セラー湖の浜辺一帯は、昔使われていた船が
漂着し、打ち上げられた船墓場がある。偵察隊
の報告によれば、その付近で多数の青トカゲが出現
し、さらには湖面に尖った背びれが見えたという
引き続き、調査が必要だろう
column2: The entire beach area of Lake Cera is a ship graveyard where old ships that used to be have drifted and washed ashore. According to the reconnaissance team's report, a large number of blue lizards have appeared in the vicinity, and furthermore, pointed dorsal fins were seen on the surface of the lake. Continued investigation will be necessary.

column1: 敵はあわてて逃げ出した！
column2: The enemy panicked and ran away!

column1:
助真の魔眼、弱体魔弓による
シークレットコア出現時間が大幅に延長される
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に出現時間がより延長</COL>
column2:
The duration that secret cores revealed by Magick Eye: True Aid
are exposed is greatly extended.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases the duration.</COL>

column1: メガド王宮層のウルテカ山岳東部への扉が解放されました
column2: The door to the Eastern Urteca Mountains in the Megado Royal Layer has been unlocked

column1: 扉には鍵がかかっている――

扉は固く閉ざされており
開きそうにない
column2:
The door is firmly shut.
Unlikely to be opened.

column1:
――扉は閉ざされている――
メンバー全員が集まらなければ
この先へは進めません
メンバーを招集しますか？
column2:
The door is closed.
You can proceed ahead if you gather the party.
Do you want to begin gathering party?

column1:
――扉は閉ざされている――
リーダーアクションがなければ
この先へは進めません
column2:
The door is closed.
Cannot proceed ahead without the leader.

column1:
“芯なる樹”の患部周辺に入り込んだ魔物どもの掃
討はひと段落し、ガラダと娘による浄化が始まった。
どれほどの時間がかかるものか想像もつかないが、白
竜の覚者たちはこの間に連戦の疲れを癒やしてもらい
たい
　さて、気になるのは時折聞こえるという竜らしき咆
哮、そしてロイグの行方だ
column2:
The demons that had penetrated the area around the "Core Tree have been temporarily suppressed, and the purification process by Gearóid and his daughter has begun.
It's hard to imagine how much time it will take, but the White Dragon Arisen would like to use this time to recover from the consecutive battles.

Now, what is of interest is the occasional dragon-like roar that can be heard, and the whereabouts of Loeg.

column1:
関所を守るように魔軍の大隊が留まっている拠点
設置された多数の大砲は解放軍の戦力を大幅に削いだ
運良く砲弾を逃れた兵もいたようだが、敵陣の
中で寡兵での戦いを強いられることとなったのは
寧ろ悲劇であった
column2:
The demon army's battalion is stationed at the stronghold, as if guarding a checkpoint. 
The numerous cannons that were set up significantly depleted the liberation army's forces. 
Some fortunate soldiers managed to dodge the cannonballs, but they were forced into a battle with few troops within enemy lines. 
It was a tragedy.

column1:
遺跡をそのまま活用した魔軍の拠点
しばらく出入りが途絶えた後も本拠点から
魔軍が進行するなどの様子から、一時的な
滞在ではなく、この場で一通りの生活が
できるように設計されているものと思われる
column2:
The demon army's base, which has been constructed by utilizing ruins as is. 
From the fact that the demon army continues to advance even after there has been no activity for a while, it is believed that this base is designed for not just temporary stays, but for living a complete life here after all.

column1:
魔軍が休息地として利用している岩洞
入口からは想像がつかないほど大きく開けた内部
空間は一見休むに最適かと思えるが、じめじめと
しており、スライムなども発生しやすい。魔物ならば
いざ知らず人間はここで休む気にはなれないだろう
column2:
The demon army is using the cave as a resting place. 
The interior, which is much larger than one would imagine from the entrance, seems like an ideal place to rest at first glance. However, it is damp and prone to slime and other creatures. 
While demons may not mind, humans would not feel inclined to rest here.

column1:
《芯なる樹》の最深部
侵食による影響が出るまでは、精霊竜との
謁見などはこの場所で行われていた
精霊竜の守りとして選ばれた者たちが控えていた
集いの間と隣接している
column2:
The deepest part of the "Core Tree".
Until the effects of corruption took hold, meetings with the Spirit Dragon were held in this location.
Those chosen as guardians of the Spirit Dragon awaited in the adjacent Gathering Hall.

column1:
この度の魔物は強敵でしたが
それ以上に苦戦しました
ベンジャミン様の動きが鈍く、我々が
それを庇っていたためです
column2: The creatures we faced this time were formidable foes, but what made it even more challenging was that Master Benjamin's movements were slow, and we were protecting him.

column1:
この森の最奥で待ち構えていた魔物は
一度対峙した記憶のある魔物――
その腕力は相変わらず脅威でしたが
危なげなく突破することができました
column2: The creature that lay in wait at the deepest part of this forest was a creature I had once faced before. Its strength remained as formidable as ever, but we were able to overcome it without much trouble.

column1:
王家に仕えるハイセプター、キルスティが住む小屋
魔物によって民が苦しむアッカーシェランを憂い
秘術であるハイセプターの戦闘術を世に広めんと
慣れぬあばら家で暮らしているらしい
column2:
The cottage where Kirsty, serving the royal family, lives.
She worries about Acre Selund, where the people suffer due to monsters.
Thus, she endeavors to spread the combat techniques of the High Scepter, a secret art. 
It seems that she lives in an unfamiliar, rundown house.

column1:
侵食が拡がっているほか、それ以前からも盗賊に
よってひどく荒らされた形跡が生々しく残る
活性化したデーモンが巣食っており、侵食によって
さらに凶暴化した状態で跋扈している
column2:
The corruption is spreading, and there are clear signs of extensive damage caused by bandits even before that. 
Demons have taken up residence and are rampaging in a more aggressive state due to the corruption.

column1:
葉脈の侵食は想定を遥かに超えて進んでおり、用意
していた原始の雫では足りないことが判明。原始の雫
の入手が難しいことから、万事休すと思われたが、状
況に対処する精神を手に入れたセシリーたちは、さら
なる原始の雫の入手に故郷の未来を賭けることにした
　関係者が努力、尽力した結果、原始の雫は集まった
が、またロイグが現れた。実際に戦ったものの話によ
ると、ロイグは黒騎士に意識を乗っ取られた状態で、
まるで捨て駒のように使われたそうだ
　思えば哀れな男だ。せめてわたしだけでも、彼の心
情に寄り添ってやろうと思う
　さて、こうして“芯なる樹”の治療は開始されたわ
けだが、精霊竜の治療は、悲しいかな、間に合わなか
ったようだ。これにより覚者たちは重い責務を背負う
ことになった。こればかりは代わってやることもでき
ないし、ねぎらいの言葉も空々しく聞こえることだろ
う
column2:
The corruption has spread far beyond expectations, and it has been revealed that the available Primeval Drops were not sufficient. Due to the difficulty in obtaining more Primeval Drops, it seemed like all hope was lost. However, Cecily and her companions, who possess the determination to confront the situation, decided to stake the future of their homeland on acquiring additional Primeval Drops.
Thanks to the efforts and dedication of those involved, the Primeval Drops were successfully gathered. However, Loeg appeared once again. According to accounts of those who actually engaged in battle, Loeg was in a state of being controlled by the Black Knight, used like a disposable pawn.

He truly is a pitiful man. I vow to at least empathize with his emotions.

And so, the treatment of the "Core Tree" has begun. Unfortunately, the treatment of the Spirit Dragon, to our great sorrow, did not finish in time. This places a heavy burden on the Arisen. There is no way to substitute or ease this responsibility, and words of encouragement can only sound empty.

column1:
森林奥地へ続く山道の崩落が除かれた
これで、さらに深い樹林に踏み入ることも可能に
なった。奥地は秘境のため、十分準備をして
向かうべきだろう
column2:
The collapsed mountain path that leads to the depths of the forest has been cleared away. 
With this, it is now possible to venture further into the dense woods. 
As the interior is an uncharted territory, it would be advisable to make thorough preparations before heading there.

column1:
白竜により、かつて大地から切り離された都
レスタニアとは隔てられた異界に漂い、時の流れも
異なっている。現在は地上で見られなくなった
錬金技術が随所にほどこされ、秘術で生み出された
錬魔は今も亡都を守護している
column2:
The city once cut off from the earth by The White Dragon.
Now drifts in a different realm, no longer seen in Lestania.
Time flows differently here.
Alchemized technology, which has disappeared from the surface, is still present throughout, and the city is protected by guardian spirits created through secret spells.

column1:
白竜により、かつて大地から切り離された都
レスタニアとは隔てられた異界に漂い、時の流れも
異なっている。現在は地上で見られなくなった
錬金技術が随所にほどこされ、秘術で生み出された
錬魔は今も亡都を守護している
column2:
The city once cut off from the earth by The White Dragon.
Now drifts in a different realm, no longer seen in Lestania.
Time flows differently here.
Alchemized technology, which has disappeared from the surface, is still present throughout, and the city is protected by guardian spirits created through secret spells.

column1:
ファーラナ遺跡の周辺にある円形遺跡
在りし日は戦士たちが武を競う闘技場として
使用されていたらしいが、当時の柱などは
ほとんど倒壊してしまっているため
現在は特に注目されることもない
column2:
The circular ruins near the Farana Ruins.
Used to be a battlefield where warriors competed, but most of the columns from that time have collapsed, so there is currently no particular attention given to it.

column1: 文字はかすれていて読めない
column2: The characters are faint and cannot be read.

column1:
代々のアッカー家にて竜にならなかった者たちが
眠る墓地。アッカー家以外でも友好関係にあった
豪族も埋葬が許されている
かつては財宝の数々が死者を飾っていたが、ほとんどが
オークとゴブリンに持ち去られた。南北の盗賊団は
関与を否定してる。
column2:
The cemetery where those from the Acre family, who did not become dragons, lie sleeping. 
Even noble families who had a friendly relationship with the Acre family are allowed to be buried here. 
Once, numerous treasures adorned the deceased, but most were taken away by orcs and goblins. 
The northern and southern bandits deny involvement.

column1:
中規模の採石場として使われていた洞窟
魔物が侵入し、作業中の人員が襲われるという
悲劇が起きた。命からがら逃げだした者はすぐに
洞窟を封鎖したが、その時まだ中からは助けを
求める声が響いていたという
column2:
The cave, which was used as a medium-sized quarry, was invaded by enemies that tragically attacked the workers. 
The survivors quickly sealed off the cave, but at that time, cries for help could still be heard from inside.

column1:
野生動物が棲みついている洞窟
特にめぼしい資源があるわけでもない場所
だったが、なぜか近年にわかに「奥に宝物が
隠されている」という噂が流れた
column2:
The cave where wild animals reside is not particularly known for any valuable resources.
However, for some reason, a rumor has recently spread saying that treasure is hidden deep within.

column1:
捕えたオークから尋問によって全てを吐かせた
<NPC 681>とオーク軍の機密についての証言

“ メガド陥落は、悲観した<NPC 681>侯爵の
  手引きによって引き起こされた事件であり
  陥落後も彼はオーク軍と取引し
  捕虜の統括に対する報酬を受け取っていた ”

という旨の内容となっている
column2:
The capture of <NPC 681> and interrogation of the orc revealed the following confidential information:

'Megado's fall was an event instigated through the guidance of the despairing Marquis <NPC 681>. Even after the fall, he continued to deal with the Orc army and received rewards for overseeing the prisoners.'

column1:
ハイデル平原とミスリウ森林を繋ぐ橋は以前の
水害で損壊したが、テルで資材手配が可能
となり、ようやく修復された
これでポーン郷、リンウッド方面との往来は
回復するだろう
column2:
The bridge that formerly had connected the Hidell
Plains and Mysree Forest was destroyed by flood
damage, but resources can be arranged at Tel Village
to repair the broken bridge. With this, the traffic to
and from Lynwood will be restored.

column1: 封鎖されたエリアが解放された――
column2: The blocked area was opened up--

column1:
グリッテン砦東にある廃墟の地下室
バートランドは全域にオークが入りこんで
いるため、こういった場所は特に警戒する
必要がある
column2:
The basement of the ruins east of Gritten Fort.
Betland is infested with orcs throughout the area, so in these places one needs to be especially vigilant.

column1:
ハイデル平原、倒壊した家の地下室
周囲に猿獣が群れていることが多いため
内部にも入り込んでいる可能性が高い
column2:
The basement of a collapsed house in the Hidell
Plains. Brute apes are often seen flocking around the
cellar, so it is highly probable they are also inside.

column1:
オーク軍が拠点とする北西の荒地
バートランド平原以北は魔物の支配する厳しい地
であるが、ドラワンの民は故郷を守り今日まで暮ら
してきた。また、北にかかる巨大な橋は《禁じられ
た地》に続くとされ、この地の者さえ近づかない
column2:
The barren land in the northwest that serves as the base for the Orc army.
The area north of Betland Plains is a harsh land ruled by enemies, but the people of Drawan have managed to protect their homeland and live to this day. Furthermore, it is said that the enormous bridge to the north leads to the "Forbidden Land," a place even the locals dare not approach.

column1:
オーク軍が拠点とする北西の荒地
バートランド平原以北は魔物の支配する厳しい地
であるが、ドラワンの民は故郷を守り今日まで暮ら

た地》に続くとされ、この地の者さえ近づかない
column2:

column1: 夜の訪れリトルブラックグリフィン
column2: The arrival of night, Little Black Griffin

column1:
東ザンドラ廃墟群と呼ばれる亡都の周辺都市は
いまだわずかに当時の生活様式が見て取れ、錬金
遺物も発掘される。廃墟の中には屋内や
地下へ入れる遺構も多いが、魔物や掠奪者
も居付いているため危険が伴う
column2: The area surrounding the ruins known as the East Zandora Ruins still retains some remnants of the lifestyle of that time, and alchemized artifacts are also excavated. Within the ruins, there are many structures that lead indoors or underground, but they are also inhabited by enemies and looters, so there is danger involved.

column1:
ゴブリンから手に入れた古文書は智の宝庫、ドリー
ド城から盗み出されたもので、記されていたのは「命
の器」に関することだった
　器に収められた命は様々な用途に供することが可能
となる
　当然、わたしはその器の存在を知っていた。しか
し、白竜のためとは言え、器を使うことは許されない
と考えていた。器は禁じられた知識と技の結晶なの
だ。選択の余地はない
　３２４年前、当時の神殿に集う知者たちはその一連
の知識を封じることにした。以来、レスタニアはその
忌まわしい知識に頼ることなく年月を重ねてきたの
だ。その決断と３００年以上従ってきた意志は尊重さ
れなくてはならない
　一方、クラウスたちは器を持ち帰るために多大なる
犠牲を払った。多くの騎士たちの命が失われてしまっ
たのだ
　弟子かわいさに騎士団の派遣を依頼したのはわたし
自身だ。責任を感じずにはいられない
　器には騎士の身体から流れ出た命が納められてい
た。命を白竜に捧げるというレオに強く反対する資格
は、わたしにはない
　黙認することで道を踏み外したとのそしりがあれば
甘んじて受ける覚悟だ
column2:
The ancient document obtained from a goblin is a treasure trove of knowledge named Dori. It was stolen from Dreed Castle and contained information about the "Vessel of Life".
The life contained within the vessel can be used for various purposes.
Naturally, I was aware of the existence of the vessel. However, even for the sake of the White Dragon, I believed it was forbidden to use the vessel. The vessel is the crystallization of forbidden knowledge and skills. There is no choice.

324 years ago, the scholars gathered at the temple at that time decided to seal that knowledge. Since then, Lestania has continued to age without relying on that detested knowledge. The decision and willpower that has been followed for over 300 years must be respected.

On the other hand, Klaus paid a great sacrifice to bring back the vessel. The lives of many knights were lost.
I myself requested the dispatch of the knights because of my affection for the disciples. I cannot help but feel responsible.
The vessel contained the life that flowed from the bodies of the knights. I have no right to strongly oppose Leo, who dedicates his life to the White Dragon.

If there is any blame for tacitly allowing myself to deviate from the path, I am prepared to accept it.

column1:
ウォリアーの斬属性によって
与えるダメージ量が増加する
※攻撃時や、ステータス適用の
物理属性と一致する場合、効果を発揮する
column2: The amount of damage inflicted by the Warrior's Slash attribute increases. *Effective when attacking or when matching the physical attribute of the status application.

大迷路と化している

The Underground Waterway that connects the Zandora Wastelands from east to west.
Was originally constructed to transport water from Lake Cera to Mergoda. 
However, it has now transformed into a terrifying labyrinth infested with dangerous enemies.

column1:
オークの専門家が人語に翻訳してくれた
オーク軍の密通文書
“ オーク軍は要請に応え、
　メガドに援軍を手配した ”
という旨の内容
column2:
The Orc specialist has translated the confidential communication documents of the Orc army into human language.
"Orc Forces responded to the request and arranged for reinforcements to be sent to Megado."

column1:
城塞都市メガドの防衛の要となるニルビリス大橋と
その上に建つ関所。魔軍側も本関所の重要性は
理解しているらしく、防衛のために随時戦力を
割いている。関所の開閉については、魔軍の
集結具合と連動しているらしい
column2:
The Nilviris Bridge, which serves as a crucial defense point for the fortress city of Megado, accompanied by a checkpoint built on top of it. 
It appears that the Demon Army also understands the importance of this checkpoint, as they are constantly dedicating forces to its defense. 
The opening and closing of the checkpoint seem to be synchronized with the gathering of the Demon Army.

column1:
ミスリウ森林奥地の湿地林
イニアス湖を中心としたこの森は、リンウッド周辺
とはまた別の表情を見せる。湖の周囲には神秘的
な遺跡が点在し、ここが人とは異なる者の生活圏で
あったことを今に伝えている
column2:
The Mysree Forest, located deep in the wetland forest, 
presents a different facade from the surroundings of Lynwood.
Mysterious ruins are scattered around the lake, 
telling us that this place was once a habitat for beings different from humans.

column1:
ミスリウ森林奥地の湿地林
イニアス湖を中心としたこの森は、リンウッド周辺
とはまた別の表情を見せる。湖の周囲には神秘的
な遺跡が点在し、ここが人とは異なる者の生活圏で
あったことを今に伝えている
column2:
The Mysree Forest, located deep in the wetland forest, 
presents a different facade from the surroundings of Lynwood.
Mysterious ruins are scattered around the lake, 
telling us that this place was once a habitat for beings different from humans.

column1: 憲兵が見張っている――この先には行けなさそうだ
column2: The Military Police are on the lookout-- I don't think we can go any further.

column1:
亡都メルゴダの元は市街地であった区画
整理され美しかったであろう街並みの
様子は、遺跡群からも見てとれる
今なおメルゴダの民が暮らす地でもある
column2: The Mergoda Ruins was originally a district in the city, which must have been organized and beautiful. This can also be seen from the remnants where the people of Mergoda still live.

column1:
ティネス砦の奪還に成功した解放軍
しかし――
魔軍の占領によって大食堂は瓦礫の山と化し
かつての姿を完全に失っていた――
食料も底を尽き
荒れ果てた大食堂で独り
絶望の淵に立つ料理番“キャリー”
果たして、そんな彼女を救う手立ては
あるのだろうか――
column2:
The Liberation Army successfully recaptured Fort Thines. 
However, due to the occupation by the Demon Army, the cafeteria had turned into a pile of rubble, completely losing its former appearance. 
With food running out, the cook "Carrie" stood alone in the desolate cafeteria, on the brink of despair. 
Will there be any way to save her in such a situation?

column1:
展望城の奪還に成功した解放軍
しかし――
魔軍の残党は、城外の防衛区画へ逃げ込み
今もなお、籠城を続けていた――
展望城の防衛にも十分な戦力を割けない
解放軍には、その奪還は不可能――
そう思われていた
ただ、そんな状況を打破できる人物が一人
解放軍にいるという――
天才参謀官“ソネル”
展望城奪還に尽力した覚者は
彼と共に“不可能な奪還任務”に挑むこととなる
column2:
The Liberation Army succeeded in retaking Lookout Castle. 
However, the remnants of the Demon Army escaped into the outer defense zone of the castle and continue to hold their ground. 
It was believed that the Liberation Army could not possibly reclaim the castle as they could not allocate sufficient forces for its defense. However, there is one person who can break through such a situation. 
A genius staff officer named Sonel, who is a member of the Liberation Army. 
The Arisen who played a significant role in the recapture of Lookout Castle will join him in the "impossible recapture mission."

column1: ハイデル関所が開放されました
column2: The Heidell Checkpoint has been opened.

column1:
黄金竜の攻撃により、敵の特定の攻撃を中断する
攻撃を中断すると＜破滅の力＞の蓄積量が減少する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に破滅の力の減少量がより増加</COL>
column2:
The Golden Dragon attacks, trying to interrupt a specific
attack of the enemy. If the interruption succeeds, the
"Power of Destruction" is lowered.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Further decreases the Destruction power.</COL>
The Ghost of the First King

補給担当のジョナスが砦に配属されました
column2: The Fort Gritten main gate has opened, and supply officer Jonas has been assigned to the fort.
The Final Battle of the Royal Capital

column1:
フィンダム大陸中部に広がる平原
起伏が多いフィンダムにおいて、ファーラナ平原は
なだらかで活用しやすい地形をしている
また、他の地域と比較すると侵食の度合は
緩やかなようで侵食魔の数も少ない
column2:
The Farana Plains, located in the central part of the Phindym continent, are characterized by gently rolling terrain, making them easy to utilize in the varied landscape of Phindym.
Furthermore, compared to other regions, the level of corruption is relatively low, resulting in fewer corrupted creatures.

注意すべきドレッドエイプ、《唸り猿》が
縄張りにしている廃屋
廃屋の周囲は食い散らかされた動物の残骸が
散乱しており、恐ろしい上非常に臭い――
column2:
The Dread Ape, known as the "Howler Ape," has taken over the abandoned house as its territory. 
The surroundings of the abandoned house are littered with the remains of devoured animals, making it both terrifying and extremely foul-smelling.

column1: 竜力の波動が激しさを増している――！
column2: The Dragon Force is becoming more intense!

column1: 獣の将が魔物を呼び寄せようとしている――
column2: The Beast Master is summoning enemies.

column1: アーク　裏層　宝物庫
アーク　裏層　貯蔵所
アーク　裏層　危険区域
column2: The Ark's Lower Level: Dangerous Area

column1:
覚者、騎士団、神殿で祈った人々、メルゴダの人々
が知勇を出し合い、ついにディアマンテスを命の器に
封じるに至った
　いや、表現を抑える必要はないだろう。高らかに宣
言しようではないか。我々は勝利した。最強の敵に勝
利したのだ。なんと素晴らしい日だろう
column2:
The Arisen, the Knight's Order, the people who prayed in the temple, and the people of Mergoda, all combined their knowledge and courage, and finally succeeded in sealing away Diamantes in the Vessel of Life.
No, there is no need to hold back in expressing ourselves. Let us declare it loudly. We have achieved victory. We have defeated the strongest enemy. What a wonderful day it is.

column1:
島の調査に赴いていた覚者が新たな難敵に遭遇した
ようだ。何か良くないことの前触れなのだろうか。い
や、おそらく、その通りなのだろう
　フィンダムに乗り込んで、侵食の元凶を見つけ出し
て排除すべしという声は以前からあったが、実現に向
けて動き出す時が来たようだ
　追記：白竜、そしてわたしの直轄である特命部隊の
人選を悪し様に言う者は少なくなかった。しかし、そ
の者たちは今回のガルドリンの英雄的な行動をどう考
えるのだろう。エリオットの義理に篤い言動をどう考
えるのだろうか
column2:
The Arisen who was investigating the island seems to have encountered a new formidable enemy. Is this perhaps a sign of something unfavorable? No, it is quite likely that's the case.
The voice calling to board Phindym and locate and eliminate the source of corruption has been there for a while, but it seems that the time to take action has come.

Additional note: There were many who criticized the selection of the White Dragon and the special task force under my direct control. However, I wonder how those individuals perceive Gurdolin's heroic actions this time? How do they regard Elliot's sincere words and behaviors?

column1:
フィンダムに到着した覚者たちは、早速拠点を定め
活動を開始した
　かの大地と命を育んでいるのは“芯なる樹”を中心
とする竜力の浄化と循環の構造だ。その機能が失われ
大陸全体に汚れた竜力が巡るようになってしまったら
しい
　原因がわかっているのであれば、解法も自ずと見え
てくるはずだ
　フィンダムにはわたしが最も信頼する覚者とその盟
友たちを派遣した。あの者たちなら、期待以上の成果
を持ち帰ってくれるだろう
column2:
The Arisen who arrived at Phindym immediately established a base and began their activities.
The core of the land, nurturing life itself, is the structure of purifying and circulating Dragon Force centered around the "Core Tree".
It seems that this function has been lost, causing polluted Dragon Force to circulate throughout the entire continent.
If we understand the cause, the solution should become clear.

I have dispatched the Arisen I trust the most to Phindym, along with their allies.
I believe they will bring back results beyond our expectations.

column1:
覚者たちは厳しい戦いの報償として、手に入れた竜
力を使ってセシリーの治療を試みることに決め、実行
した
　竜力は本来大地を養生する癒しの力だ。その力を注
ぎ込まれたセシリーの傷は、驚くほどの早さで完全に
回復した
　治ったのは傷だけではなかった。セシリーの記憶が
元に戻ったのだ。我々のかけがえのない友セシリーは
フィンダムとともに生きる精霊竜ウィルミアの覚者だ
った
　我々はフィンダムの未来の竜を匿っていたことにな
る。黒騎士の目的も見えてくるというものだ
column2:
The Arisen decided to use the Dragon Force they obtained as a reward for their fierce battle to attempt to heal Cecily, and they executed their plan. Dragon Force is originally a healing power that nourishes the earth. The wounds on Cecily's body, infused with this power, healed completely astonishingly quickly.
Not only were the wounds healed, but also Cecily's memories returned. Our irreplaceable friend Cecily turned out to be an Arisen, the partner of the Spirit Dragon Willmia, living alongside Fionn.

We ended up harboring a future dragon of Phindym. It seems that the Black Knight's goal is also becoming clear.

column1:
遺跡の奥底に坐していたあの魔物――
レスタニアに生息しているそれと姿形は似ているけど
より凶暴で、俊敏だったように感じます
column2:
That demon dwelling within the depths of the ruins...
It looks similar to those that inhabit Lestania, but feels far more
ferocious and agile.

column1:
それとは別に、見知った魔物も見かけました
同様の進化を遂げたのか、何らかの手段で
向こうからこちらへ渡って来たのか――
column2:
That aside, I also saw a monster I recognized.
Have you evolved in a similar way by some means?
Did you cross over to here from there...?

column1:
救っていただき、ありがとうございます
次こそは必ずお役に――！
column2: Thank you for saving me. It will not happen again.

column1:
救っていただき、ありがとうございます
次こそは必ずお役に――！
column2: Thank you for saving me. It will not happen again.

column1: タラーテ集水路　危険区域
タラーテ集水路　最深部
タラーテ集水路　中央通路
証言：怪しげな行動をとる<NPC 691>
証言：メガドに出没するオークたち
証言：オーク軍の機密情報
column2: Testimony: Confidential Information of the Orc Army

column1:
ある兵士から聞いた、メガド占領時に
<NPC 681>が行った英雄的行為の証言
“ ナヴィド侯爵は死の危険を冒し、果敢にも
  人間への残虐な仕打ちを止めるよう
  オーク軍と交渉した
  その後も市民の統率者として、オーク側との
  橋渡しを行い、犠牲者を抑える功績を残す ”
という旨の内容
column2:
Testimony of the heroic deeds performed by <NPC 681> during the Megado occupation, as told by a soldier:
"Lord Navido bravely risked his life and daringly negotiated with the Orc army to put an end to their cruel treatment of humans. Even after that, as a leader of the citizens, he acted as a bridge between the Orc side, leaving behind the achievement of minimizing casualties."

column1: テスタメントスケイル【飾】
テスタメントスケイル
テスタメントスケイル
テスタメントスケイル
テスタメントスケイル
テスタメントスケイル

Steps in with a blade strike that sends
the target aloft. Additional button presses
throw and detonate a store of powder.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases number of hits.</COL>

とっさの回避手段としても有効

LV.６でモーション変化／追加入力で追加攻撃
敵の攻撃を直前回避時、追加攻撃の威力上昇</COL>
column2:

while delivering a slashing blow.

column1:

から発動することができる（連続では行えない）
攻撃を受けとめるとリベンジゲージが大きく増加
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にリベンジゲージ蓄積値上昇
LV.６でのけぞり、吹き飛び中でも発動可能</COL>
column2:

Can be used out of many different actions. Upon successfully 
receiving an attack, the revenge gauge will fill greatly.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases revenge gauge accumulation.
LV.6: Can be used even during stagger and knockback.</COL>

Increases the Revenge Gauge a bit when hit by an attack.

column2:
Status effect accumulation on yourself decreases
when you are attacking enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases status effect accumulation.</COL>

column1:
ダウ渓谷にそびえ立つ古城廃墟
３００年前は騎士団長が城主を務めレスタニアの
守りを担っていたが、白竜が墜ちた後に捨てられ
今に至る。内部には住みついた魔物だけでなく
旧時代の遺物も多く残されているらしい
column2:
Standing tall in the Dowe Valley is the ancient castle ruin.
300 years ago, it was the stronghold of the knight commander who protected Lestania.
However, it was abandoned after the fall of the White Dragon, and it remains deserted to this day. 
Inside, not only are there lurking demons, but also numerous relics from the past era are said to be preserved.

column1:
ダウ渓谷にそびえ立つ古城廃墟
３００年前は騎士団長が城主を務めレスタニアの
守りを担っていたが、白竜が墜ちた後に捨てられ
今に至る。内部には住みついた魔物だけでなく
旧時代の遺物も多く残されているらしい
column2:
Standing tall in the Dowe Valley is the ancient castle ruin.
300 years ago, it was the stronghold of the knight commander who protected Lestania.
However, it was abandoned after the fall of the White Dragon, and it remains deserted to this day. 
Inside, not only are there lurking demons, but also numerous relics from the past era are said to be preserved.

column1:
キンガル峡谷に悠然と佇む古代神殿
数百年前に遺棄されたものの、当時満ち満ちていた
竜力によって未だ壮麗な姿をそのままにしている
遺棄された理由は、恐らく精霊竜自身が神殿よりも
《芯なる樹》の傍にあることを好んだためだろう
column2:
Standing gracefully in the Kingal Canyon, the ancient temple remains magnificent, even after being abandoned hundreds of years ago.
It still retains its grandeur, thanks to the Dragon Force that once thrived here. 
The reason for its abandonment was likely because the Spirit Dragon preferred to be near the "Core Tree" rather than the temple itself.

豪傑のスピアーダガー

ボルド鉱山とダウ渓谷の境には、南壁谷と
呼ばれる谷道があるが、その中ほどにあるのが
《南壁のひび》と呼ばれる洞窟である。採掘に
出向いた者がことごとく戻らなかったことから
キノザにより入り口は閉ざされた
column2:
Southern Wall Gorge, on the border between Volden Mines and Dowe Valley.
In the middle of that gorge is a cave known as the Southern Wall Fissure. Due to the fact that everyone who went to mine there never returned, the entrance was sealed by Kinoza.

暗黒の統べる地　南端

本来であれば、死して大地に還るはずの魂が
何らかの理由で炎をまとった影として徘徊する
ことがある。ここにはそのような魔物が集まりやすい
らしく、駆除しなければ集まる魔物の数は
増えるばかりだ
column2:
Souls that were supposed to return to the earth in death sometimes wander as shadows clad in flames for some reason. 
It seems that such creatures tend to gather here, and if they are not exterminated, the number of creatures that gather only increases.

森を抜けて展望城へと向かう兵士たちが
ことごとくこの周辺にて魔物の襲撃を受けている
どうやら人間を待ち伏せするに格好の場所
として魔軍に認識されているようだ
column2:
Soldiers heading towards Lookout Castle after passing through the forest have all been attacked by monsters in this area. 
It seems that this place has been recognized by the Demon Army as a perfect location to ambush humans.

column1:
錬金の秘術により敵の注意を引きうける策士
論理と錬成物質を用いて状態異常を操り、摂理を
超えた高い移動能力を駆使して敵戦力を散らす
column2:
Soldier who attracts the enemys' attention
using alchemy and high mobility.
Uses the secrets of alchemy to inflict and
manipulate status abnormalities.
The Trickster of the Battlefield.

column1: ソラースライザー 技
ソラースライザー 剛

ならばなぜ、情報屋がその存在を知っているのか？
そんな怪しい話、どうせ戯言に違いないと
たかをくくっていたが――
column2:
So pray tell, how does the information broker know of its existence?
Such a suspicious story, it must be a load of crap...

空中で剣を縦に振り下ろす
高所から行うことで威力が上昇する
column2:
Slash downwards while airborne, falling down onto the
enemy. Increased power at an increased height.

column1: ファイターの斬属性ダメージUP

拳を地面に突き立て、自身を囲むように
柱状の錬成物質を生成する。高所から行うことで
威力が上昇する。空中でも発動可能
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に錬成値の上昇
LV.６で錬成物質の生成回数増加（１→２）</COL>
column2:
Slam your fist into the ground and surround yourself
with pillars of alchemical metal. When performed
from high altitudes, the power of the attack rises.
Can be activated even while in the air.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases amount of stakes
planted upon contact.
LV.6: Increases the times the pillars raise (1→2).</COL>

column1:
渾身の力で大剣を地面に突き刺し、大地を揺るがす
地上ではボタンの長押し、空中では発動時の落下距離
により威力が上昇。倒れた状態の敵に対し真価を発揮
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で溜め段階上昇（１→２）</COL>
column2:
Slam the blade into the ground with the entire
body's might and shake the earth. Performing the skill
from high altitudes while in the air, or holding the
assigned button on the ground increases the damage of the skill.
Especially effective against downed enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of the skill.
LV.6: Increases maximum charge amount (1→2)</COL>

column1:
空中から多段ヒット性能を持つ振り下ろし攻撃を放つ
高所から行うことで威力が上昇する
column2:
Slam the blade downward while in the air,
delivering multiple hits.
Damage rises when performed from high altitudes.

骸骨砕きの特質錬石の欠片

グリンデュア対岸に位置する古代神殿の遺跡
内部は活性化したデーモンが多数巣食っている
ところどころにそう古くはない書籍などが
散乱しているところから、最近まで何らかの
施設として利用されていた様子が垣間見える
column2:
Situated across from Glyndwr, there are the remains of an ancient temple. 
The interior is inhabited by numerous active demons. 
Scattered throughout are relatively new books and materials, indicating that it was recently used as some kind of facility.

column1: ジンゲン組合宿　風啼き亭
