シンシアー・ブレード

この大陸にアッカー王家が誕生する遥か昔から
大地を蝕む強大な魔物が棲息していた――という
話は、アッカーシェランの国民ならば一度は
聞いたことがある昔話である。物語の結末は
「魔物は王によって地下深く封印された」となる
column2:
Since ancient times, there has been a tale that tells of powerful monsters residing in this land, where the Acre royal family was born. 
If you are a citizen of Acre Selund, you have surely heard this story once before. 
The conclusion of the tale is that "the monsters were sealed deep underground by the king."

column1:
ベンジャミン様の命でこの日記をつけるように
なってから、心の機微と出来事のつながりが
整理でき、人の感情が推測できるように
なってきた気がします――
column2:
Since I had begun to record Benjamin's life in this diary,
I feel it is now possible to organize the link between the subtleties of the mind,
and the events of one's life to better understand how they feel...

アッカーシェラン王家に連なる者、または王家の
ためにその力を尽くした英雄たちが眠る祠
王家の治める地の中でもラスニテ山麓との
縁が深い英雄たちが祀られ、死した後も
人々を見守っているという
column2: Shrine where the descendants of the Acre Selund royal family, or the heroes who devoted their power to the royal family, rest. Among the lands ruled by the royal family, it is said that the heroes who have a deep connection with the Rathnite Foothills are enshrined and continue to watch over the people even after their death.

column1: 恐ろしい力で封印されている――
精霊竜の大詠唱を封じた！
column2: Sealed the Spirit Dragon's Grand Chant!

column1:
モロー樹林北西部にある封鎖された森林
小さな集落がある穏やかな森だったものの
侵食の度合が激しく、人々も集落を捨てて
逃げ出している。ピクシーたちが集まる小屋も
あったが、侵食に飲み込まれてしまった
column2:
Sealed forest in the northwest of Morrow Forest. 
It was once a peaceful forest with a small village, but the level of corruption grew severe, causing the people to abandon the village and escape. 
There was also a cabin where the pixies gathered, but it too was swallowed up by the corruption.

column1: 闇の力によって封じられている
column2: Sealed by the power of darkness.

小さな群れを作って生活するサラマンダーだが
繁殖のため、一時的に大きな群れを成して
生活することもある。外敵から身を隠すことができ
適度な湿度・温度に保たれる洞穴などは
そのような場所に選ばれやすい
column2:
Salamanders live in small groups, but for breeding purposes, they occasionally form large herds and live together. 
They hide from predators in caves or other places where the humidity and temperature are kept at an appropriate level.

前方に猛ダッシュしつつ鋭い突き攻撃を放つ
突進距離に応じて威力が上昇する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で最大移動距離が延長／
突進距離最長時に敵のガード状態を崩す</COL>
column2:
Rushes at the target and visits a powerful blow
upon them. Damage increases the further you dash.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases maximum rush distance.
Breaks enemy guard when rushing at maximum range.</COL>

column1:
大盾を構え前方に突進し、進行線上の敵を吹き飛ばす
フォースゲージ１本以上の時、消費して技性能上昇
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で移動距離上昇／ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
Rush forward with your greatshield, blowing away enemies.
With more than 1 Force Gauge, the effect will increase.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases moving distance and number of hits.</COL>

column1:
《灯台下の古井戸》を覗き込んだ者が何か煌めく
ものを見たという噂が流れたが、古井戸の中には
投げ捨てられた廃棄物や動物の死骸などもどこかに
溜まっているであろうことから、内部に入ってまで
噂の元を探ろうとする者はいないようだ
column2:
Rumors have circulated that someone who peered into the "Lighthouse Old Well" saw something sparkling. 
However, since it is likely that waste and animal carcasses have accumulated somewhere inside the well, no one seems willing to enter and investigate the source of the rumors.

column1:
南部、水辺近くにあるエルフ族の住居跡
かつては水面に映る月が美しい場所であると
エルフ達の人気も高かったようだが、
今やその面影はない。水の運用に関しては
最も進んだ設備を備えていたらしい
column2:
Ruins of the Elves residence near the water's edge in the southern region. 
It used to be a beautiful place where the moon reflected on the water was highly admired by the Elves. 
However, now there is no trace of that beauty. 
It seems they had the most advanced facilities for managing water.

column1:
ダクレイム砦付近にある岩山の中に造られた遺跡
砦の付近という格好の場所にあるため、魔軍・人間
両勢力がこの遺跡を拠点として利用しようとしたが
共に最深部まで辿り着くことはできなかった
誰一人として生還者がいないため、その原因も不明
column2:
Ruins built inside a rocky mountain near Dacreim Fortress. 
It was a prime location, so both the Demon Army and the humans tried to use this ruin as their base. 
However, neither of them were able to reach the deepest part. 
There were no survivors, and the cause is also unknown.

column1:
属性の付与されたルイン・ブレードで
より敵を状態異常にかかりやすくする
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に状態異常値がより増加</COL>
column2:

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases status effect accumulation.</COL>

王都メガドの奪還に成功した解放軍
しかし――
メガドの市民は、支配者の圧政に怯え
街には不穏な気配が漂っていた――
市民に礼賛される絶対的支配者へ
密かに反旗を翻したレジスタンスと
そのリーダーである暗躍者“メフィス”
覚者は、メガドの人々の真の平穏を奪還するため
彼らと共に隠された闇へと挑むこととなる――
column2:
Royal Capital Megado successfully recaptured by the Liberation Army.
However, the citizens of Megado live in fear of the tyrannical rule of their oppressors,
and an unsettling atmosphere lingers in the city.
In secret opposition to the absolute ruler, a resistance group has risen, led by a manipulative figure known as Mephis.
To reclaim true peace for the people of Megado, the Arisen join forces with them, and together, they venture into the hidden darkness.

水獣が這い上がってくるのにもうってつけの
地形であり、周辺のくさむらを歩く際は
くれぐれも注意が必要
column2:
Riverbank with a gentle slope that leads down to the river. 
At first glance, it may seem like the perfect place to fetch water. 
However, it is a terrain that is ideal for water animals crawling up, so please be careful when walking through the surrounding grasslands.

column1: 捕らわれた同志の救出

メルゴダへ乗り込んだ者たちからの報告が届く。デ
ィアマンテスは街の一角に封じられているが、その封
印が、ほどなく内部から解かれそうな気配らしい
　そこでテオドールたちが立案したのは、外から積極
的に封印を解き、ディアマンテスに先制するという作
戦だった
　完全なる復活を遂げてしまえばディアマンテスの力
は計り知れない。彼らの作戦には一理ある。問題は、
事を一気に進めて、敵を圧倒することができるか否
か
　もし失敗した場合に予想される被害。判断を委ねら
れたわたしは大会議を召集することにした。検討を要
請するわけではない。覚悟を促すためだ
column2:
Reports are coming in from those who have boarded Mergoda. It seems that Diamantes is sealed in a corner of the city, but the seal is about to be broken from within.
In response, Theodore and his allies have devised a plan to actively break the seal from the outside and preempt Diamantes.

Once Diamantes achieves complete revival, its power will be immeasurable. There is some merit to their strategy. The question is whether they can proceed swiftly and overwhelm the enemy.

If the plan fails, the expected damage must be considered. As the one entrusted with the decision, I have decided to convene a grand council. It is not a request for discussion, but rather to encourage preparedness.

民間人が竜への敬意を示すために参拝する寺院
大変古くからあるため、一見すると廃墟のようだが
アッカーシェランの人間にとっては憧れの場でもある
聖職者たちが参拝者への対応に当たっていたが
現在は魔物に乗っ取られてしまい、この場を守る
者たちも完全に退避している
column2:
Private individuals visit the temple to show respect to the dragon. 
Despite its appearance of being in ruins at first glance, it is also a place of longing for the people of Acre Selund. 
Clergymen used to handle interactions with visitors, but the place has now been taken over by enemies. 
Those who protect this place have completely evacuated.

<PADM>by moving the left stick up and down<KEYM>with movement keys <KC MOVE_FORWARD><KC MOVE_BACKWARD></KEYM>.
Change attack range with <KC TOUCH>.

column1:
冒険の際はぜひお伴を！
作りたいものがあれば、何でもご要望を！
column2:
Please come along when you are on an adventure!
If there is something you want to make, request anything!

column1: 作業完了まで、もうしばし猶予を
column2: Please allow some more time until the completion of the task.

column1:
《聖遺の塔》付近にある広場
海から吹き込む風が周囲を囲む崖面に
当たることで複雑な気流を生み出している
気流に誘い込まれてか、風を好んでか
有翼の魔物の姿がよく確認される
column2:
Plaza near the Sage Tower Ruins
The wind blowing in from the sea creates complex air currents as it hits the surrounding cliffs.
Winged Beasts are often seen in this area, seemingly drawn by these air currents or perhaps attracted to the wind.

column1: プレイポイントショップ
プレイポイントショップ

地面に火薬を設置し、
遠方から導火線に着火して爆発させる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇／仕込み時間短縮
LV.６で攻撃ヒット数増加／爆風に風圧追加</COL>
column2:
Places an explosive on the ground to
be detonated from afar.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. Decreases charge time.
LV.6: Increases number of hits.
Adds wind pressure to the blast.</COL>

column1:
掌を地面に添え、振り上げると同時に
地を這う錬成物質の波を放つ
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に錬成値の上昇
LV.６で錬成物質の本数増加（３→５）／
敵を転倒させる効果追加</COL>
column2:
Place your palm on the ground and upon raising it,
create waves of alchemical substances that spike
up along the ground.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases amount of stakes
planted upon contact.
LV.6: Increases number of waves (3→5) and adds the
ability to juggle enemies.</COL>

column1:
乗った者を高所へ跳ね上げる効果を持つ
錬成式を地面に配置する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に錬成式の継続時間が延長
LV.６で空中にも設置可能になり、
空中に配置された場合は横方向に跳躍可能</COL>
column2:
Place an alchemical trampoline on the ground
that launches those who jump on it to high altitudes.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of the skill.
LV.6: Allows placement in the air. When placed
mid-air, you can be launched horizontally.</COL>

突如レスタニアの沖合に出現したフィンダム
大陸の一部。レスタニアに出現した侵食魔も
ここから飛来しており、この絶海の孤島が
“侵食”という脅威に対抗するための手がかりを
秘めていると予測される
column2:
Phindym suddenly appeared off the coast of Lestania. 
The invading corrupted creatures from the continent fly in from here.
It is predicted that this isolated island in the vast sea holds clues to opposing the threat of "corruption."

ベンジャミン様がご友人の足跡を巡りながら
作成した装備品を埋葬していくのは――
フィンダムの流儀に則った弔い、なのかもしれません
column2: Perhaps Master Benjamin, while tracing the footsteps of his friend, is burying the equipment he created—an homage following the Phindym tradition.

column1: 空中で剣による連続攻撃を繰り出す
column2: Perform continuous attacks on air with your magick sword.

column1: 空中でダガーによる連撃を繰り出す
column2: Perform consecutive dagger slashes while in the air.

column1: ダガーによる連撃を繰り出す
攻撃範囲の広い回し蹴りを連続して繰り出す
column2: Perform a wide range of consecutive kicks.

column1:
剣による渾身の一撃で敵のガード状態を崩し
転倒させる。さらに気絶させやすくなる
ボタンの長押しで威力が増す
column2:
Perform a stronger overhead swing capable of breaking
an enemies guard, holding down longer for increased power. 
A longer hold has a better chance to topple.

column1:
剣による一撃で敵のガード状態を崩し気絶を誘う
ボタンの長押しで威力が増し
敵を転倒させることができる
<COL ffdc78>LV UPで攻撃威力が上昇し
長押しなしで敵を転倒させる＜強斬り崩し＞に進化</COL>
column2:
Perform a strong overhead swing, holding down longer
for increased power that's capable of breaking an enemies 
guard. It is also possible to topple the enemy.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Increase attack power
Evolve into "Strong Guard Break" allowing you to guard
break without max power.</COL>

column1: 剣による強力な連撃を繰り出す
column2: Perform a strong continuous attack with your magick sword.

column1:
ダガーによる素早い連続斬りを繰り出す
ボタンの連打で攻撃回数が増加する
<COL ffdc78>LV UPでより攻撃回数が増加する
＜阿修羅斬り＞に進化</COL>
column2:
Perform a series of quick dagger slashes.
The number of attacks rises with consecutive button presses.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases the number of attacks.
Evolves into (Hundred Kisses).</COL>

column1:
ダガーによるさらに高速の連続斬りを繰り出す
ボタンの連打で攻撃回数が増加する
column2:
Perform a faster series of quick dagger slashes.
The number of attacks rises with consecutive button presses.

column1:
空中でダガーによる回転攻撃を繰り出す
高所から行うことで威力が上昇し気絶させやすくなる
column2:
Perform a continuous somersault in the air with daggers
extended. When performed from a high place, the damage increases and it is
easier to stagger enemies.

column1: 剣による連続攻撃を繰り出す
column2: Perform a continuous attack with your sword.

column1: 剣による連撃を繰り出す
column2: Perform a continuous attack with your magick sword.

column1: ペンタエレメントチェンジ
罪人の修獄　危険区域
パールマッシュルーム

探索に向かったポーンが
複数種類の魔物を倒しやすくなります
他の遠征隊支援の効果と重複します
column2: Pawn who embarks on exploration will find it easier to defeat various types of enemies. This effect overlaps with the support from other expedition teams.

column1: ポーン遠征隊が解放されます
column2: Pawn expedition support will be unlocked.

column1: ポーンとのパーティープレイ

column1: 他のプレイヤーとのパーティープレイ
パーティー内にパートナーポーンがいる

特に、この水路で見たあのサルのような魔物――
姿形はレスタニアに生息しているものに
似ていますが、決定的に違うのは、そのトゲ――
column2:
Particularly, monsters like the ape we had seen in this waterway..
Its appearance is similar to those inhabiting Lestania,
but decisively different, because of those thorns...

column1:
翡翠湖を臨む、長くロスギル家が治める地方の中心地
魔物が多い地帯ならではの重装家屋が見られる
王族アッカー家から一帯の守護を任されてきた
ロスギル家の末裔を長に頂き、忠誠心に篤い人々が
暮らしている
column2:
Overlooking Emerald Lake, in the heart of a region long ruled by the Rothgill family.
One can see the sturdy houses characteristic of this land abundant in enemies. 
Tasked with protecting the entire area by the noble Acre family, descendants of the Rothgill family serve as its leaders, with loyal and devoted individuals living here.

column1:
翡翠湖を臨む、長くロスギル家が治める地方の中心地
魔物が多い地帯ならではの重装家屋が見られる
王族アッカー家から一帯の守護を任されてきた
ロスギル家の末裔を長に頂き、忠誠心に篤い人々が
暮らしている
column2:
Overlooking Emerald Lake, in the heart of a region long ruled by the Rothgill family.
One can see the sturdy houses characteristic of this land abundant in enemies. 
Tasked with protecting the entire area by the noble Acre family, descendants of the Rothgill family serve as its leaders, with loyal and devoted individuals living here.

column1:
おしなべて侵食魔は強い傾向にあるが、その中でも
長く騎士団を手こずらせていた侵食魔の討伐作戦がド
リード城を舞台に実行され、成功裡に終わった
　また、長く音信が途絶えていたレオが現れ、フィン
ダムから来たロイグなる男を保護していることを告げ
ていったという
　セシリーとロイグを引き合わせれば、我々の欲する
情報は手に入る可能性が高まるが、レオの思惑も大い
に気になるところである
column2:
Overall, the invading corrupted creatures tend to be strong, but among them, the mission to defeat the particular corrupted creature that has been causing trouble for the knights for a long time was executed at Dreed Castle and ended in success.
Furthermore, Leo, who had been out of contact for a long time, appeared and informed that he is protecting a man named Loeg who came from Phindym.

If Cecily and Loeg are introduced to each other, there is a high possibility of obtaining the information we desire. However, Leo's intentions also greatly concern us.

column1:
城塞都市メガドの城門外に設えられた詰所
元は商人らが優先的にメガドへ入るための手続きを
受けていた場であるが、現在は出撃の令を待つ
ドワーフオークや、軍属の獣たちがひしめいている
column2:
Outside the gates of the fortress city Megado, there is a guard post set up. 
Originally, it was a place where merchants would go through the necessary procedures to enter Megado. 
However, it is now crowded with dwarf orcs and military animals waiting for the order to march out.

column1: おでかけ支援サービス
おでかけ支援サービス
衣装：キースヒルト武器OFF
衣装：キースヒルト戦闘用
衣装：イリス-フード付OFF負傷
衣装：セシリー_短剣あり

元より稀少ではあったが、この数年は特に《ブラッ
ドオーブ》が減っている。《ブラッドオーブ》が無け
れば白竜の石化は進むばかりだ
　探索の人員と機会を少しでも増やすようにレオ並び
にゲルトには依頼済みだ。わたしも覚者たちにはひと
声かけるようにしている
　一方で、《ブラッドオーブ》に頼らず白竜の回復を
促す方法を探そうという動きがある。提唱者はレオ
だ
　彼は古文書に答えを探すつもりらしい。何か方策が
見つかれば良いが、古文書の内容は玉石混淆。研究に
習熟した者でなければ単なる思いつきの記述を信じ、
無駄な時間や犠牲を払うことになるだろう
　入手した古文書の解析はクラウスに命じたようだ
が、まだまだ未熟者。しっかりと指導してやらねば
column2:
Originally, it was rare, but in recent years, the number of Blood Orbs has been decreasing. If there are no Blood Orbs, the petrification of the White Dragon will only continue to progress.
I have already requested Leo and Gerd to increase the number of exploration personnel and opportunities. I am also making sure to reach out to the Arisen.
On the other hand, there is a movement to find a way to promote the recovery of the White Dragon without relying on Blood Orbs. The proponent is Leo.

He seems to be intending to find the answers in ancient documents. It would be good if some strategies were found, but the content of the ancient documents is a mix of gems and stones. If one is not proficient in research, they may believe it to be just a whimsical description and waste time and sacrifice in vain.

It seems that Klaus has been ordered to analyze the obtained ancient documents, but he is still inexperienced. I need to give him proper guidance.

column1:
本来はアッカーシェランを統べる火竜が休息を
取るための場であり、聖なる場所と目されていたが
今は悪しき竜が成り変わるかのようにねぐらとして
いる。火垂れ山の中でも最も多くの竜力が
集まる場とみなされている
column2:
Originally, it was a place for the Fire Dragon, who ruled over Acre Selund, to rest and was considered a holy place. 
Now it serves as a den for the Evil Dragon, transforming it. 
It is considered the place where the most Dragon Force gathers within Firefall Mountain.

column1: イベント進行はリーダーのみ可能です
column2: Only the party leader can progress the event.

column1: 起こるのは良い事ばかり――心配は杞憂だったのだ
column2: Only good things have occurred...I was needlessly worried.

column1: 片手持ちスナップブレード
片手持ちスナップブレード
片手持ちスナップブレード
片手持ちスナップブレード
片手持ちスナップブレード

旧時代、各地に祭られた白竜の祭壇の一つ
古いポーン、ダイオンが百年以上に渡り
護り続けている祠。ザンドラ禁域を訪れる
覚者への任務と警鐘を伝えるための場でもある
column2:
One of the altars of the White Dragon, which was worshipped in various regions in ancient times.
The old Pawn, Dian, has been protecting this shrine for over a hundred years. 
It is also a place to convey missions and warnings to the Arisen who visit the Zandora Wastelands.

column1:
エルフの都《エルテ・ディナン》一角にあるという
住居群の一つ。広大な区画らしいが、長らく閉ざ
されており、内部がどうなっているかは不明
出入り口が閉ざされたのには、なにか理由が
あるのかもしれない
column2:
One of a group of dwellings located within a corner of the Erte Deenan, the elven capital. 
It appears to be a vast area, but it has been closed off for a long time, and the interior remains unknown. There may be a reason for the entrance to be sealed.

column1:
エルフの都《エルテ・ディナン》一角にあるという
住居群の一つ。広大な区画らしいが、長らく閉ざ
されており、内部がどうなっているかは不明
出入り口が閉ざされたのには、なにか理由が
あるのかもしれない
column2:
One of a group of dwellings located within a corner of the Erte Deenan, the elven capital. 
It appears to be a vast area, but it has been closed off for a long time, and the interior remains unknown. There may be a reason for the entrance to be sealed.

column1:
かつて覚者はレスタニアの王、そして次代の竜にな
るさだめだった
　しかし、３２４年前に状況が変わった。黄金竜との
戦いで傷ついた白竜が完全なる回復を遂げるまでの
間、自らを守る戦士として数人の覚者を生み出したの
だ
　彼らは古来からの作法に従い、白竜に心臓を預ける
代わりに竜力を受け取った。回復の途上にある白竜を
狙って近づく魔物を蹴散らすことが彼らのさだめだっ
た。希望者は絶えることなく、白竜は定期的に覚者を
増やした
　やがて、時とともに覚者たちの意識に変化が生じ
た。白竜のそばに控えることが、すべてではなくなっ
たのだ
　彼らはレスタニア全土に広がり、各地で暮らす人々
のために戦うようになった。土地に縛られず、あちこ
ちを移動して問題を解決する者も現れ、頼りにされる
ようになった
　もちろん、昔と同じく、この神殿に集う者も少なく
はない。今回誕生した覚者たちはどうだろう
　さて、気になる事件が二件起こっている。グリッテ
ン砦が、ついにオークどもに侵入されてしまった
　守備隊のヴァネッサと応援に行ったレオたちが見事
撃退したようだが、今後のオークの動向が気になると
ころだ
　加えて、多くの人々が目撃した、空を横切る巨大な
石塊も悩ましい。天変地異の類か、それとも誰か――
たとえば、信じがたいがオーク――の仕業か
　どこに落ちたのだろうか。ゲルト騎士団長が落下地
点を特定するための捜索部隊を派遣したとの報告を受
けている
column2:
Once, the Arisen were the kings of Lestania and destined to become the next dragons.
However, the situation changed 324 years ago. 
The White Dragon, who was injured in a battle against the Golden Dragon, gave birth to several Arisen to protect themselves until it fully recovered.
Following the ancient traditions, they entrusted their hearts to the White Dragon and received the power of the dragons in return. It was their destiny to scatter monsters approaching the White Dragon in the process of recovery. The White Dragon continued to create new Arisen regularly, as there were always those who sought to become one.

Eventually, the consciousness of the Arisen began to change over time. Being by the side of the White Dragon was no longer their sole purpose. They spread across all of Lestania, fighting for the people living in various places. Some even traveled around, solving problems wherever they went and became relied upon.

Of course, there are still those who gather in this temple, just like in the old days. What about the Arisen that have been born this time?

Now, there are two troubling incidents. Fort Gritten has finally been invaded by orcs.
It seems that Vanessa of the defense force and Leo, who went to support her, successfully repelled them, but we are concerned about the future movements of the orcs.

Additionally, a large boulder crossing the sky, witnessed by many people, is also worrying. Is it a natural disaster or the doing of someone—perhaps even the unbelievable act of orcs?

Where did it fall? Gerd, the commander of the knight order, has received a report that a search team has been dispatched to locate the point of impact.

column1:
かつてドリード城からハイデルへの物資搬入
などに使われていた地下通路
ドリード城が捨てられると同時に封鎖され
現在は朽ちた物資もそのままになっている
column2: Once used for the transportation of goods from Dreed Castle to Heidell, an underground passage now lies sealed since the abandonment of the castle, leaving the decaying supplies untouched.

column1:
この大陸は、その気候や生態、文化など
全てにおいて異なる点が多く見られます
column2:
On this continent, the climate, ecology, culture, and etc,
are all so different than everything we knew.

column1:
イニアス湖西側、浅瀬と草地の混じったこの場所は
ブルーニュートが多く出没する。その中で、近年
強力な電撃を纏った変異種が現れるようになった
これら《コバルトニュート》と遭遇した場合
討伐が推奨されている
column2:
On the western side of Lake Inias, in this area mixed with shallow waters and meadows, there are many Blue Newts. 
Among them, in recent years, a mutated species that is enveloped in powerful electric shocks has started to appear. 
In case of an encounter with these "Cobalt Newts," it is recommended to subdue them.

column1:
森の南、ディナン山道への途中にトロールの寝所
がある。かつて覚者に撃退されしばらく姿を見せな
かった巨人ヨトンがどうやら戻ってきたらしい
人を憎み襲うこの巨人は非常に危険なため
近くを通る時は最大限の警戒が必要だ
column2:
On the way to the Dinnan Mountain Road in the southern forest, there is a troll's resting place. 
The giant Jotun, who was once repelled by an Arisen and had not been seen for a while, seems to have returned. 
This giant, who hates humans and attacks them on sight, is extremely dangerous, so maximum caution is necessary when passing by.

column1:
セラー湖のほとり、旧騎士団監視塔の傍にある
廃墟。この付近に最近、獰猛なコロッサスが出没
するようになった。監視塔の水路はバートランドの
低地と高地を繋ぐ連絡路でもあるため、この魔物の
存在は、厄介な障害となっている
column2:
On the shores of Lake Cera, near the old Knights' Watchtower, lies a ruin. 
Recently, a fierce Colossus has begun to appear in this area. 
The waterway of the watchtower also serves as a connecting route between Bartland's lowlands and highlands, so the presence of this enemy has become a troublesome obstacle.

column1:
キンガル峡谷西部にある川岸
《芯なる樹》を非常に近くから眺められるほか
崖に近寄ることで、その根元を見ることすら
可能。ただし、現在は獣の死骸を目当てに
寄ってくる魔物に注意が必要である
column2:
On the riverbank in the western part of Kingal Canyon, you can admire the "Core Tree" from a very close distance.
By approaching the cliffs, you can even see its roots.
However, caution is necessary as there are currently monsters that come near in search of animal carcasses.

column1:
バートランド平原の外れ、橋の傍にある
枯れ井戸。恐ろしげな呻き声が付近で響いて
いるらしく、オークの動向を探る覚者隊の
隊士たちはその付近を特に警戒するそうだ
column2:
On the outskirts of Betland Plains, next to a bridge, there is a dry well. 
It seems that a terrifying groaning sound is echoing in the vicinity, and the members of the Arisen Corps, who are investigating the movements of the Orcs, are particularly cautious in that area.

column1:
グリンデュア対岸にあたる拓けた河岸
以前はこの河岸から河に出るための船が
出ていたが、ある頃から人や積み荷の
上げ降ろし中に魔物に襲われることが
増えたため、現在は使われていない
column2:
On the opposite bank of Glyndwr, there is a wide riverbank. 
In the past, boats would leave from this bank to go out onto the river. 
However, at some point, the number of attacks by enemies during the loading and unloading of people and cargo increased, so the boats are no longer in use.

column1:
ファーラナ平原の山肌にあるニュートの巣穴
そう深さは無く、食糧を貯蓄している様子も無いので
恐らく休息を得る目的で作られたのだろう
見張りを立てて交替で使用しているのか、入口
付近では常にニュートが目を光らせている
column2:
On the mountainside of the Farana Plains, there is a Newt Den. 
It doesn't appear to be very deep, and there doesn't seem to be any stored food, so it was probably made for the purpose of resting. 
Near the entrance, the Newts always keep watch, taking turns to stand guard.

column1:
北バートランド東部の丘上に、オークが魔犬を
育成、訓練している場所が確認された
ここで特別に育てられたグリムワーグは斥候や
強襲に使われるため、そうなる前に手を打つことが
望ましい
column2:
On the hills in the eastern part of North Betland, a place where Orcs breed and train canines called Grimwargs, has been confirmed. 
It is desirable to take action before these specially bred Grimwargs are used for scouting and assault.

column1:
崖上にある自然洞窟
各種鉱石の採掘場として人の手が入った
時期もあるものの、過去に恐ろしい魔物
の住処となったことで封鎖されていた
column2:
On the cliff, there is a natural cave that has been used by human hands as a mining site for various ores.
It has been sealed off due to becoming a dwelling place for terrifying creatures in the past.

column1:
ファーラナ平原の少し奥まった高台に建つ小塔
以前は代々内部で暮らす者たちがいたものの
彼らは二百年近く前に突然塔から出てダナ村に
合流したという。それ以来、たまに掃除に訪れる
者がいる程度で普段は無人となっている
column2:
On a slightly secluded hill in Farana Plains, there is a small tower. 
Previously, there were people living inside for generations. 
However, about two hundred years ago, they suddenly left the tower and joined Dana Village. 
Since then, it has been uninhabited, with only occasional visitors for cleaning.

ああ感激！　ご恩返しさせてもらわなきゃ
column2: Oh, how moved I am! I must repay the favor.

column1:
おぅ、覚者様！
絶好の冒険日和ってやつですねえ
column2:
Oh, Arisen!
It's a perfect day for an adventure, isn't it?

column1:
あぁ！　私の腕前、いつ披露させて
もらえるのでしょう
column2: Oh! When will I have the opportunity to demonstrate my skills?

column1:
おぉ！　お目にかかれて光栄です！
覚者様！！
column2: Oh! I am honored to meet you, Arisen!

従者が時たま、本当に人の心を
持っているのではないかと錯覚するような
表情を見せるようになってきた――
column2: Occasionally, a follower has a truly human heart.

column1:
時折、酷く悔しそうな表情をされます――
しかしその真意までは
ポーンの私には判らないのです
column2:
Occasionally, I will have a look of chagrin on my face...
but the intention behind it, is one that my pawn can't understand.

column1:
ダウ渓谷、カタコンベ付近の木立
逃げ惑う姿勢のまま石と化した人影が木陰に
多数紛れているのが発見され、ジンゲンの
村人を恐怖に陥れた
column2: Numerous figures, frozen like statues in a posture of fleeing, were discovered hidden among the trees near the Catacombs in Dowe Valley. This discovery plunged the villagers of Jingen into fear.

column1: 特に気になるものはない

白竜が座すレスタニアの中心地
覚者と白騎団の本拠地であるだけでなく、神殿周囲
には商店区、宿場区、港が築かれ都市となった
３００年に渡り、人々はこの地で竜に寄り添い
暮らしを営んでいる
column2:
Not only the home of the Arisen, the White Dragon
sits at the center of Lestania. With a temple built
around them, over 300 years a bustling city grew,
with a relay station, harbor and shopping district.

column1:
戦いの最中だけでなく、
帰り道にすらアイツに苦労させられるとは――
苦労した分、この素材が何に
使えるのかという期待は高まる一方だ
column2:
Not only during the battles,
but even on the way back to that guy I have suffered hardships...
Due to these struggles, the expectations I have for what this
material can be used for are rising.

レスタニア最北の《禁じられた地》
かつて黄金都市と謳われたメルゴダは大地ごと
消失しており、深く抉れた大穴だけがその痕跡を
示している。錬金技術で造られた歪な半生物は
大地に残され、今なお徘徊し続けているという
column2:
North of Lestania lies the Forbidden Land, known as Mergoda, which was once hailed as the Golden City.
However, it has completely disappeared, leaving only a deep, gouged hole as its trace. 
Twisted, semi-living creatures created through alchemy remain on the land, still wandering to this day.

いや、正しくは「そう見える」と言うべきか
彼らがまるで人間のような仕草を見せるたび
怖気と虚しさを感じるのだ
column2:
No, I should say they "look like they are".
Everytime they show a gesture or expression like a human being,
it feels unnerving and empty.

column1: パーティープレイ不可（ポーン同行不可）

column2: No party members (<QCND 0> main pawn allowed)

column1:
覚者とポーンによる契約の儀式は何度見ても慣れる
ということがない
　ポーンはどこから来るのだろうか。こことは異なる
別の世界の存在を思わずにはいられない
　幾つもの世界がポーンによって繋がっているのかも
しれないと想像しては、その途方もない無限に、わた
しは憧れ、怯えるのだ
　ともあれ、ポーンは現れ、契約は無事に交わされ
た。おめでとうと言わせてもらおう
column2:
No matter how many times I witness the ritual of the contract between the Arisen and the Pawn, I never get used to it.
I can't help but think that the Pawns come from a different world than this one.
I imagine that many worlds are connected by Pawns, creating an unimaginable infinity. I admire it, yet it also terrifies me.

Anyway, the Pawn appears, and the contract is successfully formed. Let me congratulate you.

魔赤島に唯一存在する塔《聖遺の塔》の傍にある
枯れ井戸。長らく人の手が入らなかったようで
井戸蓋が錆び付いており、中々内部の様子を
探ることができなかった
column2: Next to the Tower of the Holy Relics, the only tower that exists on Bloodbane Isle, there is a dried-up well. It seems that no one has touched it for a long time, as the well cover is rusted and it is difficult to examine the interior.

column1:
モルトバ灯台の傍にある古井戸
水が引いて後はリザードマンなどの魔物が
出入りするようになった
機能しているかは不明だが、魔物の侵入を
防ぐための古い装置が残っている
column2:
Next to the Moltova Lighthouse, there is an old well.
After the water dried up, it became a place where creatures like Saurians would come and go.
It is unclear if it still functions, but there are still old devices that remain to prevent the invasion of enemies like Saurians.

column1:
険しい渓谷にしがみつくように残された小村
かつて、ドリード城主が健在だった時代は賑わって
いたが、北部オーク軍の動きが活発化した頃から
強力な魔物の襲撃もあり、徐々に人が離れた
しかし、景観や古城に魅せられる探訪者は多い
column2:
Nestled in a treacherous ravine, a small village remains clinging on.
Once thriving in the days when Lord Dreed ruled, it gradually lost its inhabitants as the movements of the Northern Orc army intensified. Nevertheless, many visitors are still enchanted by the scenery and the ancient Dreed Castle.

column1:
従者が必要？
だったらぼくとかどうですか！？
column2:
Need a follower?
How about me?

column1: ネクロマンスドマント
骸の将が魔物を呼び寄せた――！
column2: Necro Master called upon an Enemy!

column1: ネビュラ小神殿　中央部
ネビュラ小神殿　深部
ネビュラ小神殿　回廊

禁じられた地にもっとも近い、探索者の拠点
すでに元の住民はおらず、旧時代の宝や発見を
求める者達が遺跡を再利用し、宿や商店を開いて
いる。この町のよろず屋には剣豪《ウォリアー》
として名高いオリバーが滞在している
column2:
Nearest to the forbidden land, the base of the explorers.
The original residents are no longer here, and those who seek ancient treasures and discoveries have repurposed the ruins, opening inns and shops.
Oliver, renowned as a warrior, resides in this town's general shop.

column1:
《群像の岩屋》近くの広場
高所から流れ落ちる雄大な滝を見ることが
できる。ただし、日光を避ける傾向にある
はずの侵食魔や菌胞がその勢力を日向にまで
拡げている、侵食の勢いが強い場所でもある
column2: Nearby the Picturesque Grotto, there is a plaza where you can witness the majestic waterfall cascading down from a high place. However, the corruption and infected fungi, which are supposed to avoid direct sunlight, have extended their influence even to the sunny areas. It is a place where the force of corruption is strong.

column1:
ベルタ盗賊団のアジト近くに流れる地下水路
武装した魔獣が徘徊しているが、それを御す
オークの姿は確認されていない。盗賊団の
アジトを探すために放たれた魔獣が迷い込み、
そのまま帰還せず棲みついてしまったようだ
column2:
Near the hideout of Bertha's Bandit Group, there is an underground waterway flowing. 
Armed beasts roam around, but they are tamed. 
No orcs have been spotted. 
A magical creature that was unleashed to search for the bandit group's hideout got lost and ended up settling there.

column1:
《モローケイヴァン》入口付近の木立
この辺りの土壌、木々は侵食が進むあまり
もはや目を覆いたくなるような状況である
緑豊かだった木々は今や立ち枯れ、菌糸体を
まとって赤くひび割れてすらいる
column2:
Near the entrance of Morrow Cavern, the surrounding grove is in such a state of corruption and infected that it becomes unbearable to look at. 
The once lush trees are now standing dead, covered in reddened cracks and even infected with mycelium.

column1:
ファーラナ平原の《マグサス古水路》入口付近、岩が
立ち並ぶ周辺。巨大な岩が数個露出している以外は
特に目立つものも無い場所であるが、鎧の擦れる音が
聞こえたり、視界の端に巨大な剣が見えたという
報告が絶えない
column2:
Near the entrance of Magusas Ancient Watercourse in the Farana Plains, there is a surrounding area with rocks scattered about. 
Other than a few exposed giant rocks, there is nothing particularly noticeable about this place. 
However, there are constant reports of hearing the sound of armor scraping and seeing a giant sword at the edge of one's field of vision.

column1:
セラー湖北岸の浜辺付近で、オークの残党が
野営を行っているのが確認された
どうやら、ガルドノックを離れた大将級の一派
らしい。新勢力となる前に有力な残党は叩いて
おきたい所だ
column2: Near the beach on the northern shore of Lake Cera, it has been confirmed that remnants of orcs are camping. It appears to be a faction of high-ranking commanders who have left Gardnox. We should strike down the influential remnants before they become a new force.

column1:
《イヴァノスの塔》付近にある大遺跡
倒壊はしているものの入口付近には飾柱も
多数のこっており、豪華な造りだったことが
うかがえる。壁面には何らかの呪印が刻まれて
いるらしく強い魔力の痕跡がある
column2:
Near the "Tower of Ivanos" there is a large ancient ruin. 
Although it has collapsed, there are numerous decorative columns near the entrance, suggesting that it was once splendidly built. 
The walls are engraved with some kind spell, leaving traces of intense magic power.

column1:
《王家の墓》付近にある小さな洞窟
これまでは注目されてこなかった場所だが
ドワーフオークが出入りする姿や、手勢の
魔獣を置いていく様子が確認されている
内部に何らかの秘密があるのかもしれない
column2:
Near the "Royal Family Mausoleum" is a small cave, which has not attracted much attention until now. 
However, there have been sightings of Dwarf Orcs coming in and out, as well as witnessing them leaving their animals. 
There may be some kind of secret inside.

column1:
ドリード城近くの地下墓地
城が白衛騎士団の本拠地であった頃、処罰された
罪人や獄死した者を葬っていた場所であり
今なお重く冷たい空気が漂っている
column2:
Near Dreed Castle is an underground cemetery. 
It was a place where convicted criminals and those who died in prison were buried when the castle served as the headquarters of the White Knight Order. 
Even now, a heavy and chilling atmosphere lingers.

column1:
ダナの村の近くに佇む庵
《スピリットランサー》のジョブマスターである
勇壮な槍士アデルドナハが住んでいる
見込みのある者に対しては、自身のもつ
技術を伝授することもあるという
column2:
Near Dana Village stands a hermitage, where the brave Job Master of the Spirit Lancers, Adair Donnchadh, resides. 
It is said that he also imparts his skills to promising individuals.

column1:
《バートランド大橋》の近く、オークとの
小競り合いが頻発する地点
川辺からの風に巻き上げられた砂埃に加え、野営に
使われたと思しき焚火が燻っているため、常に
薄煙がかかったようになっている
column2:
Near Betland Bridge, there is a point where there is frequent skirmishing with Orcs. 
In addition to the dust raised by the wind from the riverside, there always seems to be a thin smoke in the air, possibly from a campfire.

column1:
ブリア海岸のはずれ、断崖の中腹に入り口を
もつ自然洞窟。絶えず水音が聞こえることから
潮騒洞窟と呼ばれ、奥の滝は霊験あらたかとの
噂だが、ある事件をきっかけに封鎖されていた
column2:
Natural Cave on the edge of Breya coast.
Along a cliff's midsection, lies an entrance to a natural cave. It is known as the Roaring Tide Cave due to the constant sound of water. There are rumors that the waterfall deep inside possesses supernatural power. However, following an incident, it has been sealed off.

住居跡らしき神秘的な遺跡
廃墟と化してなお、緑生い茂るたたずまいは
壮麗さを残している。内部には不思議な装置が
あり、奥に進むには仕組みの理解を要する
column2:
Mysterious ruins that resembles a place of residence.
Even in its state of being in ruins, it retains its splendid beauty, with lush greenery surrounding it. 
Inside, there are peculiar devices, and understanding their mechanism is necessary to proceed further.

column1:
異界の狭間にて入手できる不思議な結晶
覚者がポーンの民と契約を結ぶために必要なもの
column2:
Mysterious crystals that are found in other worlds.
Used to sign a contract with a new pawn.

column1:
魔道弓により霊力の魔矢を操る神秘の射手
自動的に標的を追ういく本もの魔矢は敵の急所を
穿つ刃のみならず、味方を癒す光にもなる
column2:
Mysterious archer who manipulates magick
into their magick bow.
They can attack enemies, support allies and
show the weak points of enemies.
The Eyes of the Battlefield.

column1: 幽玄の霊堂　危険区域
標の祠　ミスリウ森林深部
標の祠　ミスリウ森林深部
標の祠　ミスリウ森林深部

ミスリウ森林南西の大洞窟
深部にある巨大空洞には、名の由来でもある
《燐光虫》という虫が棲息し、星空に迷い込んだかの
ような美しさであると言われる。しかし、鬼人や
エイプの住処ともなっており危険は大きい
column2: Mysree Forest, located in the southwest, holds a massive cave. Deep within this cave, there is a breathtaking sight named after the "Glowworms" that reside there. It is said to possess a beauty reminiscent of getting lost in the starry sky. However, it is also known to be a dangerous dwelling for Demons and Apes.

償いは、次の戦いの場で――！
column2:

column1:

私を救出に――？
column2: My Lord, will you save me――?

ほのかに銀色に輝く苔

column1: ミスターエクストリーム

ベンジャミン様はいつになくご機嫌が良いようで
なんと――ご自分のことを
少し話してくださいました！
column2: Mr. Benjamin seemed to be in an unusually good mood and, by golly--he told us a little about himself!

column1:
魔法詠唱中スペルサークルに示される順序で
<PADM>スティック入力<KEYM>マウス移動</KEYM>を行い、魔法の威力を増加させる
column2:
Move the <PADM> Right Stick;KEYM>Mouse</KEYM> in
the order shown in the magic circle while casting a spell to increase its power.

column1:
最大標高を誇るボルド山を主とした山岳地帯
鉱石の名産地であり、古くから採掘師と武具職人
にとっては中心地だった。さらに、現在活動
は見られないもののボルド山は火山であり、温泉や
毒を含んだ液体なども多く噴出する
column2:
Mountainous region centered around Mount Volden, which boasts the highest elevation.
It has been a renowned mining site and a central location for miners and blacksmiths since ancient times. Furthermore, although currently inactive, Mount Volden is a volcano that often erupts hot springs and various liquid substances, including poisonous ones.

column2: Memories of the Earth: Sacred Flame Path
Memorandum of a Former Military Police

column1:
元憲兵の男が、獄中で書いた手記
“ 任務で小さなミスを犯し、侯爵の怒りを
　買ったために投獄された ”
という内容で、獄中の苦しい状況などが
克明に描写されている
ところどころがシミで汚れており読みづらい
column2:
Memoirs Written by a Former Military Police Officer in Prison
The handwritten memoirs of a former military police officer, who was imprisoned after committing a minor mistake on a mission and incurring the wrath of a nobleman.
The memoirs vividly depict the harsh conditions experienced in prison, although some parts are difficult to read due to stains.

column1:
テル村事件の顛末を覚書として残しておく
　魔物退治の兵を派遣してくれとの要請を受けたゲル
ト騎士団長は、すぐに副長ハインツを指揮官とする騎
士たちを向かわせた。その後、村からの要請は何故か
レオにまで伝わり、覚者ガルドリンが派遣された
　騎士団と覚者たちの対立は絶えたことがない。今回
も現場のテル村で両者が揉めてしまったようだ。誤り
に気づいたレオが、仲裁のために派遣した新人覚者の
機転で大事には至らなかった。だが、この長く続く対
立は伝統という言葉ですませてしまって良いのだろう
か
　確執を原因とする手柄争いが良い具合に両者の士気
を高めているという意見があることは知っている。し
かし、両者から互いへの悪口雑言を聞かされるわたし
の立場も考えてほしいものだ
　我々の目下の敵はオークだ。内輪揉めはやめて、白
竜の下、心一つになろうではないか
column2:
Memo: The Conclusion of the Tel Village Incident
Upon receiving a request for assistance in fighting off monsters, Captain Gerd of the Knight Order immediately dispatched a group of knights under the command of Vice-Captain Heinz. Later on, the request somehow reached Leo, and the Arisen Gurdolin was sent to the village.
The conflict between the knights and the Arisen has always been ongoing. Once again, they clashed at the scene of the incident in Tel Village. Thanks to the quick thinking of a new Arisen who was sent as a mediator, Leo, the situation did not escalate. However, is it acceptable to brush off this long-lasting feud simply as a tradition?

I know that some argue that this rivalry born out of disputes boosts the morale of both parties. Nevertheless, please consider my position as well, as I am exposed to insults and slander from both sides.

Our current enemy is the Orcs. Let us put an end to internal conflicts and unite under the banner of the White Dragon.

column1:
メイリーフが世話になったエルフの青年（名はキー
スヒルト）が死んだ
　レオたちが救出に向かったが間に合わなかったの
だ。レスタニアの智がこうむった損失は計り知れな
い
　長命のエルフが身のうちに蓄えた記憶は、そのまま
レスタニアの歴史であったはずだ。いつかじっくり話
を聞きたいと思っていたが叶わず。無念としか言いよ
うがない
また、報告によればキースヒルトの命は敵の手で器に
納められ、持ち去られた
　敵がメイリーフを執拗に狙った理由、あっさりと標
的をメイリーフからキースヒルトに切り替えた理由が
わかるというものだ
　彼らの目的はやはり命。長命のエルフの命が持つ力
は、我々の命の比ではないはずだ。して、その命を奴
らは何に使うのか。判明してからでは遅い、奪還の可
能性を模索することが急務だ
column2:
Mayleaf was taken care of by a young elf man named Kieshildt who has now died. Leo and the others went to rescue him but didn't make it in time.
The loss suffered by Lestania's wisdom is immeasurable. The memories that the long-lived Elf had accumulated within him were supposed to be the history of Lestania. I had hoped to listen to them carefully someday, but that wish couldn't come true. It's nothing but regret. 

According to the report, Kieshildt's life was taken away by the enemy and taken with them. The reason the enemy persistently targeted Mayleaf and easily switched targets from Mayleaf to Kieshildt is understood. 

Their purpose is indeed life. The power that the long-lived Elf's life possesses is beyond comparison to our own lives. Therefore, it is urgent to explore the possibility of recovery before it becomes clear how they will use that life.

column1:
メイリーフがまた行方不明になり、前回と同じ覚者
に捜索を依頼した。あの子の正体を知る者を増やすわ
けにはいかなかったのだ
　クラウスも行かせたのは禁じられた古文書から引き
離すためだった。同時に、メイリーフと覚者、覚者と
クラウス。彼らは意気投合しているように見えてい
た
　わたしが退場した後の神殿はあの三人が中心にある
のだろうという予感が漠然とあったのだ。三人の組み
合わせは、わたしの中では自然なことだった
　さて、捜索から戻った覚者は、メイリーフをエルフ
の青年に託してきたという
　怒りと困惑があった。怒りは、わたしの危機感がま
ったく伝わっていなかったことが原因で、困惑したの
はメイリーフがわたしに黙って、自分の意志で神殿を
出たことを知ったから
　いや、困惑にあらず。悲しみだったかもしれない。
ともあれ、今はただ、メイリーフの無事を祈るのみで
ある
column2:
Mayleaf has gone missing again, so we requested the assistance of the same Arisen as before. We couldn't afford to let anyone else find out about her true identity.
We sent Klaus along as well, in order to separate him from the forbidden ancient documents. It seemed like Mayleaf and the Arisen, as well as the Arisen and Klaus, were getting along well.
I had a vague feeling that after I left, the temple would revolve around those three. Their combination felt natural to me.

Now, the Arisen who returned from the search mentioned that they entrusted Mayleaf to a young elf.

There was anger and confusion. The anger stemmed from the fact that my sense of urgency hadn't gotten through, and the confusion came from learning that Mayleaf had left the temple without my knowledge and of her own accord.

No, perhaps it wasn't confusion. Maybe it was sadness. In any case, for now, all I can do is pray for Mayleaf's safety.

column1:
冒険者の遺したメッセージとは
関係のない落書きのようだ――
column2: Looks like graffiti that has nothing to do with the message left by the adventurer--
Lookout Castle: Before the Castle Gate

column1: 展望城城外 ソネルキャンプ

頼れる従者をお探しで？
なら、俺なんてどうです
column2:
Looking for a trustworthy squire?
Then how about me?

column1:
思えば、はじめて白竜の前に立ったのは物心がつい
た頃だった
　竜はただ眠っているように見えた。呼んでも、応え
はなく、ただ生暖かい呼気が顔を撫でた
　生きているのに応えてもらえない。それがとても悲
しく――わたしは泣いた。白竜の側に仕えて、いつか
言葉を交わしたいと思ったのはその時だったはずだ
　以来、眠りと覚醒の狭間からレスタニアを見守る白
竜とともに、わたしは、あった。白竜の完全なる回
復、そしてその場に居合わせることは長年の願いだ
　「命の器」と命がそれを可能にするのだろう。しか
し方策を見つけたことを喜ぶことができない
　我々は禁忌に触れてしまった。幸せな結末が待って
いるとは思えないのだ。我々はどんな代償を払うこと
になるのだろう
column2:
Looking back, the first time I stood before the White Dragon was when I was still a child. The dragon appeared to be sleeping, not responding to my calls, only the warm breath brushing against my face.
Even though it was alive, I couldn't get a response. It was so sad... and I cried. It was then that I wished to serve by the side of the White Dragon and one day exchange words with it.

Since then, I have been with the White Dragon, watching over Lestania from the space between sleep and awakening. It has been my long-standing wish to witness the White Dragon's complete recovery.

The vessel of life, and life itself, make such a thing possible. However, I cannot celebrate finding a solution.

We have touched upon a taboo. I do not believe a happy ending awaits us. What price will we have to pay?

column1:
古くより放棄されたままとなっていた地下水道
既に水はほぼ枯れたものと思われていたが
何者かが侵入した形跡が発見され、調査される
こととなった。内部にはおびただしいほどの不死者や
思念体がはびこっているが、発生の原因は不明
column2:
Long abandoned, the underground sewage system was thought to have already dried up. 
However, evidence of someone's intrusion was discovered and further investigation was initiated. 
Inside, an overwhelming number of undead beings were rampant, but the cause of their emergence remains unknown.

column1:
治療のために神殿で過ごすことになったロイグの病
気は赤色病だった
　古くに根絶された病ゆえ薬の調達に多少手間がかか
ったが、覚者たちの献身により入手済みだ。ロイグは
ほどなく健康を取り戻すことだろう
　フィンダムから来たふたりが言葉を交わす機会が格
段に増えるわけであるから、セシリーの記憶が戻る可
能性も大いに高まるに違いない
column2:
Loeg, who had to spend time in the temple for treatment, was suffering from Red Blight.
Although it took some effort to procure medicine for this disease that had been eradicated long ago, it had already been obtained thanks to the dedication of the Arisen. Loeg would soon regain his health.

Since the two who came from Phindym would have more opportunities to converse, it is highly likely that Cecily's memories will also return.

column1:
エルフの都《エルテ・ディナン》内にある
区画の一つ。蝶印のついた鍵で閉ざされて
いるため、立ち入るのであればまずは
鍵の入手が必要になる
column2:
Located within the Elven capital, "Erte Deenan," this is a section of the city. 
In order to enter, one must first obtain a key marked with a butterfly symbol.

column1:
ミスリウ森林の外れに位置する広大な鍾乳洞
そのあまりの深さと、そこをねぐらにする
凶悪な魔獅子の存在から立ち入り禁止になった
奥にはさまざまな魔物や資源があるだろう
column2:
Located on the outskirts of Mysree Forest is a vast limestone cave. 
Due to its incredible depth and the presence of a demon lion that have made it their lair, access to the cave has been prohibited. 
There are likely various enemies and resources deep within.

column1:
城塞都市メガドの東側にあたる一帯
悪しき竜の影響により、炎を纏った数多の
命の残骸がさ迷い、徘徊している
悪しき竜の影響が色濃く出ている場所といえる
column2:
Located on the eastern side of the fortress city Megado, this area is heavily influenced by the evil dragon.
Numerous charred remains, engulfed in flames, wander aimlessly, a testament to the dragon's malevolence.

column1:
ウルテカ山岳　西部、城塞都市メガドからは
北西にあたり、メガド離宮を通り抜けた先に
広がる一帯。周辺は火山地帯のため、緑が
少ないが、この一帯には珍しく草木が茂る様が
見られる
column2:
Located in the western region of the Urteca Mountains, to the northwest of the fortress city of Megado, it is an area that stretches beyond the Megado Detached Palace. 
Due to the volcanic nature of the surrounding area, there is little greenery, but this area is rare in that it is lush with vegetation.

column1:
魔赤島南部にある洞窟
斥候隊により、侵食ゴアサイクロプスがここを
ねぐらとしていることが判明している
残飯を狙ってか別種の魔物も多数棲みついているため
一定以上の戦力を持つ者のみが調査を許される
column2:
Located in the southern part of Bloodbane Isle, there is a cave that has been discovered by the scouts. 
It has been confirmed that the Infected Gorecyclops have made this place their lair. 
Due to the presence of various other creatures, possibly attracted by the leftovers, only those with a certain level of strength are allowed to conduct investigations.

column1:
ダウ平原中央に存在する水路跡
内部には川の水が流れ込んでおり、同時に周囲
に生息するサルファーリザードも多数
入りこんでいる
column2:
Located in the central part of the Dowe Plains, there is a trace of a water channel. 
Inside, the water from the river flows in, and at the same time, there are also many Sulfur Saurians living in the surrounding area.

column1:
魔赤島中心部に位置する侵食の進んだ洞窟
洞窟入口周辺には溢れ出したかのように大量の
菌胞がはびこっている。内部の侵食がかなり
進んでいることは確実であり、慎重を期した
調査が望まれる
column2:
Located in the central part of Bloodbane Isle, the cave is heavily corrupted.
In the vicinity of the cave entrance, there is an overwhelming amount of fungal spores spreading.
The internal infection is considerable, and a cautious investigation is desired.

column1:
魔赤島中心部に位置する侵食の進んだ洞窟
洞窟入口周辺には溢れ出したかのように大量の
菌胞がはびこっている。内部の侵食がかなり
進んでいることは確実であり、慎重を期した
調査が望まれる
column2:
Located in the central part of Bloodbane Isle, the cave is heavily corrupted.
In the vicinity of the cave entrance, there is an overwhelming amount of fungal spores spreading.
The internal infection is considerable, and a cautious investigation is desired.

column1:
ザンドラ禁域北端、地上に残った外周部
メルゴダ入り口にあたる区画であり、政治と深く
関わる錬金術研究の中心地であった。そのため
最も警戒すべき場所として、神殿により禁域と
して秘匿されてきた
column2:
Located at the northern border of Zandora Wastelands, this is the section that corresponds to the entrance of Mergoda. 
It was the hub of alchemized research closely intertwined with politics. 
As a result, it has been concealed as a forbidden area by the temple, making it the most guarded of places.

column1:

column1:
<SPOT 964>に位置する窪地
青い芝に覆われた小動物の住み処は、いまや
剥き出しの土の上に不気味な菌糸体を
はびこらせている。広々とした地形は大型の
魔物が巣食いやすく危険である
column2:
Located at <SPOT 964>, this depression which was once covered in green grass, is now overrun with eerie mycelium spread across the exposed earth. 
The spacious terrain makes it dangerous and a suitable nest for large monsters.

column1:
アッカーシェラン大陸のほぼ中央に位置する地域
荒涼とした風景が広がるこの地域には竜の神殿があり、
その神殿に寄り添うように王都メガドが建造された
要塞を思わせる王都はアッカー家三代目当主キリークの
治世に計画され、完成は十四代目当主ドラフの
即位目前であった
column2:
Located almost in the centre of Acre Selund, this area is characterized by a barren landscape. 
In this region, there is a dragon temple, and adjacent to the temple, the royal capital of Megado was built, resembling a fortress. 
The construction of this royal capital was planned during the reign of Kilik, the third head of the Acre family, and it was completed just before the coronation of Doraf, the fourteenth head.

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases health recovery amount.

レスタニア最大鉱山、中腹の坑道
最盛期には百人とも言われる鉱員が採掘に勤しん
でいたが、崩落と巨人の出現により閉山されて
いた。それでも良質鉱石の産地であることに
変わりなく、再開発を望む声は多い
column2:
Lestania's largest mine, the tunnel on the mountainside.
During its heyday, it was said that about a hundred miners worked diligently in the excavation.
However, due to collapses and the appearance of Giants, it was closed down.
Nevertheless, it remains a source of high-quality ore, and there are many voices hoping for its redevelopment.

column1:
レスタニア最大鉱山、中腹の坑道
最盛期には百人とも言われる鉱員が採掘に勤しん
でいたが、崩落と巨人の出現により閉山されて
いた。それでも良質鉱石の産地であることに
変わりなく、再開発を望む声は多い
column2:
Lestania's largest mine, the tunnel on the mountainside.
During its heyday, it was said that about a hundred miners worked diligently in the excavation.
However, due to collapses and the appearance of Giants, it was closed down.
Nevertheless, it remains a source of high-quality ore, and there are many voices hoping for its redevelopment.

column1:
レスタニアには地下墓地が多く存在する
元は魔物や病により命を落とした者を清め、大地に
還すため造られたものだったが、不幸にも白竜の
力が衰えたことで瘴気が増し、不死者の巣窟と
化してしまった
column2:
Lestania has many underground tombs.
Originally, they were created to cleanse those who had lost their lives due to monsters and disease, returning them to the earth.
Unfortunately, due to the decline in the power of the White Dragon, the miasma increased and the tombs turned into a nest of the undead.

column1:
レスタニアニュースは毎日更新！
《本日のパーティーボーナス》対象クエストは、
パーティーでクリアすると１日１回、経験値や
エリアポイントなどにボーナスが付きます
クイックパーティーやフレンド、クランメンバーと
チャレンジしよう！
column2:
Lestania News updated everyday!
"Today's Party Bonus"
Target quests will receive a bonus once a day
to the rewarded experience and area points
when you clear them with a party. 
Try challenging them with quick parties,
friends, and clan members!

column1: レスタニアニュース・白竜祭・EXM
column2: Lestania News / White Dragon Festival / EXM

column1: レスタニアを愛する者
レスタニアを信じる者
レスタニアよ永遠なれ
レスタライト・確率小
レスタライト・確率大

覚者を束ねるレオは、時折新人覚者を連れてきて我
々に紹介する
　特段の便宜を計るようにそれとなく伝えてくるの
だ。なんらかの輝きを持つとレオが認めた者らしい
　今日もひとり、新人を連れてきた。わたしには覚者
の資質は皆目わからない。これは率直に認めるしかな
い
　しかし、覚者とて人である。人の善し悪しの見極め
は、この神殿では年長の部類に入るわたしの使命だと
密かに自認している
　さて、あの覚者はどうだろう。レオの人使いの荒さ
についてゆくことができるだろうか
　ともあれ神殿に集う顔ぶれの変化は好ましいこと
だ。新人が竜力の流れを活性化するような気がする
　老いて、肉体ばかりか精神も鈍重になったが、わた
しはまだここを去りたくはない。空気が淀み、その原
因がたとえ自分だとしても退場はまだ先にしたい
　故に、わたしは新しい顔を歓迎するのだ
column2:
Leo, who leads the Arisen, occasionally brings new Arisen to introduce them to us.
He subtly conveys the message that he expects us to accommodate them.
It seems that Leo has recognized them as someone with some kind of brilliance.
Today, he brought another newcomer. I really have no idea about the potential of an Arisen.
I can only be honest and admit this.
However, an Arisen is still a person. Assessing the goodness or badness of a person is secretly my mission as one of the elders of this temple.

Now, how will that Arisen fare? Will they be able to withstand Leo's rough handling of people?

In any case, it is good that the faces in the temple are changing. I have a feeling that newcomers can activate the flow of Dragon Force.

Though I have grown old and not just physically but mentally sluggish, I still don't want to leave this place. Even if the air stagnates, even if it's because of myself, I still want to stay a little longer.

That's why I welcome the new faces.

column1:
レオを中心とした決死隊はズールを倒すという華々
しい戦果を上げる一方で、新たなアークの出現を許し
てしまった。だが、最大の事件はレオの留守中に神殿
で起こったことだろう
　神殿は魔物の侵入を許してしまっていた。しかも小
賢しいことに魔物どもの破壊活動は陽動だったのだ
　あろうことか敵の目的はミシアルの誘拐だった。神
殿内の警備を強化していた騎士団が出し抜かれたのも
無理はない
　敵の中心にいて魔物を差配していたのは覚者イリス
だった。その姿を頼もしく感じる者がほとんどで、ま
さか彼女が敵側だとは誰も思わなかった
　イリスの要求はズールの命が納められた器とミシア
ルの交換だ。かばい続けたレオもここに至り覚悟を固
めたようだ
column2:
Leo's teams decisive actions successfully achieved the glorious feat of defeating Zuhl. However, they inadvertently allowed the emergence of a new Ark. But the biggest incident occurred in Leo's absence at the temple.
The temple had allowed the invasion of monsters. And to make matters worse, the monsters' destructive activities were just a diversion.
Unbelievably, the enemy's objective was the kidnapping of Mysial. It was not surprising that the knight's order, who had strengthened the security in the temple, was outmaneuvered.

At the center of the enemy, managing the monsters, was the Arisen Iris. Most people found her presence reliable, and no one could have imagined she was on the enemy's side.

Iris demanded the exchange of Zuhl's life for Mysial. Leo, who had protected her all this time, seemed to have made up his mind.

column1:
レオはミシアルを連れ帰ることができなかった。誇
り高き巫女は命を敵に利用されることを拒み、同時
に、レオたちに勝機を与えるために自らの命を断った
のだ
　その献身でレオは敵を打ち倒すことができたが、そ
の敵とは、かつての盟友であるイリスだ
　なんという悲劇だろうか。だが、出来事が巡り巡っ
た結果の運命の悪戯による悲劇ではない。裏で巧みに
登場人物たちを操った者がいるのだ。忌まわしきディ
アマンテスだ
　封じられた錬金術師に対抗するために、魔物の命を
白竜に捧げ、竜力の加護を得るべきだとわたしは考え
た。クラウスは、魔物の命を使って敵の本拠に乗り込
むべきだと主張した
　しかし、我々の論争は無駄に終わった。魔物の命を
所持したままレオが姿を消してしまっていたのだ
column2:
Leo couldn't bring Mysial back. The proud priestess refused to be used as a pawn and sacrificed herself to give Leo and the others a chance to win. Leo was able to defeat the enemy with this dedication, but the enemy turned out to be Iris, a former ally.
What a tragedy it was. However, this tragedy was not a result of a cruel twist of fate. There was someone who skillfully manipulated the characters behind the scenes. The detestable Diamantes.

To counter the sealed alchemist, I believed that we should offer the lives of monsters to the White Dragon and gain the protection of Dragon Force. Klaus argued that we should use the lives of monsters to infiltrate the enemy's stronghold.

However, our debate was in vain. Leo had disappeared with the lives of monsters.

戦徒リュカによって導かれた先の島の入り江
空には常に暗雲が厚く漂い、島の位置はおろか
現在の時間すら推し量ることができない
岩場の険しさや荒れ果てた様子から、生者が
居ないことだけは確かなようだ
column2:
Led by the Myrmidon Lyka, we arrive at an inlet on the remote island. 
The sky is always filled with thick dark clouds, so much so that it is impossible to even determine the current time. 
The treacherous cliffs and desolate appearance suggest that there are no living beings present.

column1:
傷つき、動けない我々を残し
ベンジャミン様は一人、行ってしまわれました
目的を達するためには足手まといは不要――
そういうことなのでしょう
column2: Leaving us wounded and immobilized behind, Master Benjamin went on alone. To achieve the objective, we can't have anything slowing us down—perhaps that was the reason.

メルガン技師の研究室
技師の中にも、竜を排すという異端思想に傾倒
した者が少なからずいた。そういった思想の信徒が
使っていた研究室は封鎖、監視対象となっている
ここも、何らかの研究のため使われていたようだ
column2:
Laboratory of Engineer Mergan.
Here, there were some who were inclined towards the heretical idea of rejecting dragons. 
The research facility used by those who believed in such ideas has been shut down and placed under surveillance. 
It seems that this place was also used for some kind of research.

ロッドの放射光を敵に照らしつづけることで

Keep the rod focused on an enemy, and radiate a light that
builds up the Petrified status abnormality on them.
When the Force Gauge has one or more charges, they will be
automatically consumed to increase the skill's performance.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Petrified status accumulation.
LV.6: Increases the range of the light.</COL>

column1: 密林の鍾乳洞　深部

垂直に跳び上がり、空中に錬成物質で生成した罠を
配置する。その後、後方に素早く身を引く
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に罠の攻撃回数上昇
LV.６で空中でも発動可能</COL>
column2:
Jump up and form a trap from an alchemical substance
in the air. When deployed, quickly launch backwards.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases number of trap activations.
LV.6: Allows activation while mid-air.</COL>

column1:
高く跳躍し、一点集中で力強く大剣を突き立てる
攻撃範囲は狭いが威力は絶大
落下距離により威力が上昇
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
Jump high upward, viciously thrusting the blade at
a concentrated point with great force. The attack's
range is very narrow, but it carries tremendous power.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases number of hits.</COL>

column1: アイボリーファングピアス

凄腕のマタギ、イヴァンが住む山小屋
彼の腕は《ハンター》としてレスタニア随一
であると、知る人ぞ知る有名人
だが気難しい性格のためか、戦技を教えて
もらえる者はまれらしい
column2:
Ivan, a skilled hunter, resides in a mountain cabin. 
His prowess as a Hunter is renowned throughout Lestania. 
However, due to his difficult personality, it is rare for anyone to receive instruction in his combat techniques.

column1: 道具屋・ジョブマスター：ハンター
装備のアイテムランクが<QCND 0>以上（平均IR）
column2: Item Rank of <QCND 0> or more (average IR)

column1:
これほどに醜く、滑稽な姿の魔物は見た事が無い
変な話だが――自分があの魔物として
生まれなかった事に、感謝を覚えてすらいる
column2:
It's strange that I have never previously seen demons of such an ugly,
comical figure like this...I should remember to be thankful, to have not been born into
this world as one of those demons.
It's Not What You Think It Is

column1:
青爪浜にある廃村ルフローの地下室
ブリア海岸の奥は強力な魔物が多いため
とっさに逃げ場のない地下室の探索時は
準備をしておく方がいいだろう
column2: It would be wise to prepare before exploring the underground chamber of the deserted village of Ruflow in Blue Claw Beach, as the depths of Breya Coast are home to many powerful enemies.

column1: 完成まで、いましばらくかかります
column2: It will take some time before it is complete.

column1: 完成まで、いましばらくかかります
column2: It will take some time before it is complete.

column1: 気合い十分で作業にかかっています！
column2: It will take plenty of work and fighting spirit!

column1:
ベヘモットを倒し、宝を入手できたのは良かったが
それを塔まで持ち帰るのに苦労した――
column2:
It was satisfying to beat that behemoth and get treasure from it,
but I had a hard time bringing it back to the tower...

column1:
危ない所だった――
ただでさえ怪力で厄介なサイクロプスが
侵食によって、およそ生物とは
思えない力を発揮していた
column2:
It was a dangerous place...
Even a simple Cyclops, already troublesome due to its sturdiness,
was demonstrating an unexpected strength when corrupted by these strange
organisms.

column1:
以前は人が暮らす小さな拠点として機能していたが
侵食魔に脅かされた住人たちは土地を捨てて
逃げることを選び、現在は魔物が闊歩するのみ
となっている
column2: It used to function as a small hub of human habitation, but threatened by the invading demons, the residents chose to abandon their land and flee, and now it is only a place where demons roam.

column1:
フィンダムの芯なる樹の回復には、原始の雫と呼ば
れる大変に貴重な物質が必要であることが判明し、勇
敢なるガラダと有志たちが入手したのだが、何者かに
襲われて奪取されるという事件が発生した
　襲撃でガラダは重傷を負い、同行の三名は命を落と
したと聞く。傷から見て、彼らを襲ったのは魔物らし
いが、はて、原始の雫を持ち去ったのもその魔物だろ
うか
　ガラダの回復が待たれる
column2:
It turned out that a very precious substance called a Primeval Drop was needed to restore the core tree. Brave Gearóid and a group of volunteers managed to acquire it, but an incident occurred where they were attacked and the drops were taken by someone.
I heard that Gearóid was seriously injured in the attack, and three others who were with him lost their lives. Judging by their wounds, it seems that they were attacked by enemies, but I wonder if those enemies were the ones who took the Primeval Drops.

We are all waiting for Gearóid's recovery.

column1: 今は転移の力を失っているようだ――
column2: It seems to have lost the power to teleport...

column1:
門のような意匠がある
わずかに不思議な気配を感じる――
column2:
It seems to have a design similar to a gate.
It makes you feel slightly strange...

column1: 何かが引っ掛かって開かない
column2: It seems to be caught on something.

column1:
本当にこのモロー樹林の侵食は、深刻なようです
侵食の治療はなんとか可能であるものの
根本的な原因が何か判明していない以上――
かからないに越したことはありません
column2:
It seems that the corruption of the "Morrow Forest" has gotten
serious. Although the treatment of corruption is somehow possible, I do not know
what has initially caused it to form...
It's best that I don't take anything from here.

column1:
覚者たちはついに異郷フィンダムの住民たちとの交
流を始めたようだ。ガルドリンは無事に合流し、ロイ
グの捜索は現地の住民たちに引き継がれることとなっ
た
　案の定という言い方は不遜ではあるが、レスタニア
が巻きこまれたこの変事の原因は、やはり“芯なる
樹”が侵食されたことにあるようだ
　せめてもの救いは、問題解決のためにセシリーの父
ガラダが動きだしていることだ。もちろん我々が協力
を惜しむ道理はない
column2:
It seems that the Arisen have finally begun to interact with the residents of the foreign land, Phindym. Gurdolin has safely joined them, and the search for Loeg will be taken over by the local residents.

As expected, the cause of this incident that involved Lestania is the corruption of the "Core Tree". The only consolation is that Cecily's father, Gearóid, is taking action to resolve the problem. Of course, there is no reason for us to hesitate in offering our cooperation.

column1:
癒しの力を当てることで
あの奇妙な触手の威力を
一定時間抑えることができるようなのです
column2: It seems that applying the power of healing can temporarily suppress the strange tentacles' power.

column1:
フィンダムの竜が覚者たちを襲ったらしい。襲われ
たのがこちらの覚者だけならわからないでもないが、
セシリーも一緒に標的にされたそうだ
　いったいどういうことだろうか。レスタニア帰りの
セシリーが、まさにそのことが理由で後継者としての
資格を失ってしまったとすれば、我々にとって愉快な
話ではない
　しかし、予断は禁物だ。覚者たちの続報を持つこと
にして、竜の攻撃ではぐれてしまったというガルドリ
ンとロイグの無事を祈りたい
column2:
It seems that a dragon from Phindym attacked the Arisen. If it had only attacked the Arisen here, it might not be completely incomprehensible, but it seems that Cecily was also targeted.
What on earth could this mean? If Cecily, who had just returned from Lestania, lost her qualifications as the successor for that very reason, it is not a pleasant story for us.

However, we must not jump to conclusions. Let us hope for the safety of Gurdolin and Loeg, who were separated from the Arisen due to the dragon's attack and await further reports on the Arisen.

column1:
ミシアルが覚者のひとりと散歩に出たようだ。かつ
て少年だったわたしも彼女と歩いたことがある
　気の利いた行き先など知るはずもなく、バザーをひ
やかす恋人たちを眺めて過ごしたものだ
　大会議では古文書の査読が続いている。嵐の前の静
けさとはこのことだろうか。願わくは、嵐など起こら
ないことを
column2:
It seems that Mysial has gone for a walk with one of the Arisen. There was a time when I as young boy, walked with her. We spent our time watching the lovers who were teasing the bazaar, without knowing any clever destinations.

At the grand assembly, the review of ancient documents continues. Is this the calm before the storm? It is my hope that no storms will occur.

column1:
セシリーはフィンダム大陸から、その地の竜に助け
られるかたちで、このレスタニアに来たようだ。探索
隊が例の島を発見し、セシリーと覚者隊が再訪したと
ころ、彼女の記憶が一部だが、戻ったらしい
　もう一点、レスタニアを侵食するように展開する侵
食魔どもは、フィンダムの魔物が侵食されてなり果て
た姿らしい
　いったい、侵食とは何事なのだろうか。フィンダム
に蔓延する病気か何かだろうか。我々は侵食から、い
かなる方法でレスタニアを守ればよいのだろうか
　セシリーの記憶の完全な復活が待たれる
column2:
It seems that Cecily came to Lestania from the Phindym continent, in a way that she was helped to by the dragon of that land. The exploration team discovered the infamous island, and Cecily and the Arisen team revisited it, where her memories partially returned.
Furthermore, the corruptors that spread through Lestania seem to be the twisted forms of the monsters from Phindym.

What exactly is corruption? Is it some kind of disease that spreads in Phindym? How can we protect Lestania from corruption, by any means necessary?

We eagerly await the complete restoration of Cecily's memories.

column1: この草花ではないようだ――
column2: It seems like this is not the flower――

column1: 思ったよりもいい感じにまとまりそう
column2: It looks like it's coming together better than I thought.

column1:
ハイデル平原にこれほど多くの敵が入り込んだの
は、長い戦争の歴史の中でも初めてのことだ
　これまでグリッテン砦を落とすことに執着していた
オークどもが方針を変えてダウ渓谷から入り込んだの
だ
　この方針の転換が意味するものは何か。ヴァネッサ
は、オークと手を組んだズールと呼ばれる魔物が軍師
の役割を果たしていると推測しているようだ。となれ
ばズールの狙いが問題だ
　また、敵の戦いぶりについても様々な報告を受けて
いる。特に気になるのは、奴らの目的は作物や財宝で
はなく、我々の命そのものだったのではないかという
推測だ
　命の使い道を今や、我々はよく知っている。では、
我々にとっての白竜に相当する者が彼らにもいるのだ
ろうか。その存在、不在を我々はどのようにして知る
ことができるだろうか
　有識者の意見を求め、じっくりと考える必要があ
る
column2:
It is the first time in the history of the long war that so many enemies have infiltrated the Hidell Plains.
The orcs, who had been obsessed with capturing Gritten Fort, changed their strategy and infiltrated from Dowe Valley.
What does this change in strategy mean? It seems that Vanessa speculates that a creature called Zuhl, who has joined forces with the orcs, is playing the role of a strategist. In that case, the goal of Zuhl is the problem.

There have also been various reports about the enemy's fighting style. What is particularly concerning is the speculation that their objective was not crops or treasures, but our lives themselves.

We now know well what our lives are used for. So, could there be someone among them who is equivalent to our White Dragon? How can we determine their presence or absence?

We need to seek the opinions of experts and think carefully.

column1: 不思議な力で封印されている
column2: It is sealed with a mysterious force.

column1:
かつて、ドリード城主がドリード監視塔と城を
繋ぐために作ったと言われる地下道
そのため入口の一つは塔の近くに、もう一つは
城のどこかと繋がっているらしい
罪人の墓地としても利用されたようだ
column2:
It is said that the underground passage was once created by the Lord of Dreed Castle to connect the Dreed Watchtower and the castle. 
As a result, one entrance is said to be near the tower, and the other one is apparently connected somewhere in the castle. 
It appears that it was also used as a graveyard for criminals.

column1:
聖域から降りてきた魔物が棲むと伝えられる
鍾乳洞。入り組んだ構造から奥へ進む者は
おらず、どのような魔物が巣食っているのかは
謎に包まれたままとなっている
column2:
It is said that monsters that have descended from the sacred grounds inhabit the limestone cave.
No one has ventured further into its intricate structure, leaving the question of what kind of enemy lurks there shrouded in mystery.

column2:

column1: エリアマスターにより封鎖されている――
column2: It is blocked by the Area Master.

column1:
長く関わりすぎたのだ
大きな力を持つ物は人を強く引きつけるが
それが淀み――侵されていれば、悲劇を呼ぶ
column2: It is because they possess great power that they strongly attract people, but if that power stagnates or is invaded, it will bring tragedy.

column1:
驚くべき発見です！
ピクシーが、これほど高度な社会的序列を築いて
いたとは――しかも、その強固さは
比較対象にされることの多いゴブリン以上です
column2:
It is a surprising discovery!
I had no idea that Pixies had built such a high level of social hierarchy - and moreover, its strength is greater than that of the commonly compared Goblin.

column1: 厳重に封印されている――

第二のアークがバートランド平原に落下しているこ
とが判明し、今回はわたし自身が調査に行った
　魔物に阻まれて、短時間観察しただけだが、戻り、
記憶がまだ鮮明なうちに古文書の記述や図版と照らし
合わせた。すると、アークの奥底にあった装置の機能
が把握できたのだ
　それは命をエネルギーに変換する装置だった。我々
が「竜力」と呼ぶものとほとんど同じものを、あの装
置は作ることができる
　人が竜と同等の力を手に入れることができるのだ。
けして人間が所有してはいけない代物だ
　ディアマンテスやその息のかかった者どもが装置で
何をしようと企てているのかなど問題ではない。この
レスタニアに存在が許されない装置は今すぐにでも破
壊されねばならないのだ
　案の定クラウスが反対したが、今回ばかりは従って
もらわねばならない。それが彼のためでもあるのだ
column2:
It has been confirmed that the Second Ark has fallen in the Betland Plains, so I went to investigate it myself.
Although I was hindered by enemies and only observed for a short time, I returned and compared my memories with the descriptions and illustrations in ancient documents. As a result, I was able to understand the function of the device at the bottom of the Ark.
It was a device that converted energy into life force. It can create something very similar to what we call "Dragon Force."

Humans will be able to obtain the power equivalent to that of a dragon. This is something that humans should never possess.

It doesn't matter what Diamantes and his followers are planning to do with the device. This device, which is not allowed to exist in Lestania, must be destroyed immediately.

As expected, Klaus opposed it, but he must comply this time. It's also for his own sake.

column1:
まさか本当に存在していたとはな！
ああ、触れているだけで
手のひらがピリピリと痛むほどの冷気を感じる
どれほどの魔力を秘めているのか――
column2:
It certainly did exist, and must've existed for a while now!
Oh, just touching it has made a painful tingling chill linger in my palm.
Just how much magical power is hidden within it...?

column1: こちら側からは開かないようだ
column2: It cannot open from this side.

column1:
古代に住居として使用されていたらしき洞窟
最近はピクシーが棲みつき、人間が足を
踏み入れることは難しい状況にある。奥は猛獣が
縄張りとしているとの情報もあったが
ピクシーたちが必死に通路を塞いだようだ
column2:
It appears that this cave was once used as a dwelling in ancient times. 
Recently, it has been inhabited by pixies, making it difficult for humans to enter. 
There is also information that there are fierce animals deep inside, but it seems that the pixies have desperately blocked the passage.

column1:
肉食の魔物が獲物を貯蓄しているらしく
おびただしい数の死肉が散乱している
死肉の臭いが新たなる魔物を呼ぶため
それを漁る魔物は増加の一路を辿って
いるようだ
column2:
It appears that the carnivorous monsters are storing their prey.
An enormous amount of dead flesh is scattered around.
The smell of the dead flesh is attracting new monsters, and the monsters that are scavenging for it seem to be increasing.

column2:
Intermediate point through which the demon army passes when advancing. 
It has been reported that they temporarily replenish supplies here and Orcs maintain their armor before departing for their destination.

水門を通る大量の水をテゴル川やセラー湖へと
浄化し流す役割を持っていた。だが何らかの理由
で神官長により封鎖されたようだ
column2:
Inside the Temple of Purification, there is an underground waterway that used to have the role of purifying and redirecting a large amount of water through the water gate to the Tegor River and Lake Cera. 
However, for some reason, it seems to have been sealed by the High Priest.

column1:
メガド城壁内、最奥に位置する広場
ドワーフオークが捕えた魔物に対して戦甲を
装着するために使われている。魔物は戦甲に
よって自らの意思を制御され、ドワーフオークに
使役される存在となる
column2:
Inside Megado Castle, at the very back, there is a plaza where beasts captured by Dwarf Orcs are dressed in battle armor.
The enemies are controlled by the battle armor, making them subservient to the Dwarf Orcs.

column1:
石棺に文字が刻まれている――
“我が欲望は光に焼かれて人外となる
探究と秘密を愛する者よ、どうか我が身に平穏を
高貴なるサマラの指に輝きし光
人の目に余る煌めきサマラに帰るべし”
column2:
Inscriptions are carved into the stone coffin:
"My desires are consumed by the light, turning me into something beyond human.
To the seeker of exploration and secrets, please bring peace to my soul.
Where the radiant light shines on the noble fingers of Samara,
Return to Samara with a brilliance beyond human eyes."
