column1: 未完の魔眼パイモンルビーアイ
未完の魔眼パイモンラピスアイ

この調子で、もう少し――
主人の心に寄り添えるポーンになりたいものです
column2:
In this manner, just a little further...
I'll become a pawn that is closer to my master's heart.

column1:
西部にはアッカーシェラン最大の湖《翡翠湖》が
広がっているのが最大の特徴。
その大きな湖からもたらされる恵みの一つが
大振りで上品な味の魚であり、地域の村や
集落には独自の魚料理が発達している
column2: In the western region, the largest lake in Acre Selund, known as "Emerald Lake," spreads out, which is its main feature of area. One of the blessings brought by this large lake is the large and elegant-tasting fish, which has led to the development of unique fish cuisine in the local villages and settlements.

column1:
禁域と東部の狭間の谷に、奇妙なバランスで
そびえる岩がある。その岩の周囲には、不思議と
不気味な物が集まりやすいようだ。不浄の魔物が
発生していた場合でも、急いで抜ければ追い
つかれることはないはずだ
column2: In the valley between the Forbidden Zone and the eastern region, there stands a peculiar, towering rock formation. It seems that strange and eerie things are naturally drawn to its surroundings. Even if foul enemies were to emerge, one should be able to escape without being pursued if they hurry.

column1:
バートランド平原丘陵にある、北部の民の
地下墓地。オーク侵攻の際、劣勢になった騎士や
覚者が籠城し、追っ手のオーク共々内部から
出入り口を封じたという
column2: In the underground burial grounds of the Betland Plains Hills, located in the north, the knights and Arisen who were outnumbered during the Orc invasion took refuge and sealed the entrance from inside.

column1:
かつては蛮族の地と呼ばれた南部地方に睨みを
きかせる要衝として建造された
アッカーシェラン大陸ではメガド離宮、王都メガドに
次いで古い建造物。城主はアッカー家の当主だが
実質的な管理者である“城番”は兵士が就くことが
できる最高位とされている
column2:
In the southern region, which was once called the land of barbarians, a strategic point was built to intimidate the surrounding area. 
It is the third oldest structure in the Acre Selund continent, following the Megado Detached Palace and the Royal Capital Megado. 
While the lord of the Acre family is the castle owner, the "Castle Sentinel", who is the actual administrator, is considered the highest position that soldiers can hold.

column1:
かつては蛮族の地と呼ばれた南部地方に睨みを
きかせる要衝として建造された
アッカーシェラン大陸ではメガド離宮、王都メガドに
次いで古い建造物。城主はアッカー家の当主だが
実質的な管理者である“城番”は兵士が就くことが
できる最高位とされている
column2:
In the southern region, which was once called the land of barbarians, a strategic point was built to intimidate the surrounding area. 
It is the third oldest structure in the Acre Selund continent, following the Megado Detached Palace and the Royal Capital Megado. 
While the lord of the Acre family is the castle owner, the "Castle Sentinel", who is the actual administrator, is considered the highest position that soldiers can hold.

column1:
森の南部に位置する小洞窟
内部にはそこそこ開けた空間があり
魔獣の類が巣にしているらしい
時おり、外にまで唸り声が聞こえるという
column2:
In the southern part of the forest, there is a small cave. 
Inside, there is a decently spacious area. 
It seems that creatures of the magical kind have made their nests there. 
Occasionally, their growls can be heard from outside.

column1:
フェルヤナ荒原南部、多数のオークが出入りする洞窟
自然の洞窟を利用した拠点のように偽装しているが
内部が強力な兵器を集めた武器庫として使われている
ことは、時折洞窟の奥から響く轟音から明らかである
column2:
In the southern area of the Feryana Wilderness, there is a cave where numerous orcs come and go. 
It is disguised as a natural cave, but it is evident from the occasional roar that echoes from the depths of the cave that it is actually being used as an arsenal gathering powerful weapons.

column1:
特に危険なドレッドエイプ、《裂き猿》が
巣くっている廃屋
廃屋の周囲は正体不明の死肉が散乱しており
不気味な様子を醸し出している
column2: In the rundown building where the ferocious Dread Ape, "Ripper Ape," resides, there are unidentified pieces of dead flesh scattered around, creating an eerie atmosphere.

column1:
禁域南東部の遺跡群には、文化を失い蛮行を
働き生き続けてきた集団が居付いている。彼ら
《ザンドラ・バルバロイ》に交渉や説得は不可能
なため、遭遇時は流血沙汰を覚悟しなければ
ならないだろう
column2: In the ruins in the southeastern forbidden area, there is a group called the Zandora Barbarians who have lost their culture and continue to engage in savage acts. Negotiation and persuasion with them are impossible, so one must be prepared for bloodshed if encountered.

column1:
王宮内研究室、メルガン・アルケミデアで
あのズールと思しき魔物が目撃された
どうやら、錬金術師が複製体の創造
に成功したらしい。複製体が意思を持つ前に
どうにか食い止めなければならない
column2:
In the royal research laboratory, Mergan Alchemdia, the enemy that appears to be Zuhl has been sighted.
It seems that the alchemists have succeeded in creating a duplicate.
We must somehow stop it before the duplicate gains consciousness.

column1:
城塞都市メガドにて一般市民が住まう居住層
メガド全体から見ると下層にあたり、大陸の人口の
過半数が暮らしていた
長きに渡り繁栄を誇っていたが、魔軍の急襲に
よって蹂躙され、多くの住民が命を落とした
column2:
In the residential layer of Fortress City Megado, where ordinary citizens reside, it is known as the lower level and where over half of the continent's population lived. 
It had been prosperous for a long time, but it was devastated by a sudden attack from the Demon Army, and many residents lost their lives.

column1:
城塞都市メガドにて一般市民が住まう居住層
メガド全体から見ると下層にあたり、大陸の人口の
過半数が暮らしていた
長きに渡り繁栄を誇っていたが、魔軍の急襲に
よって蹂躙され、多くの住民が命を落とした
column2:
In the residential layer of Fortress City Megado, where ordinary citizens reside, it is known as the lower level and where over half of the continent's population lived. 
It had been prosperous for a long time, but it was devastated by a sudden attack from the Demon Army, and many residents lost their lives.

column1:
旧時代、各地に祭られた白竜の祭壇の一つ
ボルド鉱山の頂き近くにあり、キノザからもその
姿を見ることができる。まだ参拝者もいるが
巨鳥が近くに巣くってしまい、悩みの種と
なっている
column2:
In the past, there was a white dragon altar that was celebrated in various places. 
One of them is located near the peak of Volden Mines, and its presence can also be seen from Kinoza. 
There are still visitors, but a giant bird has built its nest nearby, causing troubles and becoming a source of worry.

column1:
旧時代、錬金研究の実験所だった地下施設
現在内部がどうなっているかは不明だが
秘術の実験体など忌まわしい研究の産物が
潜んでいる可能性は大きい
column2: In the past, it was an underground facility for alchemic research. The current state of its interior is unknown. However, there is a high possibility that abominable creations of forbidden experiments, such as experimental subjects of secret arts, may be lurking.

column1:
旧時代、各地に祭られた白竜の祭壇の一つ
渓谷深くにひっそりとたたずんでいるが
風景と相まって廃墟化した今も美しさが残る
column2:
In the olden days, this was one of the altars of the White Dragon, which was celebrated in various places. 
It stands quietly, deep in the valley, but even now, amidst its ruins, it retains its beauty, blending with the landscape.

column1:
旧時代、各地に祭られた白竜の祭壇
白竜神殿に人が集ったことで祠の多くは廃墟化
しているが、中には管理され本来とは異なる用途で
機能しているものもある
column2:
In the olden days, altars dedicated to the White Dragon were celebrated all over the land. 
Due to people gathering at the White Dragon Temple, many shrines have fallen into ruins. 
However, there are some that are still maintained and used for purposes different from their original intention.

column1:
旧時代、ドリード城と周辺の警戒のため建てられた
監視塔。ダウが関所で封鎖される前は、騎士団詰め所
として前時代と同じく利用されていたが、侵入した
オーク軍との一戦により壊滅、再び廃墟と化した
現在は、死肉に集ったハーピーが占拠している
column2:
In the olden days, a surveillance tower was built to guard Dreed Castle and its surroundings. 
Before Dowe was sealed off at the checkpoint, it was used as a knights' headquarters, just like in the previous era. 
However, it was destroyed and turned into ruins again due to a battle with the invading Orc army. 
Currently, it is occupied by Harpies gathering dead flesh.

column1:
旧時代、レスタニアでは水の制御技術が現在より
発達していた。禊の神殿に代表されるような治水術
は今や失われ、旧水路のほとんどは湿気と汚水
魔物の溜まり場となっている
column2: In the old days, water control technology in Lestania was more advanced than it is now. Flood control techniques, such as the Temple of Purification, have been lost, and most of the old waterways have become gathering places for moisture, sewage, and monsters.

column1:
旧時代、各地に祭られた白竜の祭壇の一つ
ミスリウ森林深部を見守る管理者がおり
森深くを訪れる者にとっては大切な
憩いの場所である
column2:
In the old days, there was a shrine of the White Dragon that was celebrated in various places. 
In the deep part of Mysree Forest, there is a guardian who watches over it, and it is an important place for visitors who delve into the depths of the forest to find solace and relaxation.

column1:
北東部には、アッカーシェラン王国にとっての要衝
である《展望城》が存在する。通常、王族が居留
することはなく、兵士たちによる防衛拠点として機能
していた。水脈が豊富である一方で水はけの悪い地質
であり、ぬかるみや滝が多いため足元には注意が必要
column2:
In the northeastern region, there is a critical stronghold for the Kingdom of Acre Selund, called "Lookout Castle." 
It usually functions as a defensive base for the soldiers and is not typically inhabited by the royal family. 
The area has abundant water veins, but due to its poor drainage, there are many muddy areas and waterfalls, requiring caution when walking.

column1:
魔赤島の北東部、一際標高が高い一帯
空に渦巻く何らかのエネルギー体に
最も近く、赤く照らされている
column2:
In the northeastern part of Bloodbane Isle, there is an especially high elevation area, 
where some kind of energy body swirls in the sky close to it and illuminating it in red.

column1:
魔赤島の北東部、一際標高が高い一帯
空に渦巻く何らかのエネルギー体に
最も近く、赤く照らされている
column2:
In the northeastern part of Bloodbane Isle, there is an especially high elevation area, 
where some kind of energy body swirls in the sky close to it and illuminating it in red.

column1:
ウルテカ山岳　北部は元よりアンセスターオークや
その他の魔獣が多く生息する一帯であったが
戦乱によってそれぞれの住処に変化が生じたようだ
ここでは特にアンセスターオークの群れが勢いを
持っている様子が報告され、要注意スポットである
column2:
In the north, there used to be home to many Ancestor Orcs and other magical creatures. 
Due to the ongoing conflict, there have been changes in their respective habitats. 
It has been reported that particularly in this area, there is a strong presence of Ancestor Orc herds, making it a spot that requires caution.

column1:
湿った黒土の谷間に、一頭のナイトメアが飛来した
かつてメルゴダの民が《嘆きのモーラ》と呼び
白竜自らが撃退せしめた恐るべき魔鳥である
放置すれば、レスタニア全土の危機となる
可能性がある
column2: In the moist crevice of black soil, a Nightmare flew in. It was once known as the "Wailing Mora" by the people of Mergoda, a fearsome bird that the White Dragon himself repelled. If left unchecked, it could pose a threat to the entire land of Lestania.

column1:
アッカーシェランの動乱のほとぼりも冷めやらぬ中
で、白竜が掴み取った予兆は、このレスタニア、いや
竜の理の世界にとっては、あまりにも大きな禍の前触
れであった
　先の動乱の裏で、遠く離れた場所に存在していたで
あろう水竜が治める大陸は、既に黒竜と黒騎士、そし
てあろうことか、長らく行方知れずとなっていたレオ
によって滅ぼされたのだという
　その衝撃的な事実を我々が掴んだタイミングにおい
て、ついに黒竜は世界を滅ぼす皮切りとして、フィン
ダムの空に禍々しい滅びの渦を出現させたのだ
　フィンダムの滅びは、竜の理の世界の滅びに等し
い。白竜にフィンダムの救いを託された覚者たちは、
フィンダムの滅びの渦を消し去ろうと奔走する。そし
て渦の前で、あの黒騎士を伴ったレオと再会したのだ
そうだ。レオは彼らにはっきりと、黒竜の闇の陣営に
与したことを認めたのだという。なんと嘆かわしいこ
とだろうか
　レオは彼らに、竜の持つ竜力の争奪を匂わせ去って
行ったという。より多くの竜力を集めた方が、この戦
いの勝敗を握る鍵となるとも受け取れるが、果たして
その真意は未だに見えぬ
　フィンダムに現れた渦の勢いを一時的に弱めること
には成功したが、渦を完全に消し去ることは叶わず、
今後も渦の魔物を幾度となく打ち払う飽くなき戦いが
予想されるだろう
column2:
In the midst of the still raging turmoil in Acre Selund, the White Dragon's premonition was a harbinger of great disaster for the world of Lestania, and indeed, for the world of dragonkind.
Behind the recent upheaval, on a distant continent ruled by the Water Dragon, the Black Dragon and the Black Knight, along with Leo, who had long been missing, had annihilated it.
At the moment we learned of this shocking fact, the Black Dragon, as a prelude to destroying the world, unleashed a sinister vortex of destruction in the skies of Phindym.

The destruction of Phindym is equivalent to the annihilation of the dragon world. The Arisen entrusted with the salvation of Phindym are striving to eradicate the Vortex of Stagnation. And there, they encountered Leo, accompanied by the Black Knight, before the vortex. It is said that Leo unreservedly admitted his allegiance to the dark forces of the Black Dragon. How tragic.

Leo hinted to them about the competition for Dragon Force possessed by the dragons. It can be inferred that acquiring more Dragon Force would be the key to determining the outcome of this battle, but the true intention behind it is still unclear.

Although they succeeded in temporarily weakening the force of the vortex that appeared in Phindym, they were unable to completely eliminate it, and a ceaseless battle of repelling the monsters within the vortex is anticipated in the future.

column1:
リンウッドからミスリウ森林深部へと向かう一本道の
中ほどにある、少し開けた場所。背の高い木々が多く
鬱蒼としている上に靄が出やすく、開けた印象の割に
視界が悪い。そのためか盗賊や魔物が潜みやすく
森を抜ける際の一番の難所と言われる
column2:
In the middle of the straight road leading from Lynwood to Mysree Grove in the Mysree Forest, there is a slightly open area. There are many tall trees, and it is dense and foggy, despite the open impression. 
The visibility is poor, making it easy for bandits and enemies to lurk. 
It is said to be the most challenging place to pass through the forest.

column1:
バートランド平原中ほどにある廃墟の
地下室。前に中を検分した隊士はあまりの
乾燥で喉がすぐやられてしまったそうだ
当時は、食糧や遺体がオークにより多数
投げ込まれ、酷い状態だったという
column2:
In the middle of the Betland Plains, there is a cellar in ruins.
A soldier who inspected it before reportedly had his throat quickly dried out due to the extreme arid air. 
At that time, food and bodies were thrown into the cellar by Orcs, and it was in a terrible state.

column1:
東ザンドラ廃墟群のただ中に、忽然と灼熱の
魔像が姿を現したという
盗掘者が掘りあてたのか、遺物が侵入者に
反応したか起動の原因は不明だが、ゾマに
とって新たな心配の種であることは間違いない
column2: In the heart of the East Zandora Ruins, a scorching hot magical statue suddenly materialized. Whether it was unearthed by looters or if it was triggered by the intrusion of relics, the exact cause of its activation remains unclear. Nevertheless, it is undoubtedly a new source of worry for Zoma.

column1:
オークが根城とする大砦《ガルドノック砦》において
戦力の中核を担う地位にあるオークがいる詰所
近頃妙にオークの出入りが多く、周囲の住人からは
この《戦鬼の陣屋》にて何らかの作戦会議が
行われているのではないかと不安の声が上がっている
column2:
In the great fortress "Fort Galdnok" where the orcs have their stronghold, there is an orc camp where orcs are in a position to play a central role in the war.
Recently, orcs have been coming and going strangely, and the surrounding residents are concerned that some kind of strategy meeting is being held in this "War Demons' Encampment".

column1:
ダウ渓谷東部、最も標高の高い崖上に、石象の並ぶ
奇妙な空間がある。そこに、昔ジンゲンに甚大な
被害を出したスフィンクスが再び姿を現した
《妖歌のローレライ》と呼ばれるこのスフィンクスを
確認した際は、急ぎ手を打つ必要がある
column2:
In the eastern part of the Dowe Valley, on the highest cliff, there is a strange space lined with stone statues. 
There, the sphinx that caused enormous damage to Jingen in the past has reappeared.
This sphinx, known as the "Demon Songtress Lorelei" must be dealt with urgently if it is confirmed!

column1:
《ボルド大坑道》の最奥、地層の硬さにより掘削が
見送られた洞穴部。数々の問題を解決して再開発を
行おうとした矢先、不気味な噂が流れて鉱員が
逃げ出し、再び開発の手が中断されることとなった
column2:
In the depths of the Volden Large Tunnels, mining was halted due to the hardness of the earth layers. 
As they attempted to solve numerous problems and proceed with redevelopment, eerie rumors spread and the miners fled, causing the development to once again come to a halt.

column1:
ファーラナ平原奥地にある湿地帯
霧が発生しやすく視界が悪いことが多い
甲竜が棲息しており、目を凝らせば霧の
奥でゆっくりと動く巨影を確認することができる
column2:
In the depths of the Farana Plains, there is a marshland where mist often forms, making visibility poor.
Beasts known as "Shell Dragons" reside there, and if you focus your eyes, you can confirm the slow-moving silhouette deep within the mist.

column1:
エラン水林の奥、紫色の花が群生する場所
ほのかに甘い香りが漂うため、花を摘もうと
この場を訪れる者は多い。しかし、芳香に
惹かれるのは人だけではないため、魔物と遭遇
してしまうという不運に見舞われることもある
column2:
In the depths of Elan Water Grove, there is a place where purple flowers bloom in abundance. 
Many people visit this place with the intention of picking the flowers, as a faint sweet fragrance fills the air. 
However, not only humans are drawn to this wonderful scent, but also monsters. 
Thus, the unfortunate could encounter them.

column1:
レスタニア最奥、樹海に閉ざされた秘境
樹齢数百年にのぼる巨木が生い茂るこの森は
以前エルフ族が住み、その都を築いた場所である
森の名もまた、エルフ族の言語が元であると
言われている
column2:
In the deepest part Lestania, a hidden paradise secluded in the forest.
This forest, over hundreds of years old, is densely populated by towering ancient trees.
It used to be the home of the Elves, where they built their capital city.
The name of the forest is also said to originate from the language of the elves.

column1:
レスタニア最奥、樹海に閉ざされた秘境
樹齢数百年にのぼる巨木が生い茂るこの森は
以前エルフ族が住み、その都を築いた場所である
森の名もまた、エルフ族の言語が元であると
言われている
column2:
In the deepest part Lestania, a hidden paradise secluded in the forest.
This forest, over hundreds of years old, is densely populated by towering ancient trees.
It used to be the home of the Elves, where they built their capital city.
The name of the forest is also said to originate from the language of the elves.

column1:
森林深部、イニアス湖の北岸に密猟者がキャンプを
構えている。たちの悪いことに、密猟者が獲物とする
のは獣だけではなく、狩人や旅人も含むという
不意の狙撃に合わぬよう、十分な警戒が必要だ
column2:
In the deep part of the forest, poachers have set up a camp on the north shore of Lake Inias. 
Unfortunately, the poachers target not only animals as their prey, but also hunters and travelers. 
To avoid unexpected sniper attacks, it is necessary to be vigilant and cautious.

column1:
ミスリウ森林深部、西側にある古い遺跡
内部もまた緑で覆われ、野獣や森小人が
現在の主となっている
column2:
In the deep part of Mysree Forest, there is an ancient ruin on the west side. 
Its interior is also covered in greenery, and animals and forest spirits have become its current inhabitants.

column1:
ミスリウ森林深部、南端にある遺跡
特に様々な森の獣が集まる場所であるが、
その理由は遺跡内に存在する霊泉の活力
によるものであるそうだ。また、その奥は
恐るべき白獅子の住処であったという
column2:
In the deep depths of Mysree Forest, located at the southern end, there is an ancient ruin. 
It is particularly known as a gathering place for various forest creatures. 
The reason for this is said to be the vitality of the sacred spring that exists within the ruins. 
Furthermore, it is said that deep inside, there was the dwelling of a fearsome white lion.

column1:
フィンダム大陸の中央部
精霊竜がねぐらとしている《芯なる樹》が
青々と生い茂る様は、フィンダム大陸の
どの拠点からでも眺めることができる
人々はその壮大さに確かな加護を感じて過ごしていた
column2:
In the central part of the Phindym continent, the Spirit Dragon's habitat, the "Core Tree", thrives with lush greenery, which can be observed from any stronghold in Phindym.
People feel a definite blessing in its grandeur as they go about their lives.

column1:
キンガル峡谷中央部、遠浅の川岸が続く一帯
この周囲は人が歩いて渡れるほどに浅い岸が
広がっている。また、魔物が食い散らかしたと
見られる魚や動物の死肉が大量に流れ着いており
風向きによっては悪臭が漂う日もあるようだ
column2:
In the central part of Kingal Canyon, there is an area where the riverbank is shallow enough for people to walk across. 
The surrounding area is extensive, with what seems to be a large amount of dead fish and animals that have been devoured by enemies. 
Depending on the wind direction, there are days when a foul smell lingers in the air.

column1:
城塞都市メガドからちょうど北側にあたる一帯
元々アンセスターオークの集落が多数存在しており
“悪しき竜”出現以前から危険な場所として
認識されていた。時折腕の立つハンターが
稀少な動植物を狙って立ち入るのみであり
人の手が殆ど入っていない
column2:
In the area just north of Fortress City Megado, there were originally many settlements of Ancestor Orcs.
It has long been recognized as a hazardous location, even before the emergence of the "Evil Dragon". 
Occasionally, capable hunters enter only to gather rare plants and animals, and there is little human involvement.

column1:
異界の狭間に、わざわざ私などのために――！
我がマスターはなんと慈悲深い方だ――！
一層励み、お守りしなければ――
column2:
In the Rift, my Master went out of their way just for someone like me!
How kind and merciful they are!
I must work even harder and protect them...

column1:
モロー樹林にある、木々に囲まれた村
代々精霊竜の守りをしてきた一族が住まう
そのせいか理知的な者が多く、学者を多数
輩出してきた。威厳ある族長・ガラダに
よって統治されている
column2:
In the Morrow Forest, there is a village surrounded by trees, where a clan that has been guarding the Spirit Dragon for generations resides.
Perhaps because of this, there are many intellectual individuals, and they have produced numerous scholars. 
They are ruled by the dignified chieftain, Gearóid.

column1:
モロー樹林にある、木々に囲まれた村
代々精霊竜の守りをしてきた一族が住まう
そのせいか理知的な者が多く、学者を多数
輩出してきた。威厳ある族長・ガラダに
よって統治されている
column2:
In the Morrow Forest, there is a village surrounded by trees, where a clan that has been guarding the Spirit Dragon for generations resides.
Perhaps because of this, there are many intellectual individuals, and they have produced numerous scholars. 
They are ruled by the dignified chieftain, Gearóid.

column1:
モロー樹林西部にある、ゴブリンが小さな群れを
形成して潜んでいた一帯。この小さな群れは
あまり攻撃性が高くなかったとみられ、ひっそりと
森の奥で暮らしていたらしい。しかし、今は侵食に
よって凶暴になってしまっているため注意が必要
column2:
In the Morrow Forest in the west, a small group of Goblins has formed and hidden. 
This small group appeared to have low aggressiveness and quietly lived deep in the forest. 
However, they have become dangerously aggressive due to corruption, so caution is necessary.

column1:
《死者の丘》では比較的規模の小さな祠
本来は地下墓地だったが、入り込んだ魔獣達に
遺体のほとんどは食われてしまっている
死者はほぼ空の地下墓地だが、内部には別の
存在が潜んでいるかもしれない
column2: In the Hill of the Dead, there is a relatively small shrine that was originally an underground burial ground. However, most of the bodies have been consumed by the invading animals. The underground burial ground is almost empty of the dead, but there may be another entity lurking inside.

column1:
大広間に
クリスマスカーペットが設置できます
column2: In the Great Hall, you can set up a Christmas carpet.

column1:
ファーラナ平原にぽつりと佇む住居の遺跡
古くはこの場所にダナの村があったのだが
拓けた場という防御面の弱さが問題視され
地形が入り組み敵の進入を妨げる現在の
場に移り住んだ
column2:
In the Farana Plains, stands the ruins of a dwelling, all by itself.
Long ago, there was a village called Dana in this place.
However, the vulnerability of this wide-open area in terms of defense was seen as an issue.
So they moved to the current location, where the terrain is intricate and hinders enemy infiltration.

column1:
エルフの言葉で“森の淀み”を意味するこの場所
には、汚れた土や不純な精気が溜まりやすい
という。それらは時に形を持ち魔物化する
ため、見かけた場合は討伐し浄化したほうがよい
column2:
In the Elven language, this place means "the stillness of the forest." 
It is prone to accumulate unclean soil and impure energy. 
Occasionally, these can take shape and turn into enemies, so it is advisable to defeat and cleanse them when encountered.

column1:
エラン水林地域にある廃村跡地
住人が魔物の襲撃を受け、全滅して久しい
全滅に至った詳しい経緯は伝わっておらず
いまや忘れ去られた場である
column2:
In the Elan Water Grove, there is a deserted village that has long been destroyed by an enemy attack. 
The detailed circumstances that led to the complete annihilation remain unknown, and now it is a forgotten place.

column1:
ダウ渓谷、一軒家に近い崖際にある坑道
中には鉱員のなれの果てや野盗、小鬼
などが住みついている
ところどころ、爆薬があれば破壊できる
岩壁が存在する
column2:
In the Dowe Valley, there is a tunnel located near the cliff, close to a house.
Inside, miners, bandits, and small demons, among others, have taken up residence.
There are occasional rock walls that can be destroyed with explosives.

column1:
ボード前ラウンジに
リトル・フロストが設置できます
column2:
In the Board Front Lounge,
you can install Little Frost.

column1:
荒れ果てた《忘却の廃村》にのこる枯れ井戸
かつて魔物の襲撃を受けた村人たちが逃げ込んだと
いう井戸。村人たちのその後については様々な逸話が
残るが、一人残らず井戸の奥底に潜んでいた別種の
魔物の餌食となったという説が有力である
column2:
In the "Forgotten Abandoned Village" that has been left in ruins, an dried up well remains. 
It is said that the villagers who once fled from the attack of monsters sought refuge in this well. 
There are various tales about what happened to the villagers afterwards, but the theory that they all became prey to a different kind of monster lurking at the bottom of the well is the most plausible one.

column1:
魔赤島、フィンダム、アッカ―シェランの地域素材が
入手可能なダンジョン/期間解放スポットをクリアする
※聖炎の参竜道を除く
column2: In order to obtain regional materials from the islands of Bloodbane Isle, Phindym, and Acre Selund, you need to clear specific dungeons or temporarily unlocked locations. Please note that this does not include the Sacred Flame Path.

column1:
敵地に乗り込むにあたっては敵の素性と敵状を知ら
ねばならない。セシリーとロイグを引き合わせれば、
互いの記憶の連鎖が真相に辿り着くと考えたが、そう
単純ではなかった
　さて、長く盟友だと信じていた覚者が神殿を離れた
理由を、ついに知ることができた。しかし、覚者なら
ぬわたしには理解できない欲求がその根源にあるらし
い
　かつて通い合った信頼と尊敬を思うと、なんとも口
惜しい状況ではあるが、今はただ、敵対の意志はない
というレオの言葉を信じよう
column2:
In infiltrating enemy territory, it is necessary to know the enemy's identity and their current situation. I thought that by introducing Cecily and Loeg to each other, the chain of their memories would lead us to the truth, but it was not that simple.
Now, I have finally learned the reason why that man, whom I believed to be a long-standing ally, left the temple. However, there seems to be a desire that I cannot understand at the root of it.

When I think of the trust and respect we once shared, it is a frustrating situation. But for now, I will simply believe in Leo's words that there is no intention of hostility.

column1:
宮殿前広場に、ディアマンテス派メルガン技師が
魔道兵器ギガン・マキナを改造し配置している
この兵器はあまりに危険なため、広場を通る
際は周到な戦闘準備が必要となる
column2:
In front of the palace plaza, Diamantes faction Melgan engineers have modified the magic weapon Gigant Machina. 
As this weapon is extremely dangerous, thorough combat preparations are necessary when passing through the plaza.

column1:
《シェドレアン大神殿》の門前にある広場
荘厳な神殿を臨むこの場に似合わず、辺りには
獣の死骸が散らばり、死臭が立ち込めている
魔族の影を見たという報告もあるため、通行時には
十分な警戒が必要である
column2:
In front of the gate of the "Shadolean Great Temple", there is a plaza. 
Despite its majestic temple, there are animal carcasses scattered around, and the stench of death fills the air. 
There have also been reports of sightings of fiendish creatures, so caution is necessary when passing through.

column1:
《聖炎の参竜道》へと続く扉の前に
急きょ設営された野営地。厳しいウルテカ山岳の
環境に負けず、宿やよろず屋といった覚者隊のための
設備を維持すべく、王家に仕える兵のみならず
盗賊も手を貸している
column2:
In front of the door leading to the "Sacred Flame Path," a temporary camp has been hastily set up. 
Despite the harsh environment of the Urteca Mountains, the facilities for the Arisen Corps, such as inns and general shops, are being maintained not only by the soldiers serving the royal family, but also with the help of bandits.

column1:
《聖炎の参竜道》へと続く扉の前に
急きょ設営された野営地。厳しいウルテカ山岳の
環境に負けず、宿やよろず屋といった覚者隊のための
設備を維持すべく、王家に仕える兵のみならず
盗賊も手を貸している
column2:
In front of the door leading to the "Sacred Flame Path," a temporary camp has been hastily set up. 
Despite the harsh environment of the Urteca Mountains, the facilities for the Arisen Corps, such as inns and general shops, are being maintained not only by the soldiers serving the royal family, but also with the help of bandits.

column1:
《エラン大門》の門前広場
大門が閉ざされるまでは、この場は
商人や旅人で賑わっていた
簡単な造りの店舗もいくつかあったが
いまや骨組を残すばかりである
column2:
In front of the Elan Front Gate Plaza.
Until the gate was closed, his place was bustling with merchants and travelers.
There were several simple shops, but now only the framework remains.

column1:
オーク本陣ガルドノック砦の正面、橋のたもとに
遠征準備中のオーク小隊が待機している
準備中の小隊を確認した場合は、他の任務より
オーク出撃阻止を優先すべきだろう
column2:
In front of Gardnox Fortress, at the base of the bridge, an Orc squad is waiting in preparation for an expedition. 
If you confirm the squad's readiness, it should take precedence over other missions to prevent the Orc's deployment.

column1:
さらに、戦いの中でこの地の魔物が
使っていた武器を入手する事もできた
故郷で流通していた物よりも
高度に鍛えられている
column2:
In addition, by battling the demon that laid claim to
this place, I was able to get the weapon I had been using forged to a 
higher quality than those circulating around my hometown.

column1:
嵐は一夜のうちに、レスタニアの各地に――人々に
深い傷を残した
　これほどの厄災は白竜の記憶にもないという。未だ
被害の全容は不明だが、失意の中の民たちに白竜の加
護があらんことを願う
　さて、被害状況の報告をとりまとめる前にブリア海
岸における変事について記しておく
　ブリア海岸に魔物の死骸が打ち上げられたが、正体
が不明であったことから調査のために覚者を派遣した
　覚者たちは死骸の検分の最中に、ひとりの若い娘が
行き倒れているのを発見し、生死の確認を試みたとこ
ろ、次の瞬間には見知らぬ土地にいることに気づいた
のだという
　その地で覚者たちは黒い鎧の騎士の襲撃を受け絶体
絶命の危機に陥ったが、白竜が飛ばした気によって無
事に救出され、帰還した
　娘は神殿に保護されるも未だ意識を取り戻さず、早
々の回復を期待したい
　また、海岸の死骸と同等と思しき魔物を覚者たち
は、謎の大地で目撃しており、これもまた、レスタニ
アの危機に繋がる懸念である
column2:
In a single night, a storm left deep wounds in various parts of Lestania, affecting the people. The White Dragon has no memory of such a calamity before. The full extent of the damage is still unknown, but we hope for the White Dragon's protection for the devastated citizens.
Now, before summarizing the report on the damages, let me write about the incident that occurred at Breya Coast. A carcass of a monster washed ashore, but its identity was unknown, so Arisen were dispatched for investigation.

While the Arisen were examining the carcass, they discovered a young girl who had collapsed. They attempted to confirm whether she was alive or not, but the next moment, they found themselves in an unfamiliar land.

In that land, the Arisen were attacked by a knight in black armor, putting them in a desperate situation. However, they were luckily rescued and returned safely thanks to the assistance of the White Dragon's power.

The girl is currently being protected in the temple, but she has yet to regain consciousness. We hope for her speedy recovery.

Furthermore, the Arisen also witnessed a similar monster, possibly connected to the carcass on the coast, in a mysterious land. This is another concern that may lead to a crisis in Lestania.

column1:
ザンドラ禁域の一画、錬金の秘術に
魅せられた者たちが潜み独自の研究を
繰り広げていた場所
現在もその名残の書物などが散乱するが
肝心の研究者たちがどこに消えたかは不明
column2: In a corner of the Zandora Wastelands, where people fascinated by the secrets of alchemy hid, they carried out their own research. Even now, remnants of their studies such as books can be found scattered about, but the whereabouts of the researchers themselves remain unknown.

column1:
ファーラナ平原の片隅、大岩の割れ目に
隠れるようにして作られた小さな集落
一切の外部との交流を断った結果、非常に独特な
文化を形成するにいたった一族が住んでいる
column2: In a corner of the Farana Plains, in a crack in a large rock, there lives a small hidden settlement inhabited by a tribe that has developed a very unique culture as a result of refusing all contact with the outside world.

column1:
森の中でも有数の大樹がそびえ立つ広場
まるで大樹に守られているかのような静かな
空間だったが、突如この場で暴れはじめた
エントが確認され、状況は急変しつつある
column2:
In a clearing where one of the largest trees in the forest stands tall, it was a peaceful space as if protected by the great tree.
However, suddenly, an Ent, a rare sight in this area, started rampaging, and the situation is rapidly changing.

column1:
第三のアークの中で、レオはクラウスが望んだ道を
選んだ。示し合わせたわけではないとは分かっている
が、時代の変化を感じずにはいられない
　わたしの意見は時代に合わない。単純に老いたの
だ。第一線から退くべきなのだろう
　白竜は夢とうつつを行きつ戻りつしており、その意
志を読む巫女はもういない。よりどころをなくした我
々の心は、散って離れていくしかないのだろうか
　わずかながらの希望は、わたしに届いたレオの伝言
だ。若者たちにわたしを敬うようにと言い残したらし
い
　レオの気持ちに応えるには、わたしは何をすべきだ
ろうか。不意に、冷たい水を浴びたように頭が冴え
た
　わたしの役目は、一歩退いた、客観的、かつ、冷徹
な判断を下すこと。敵はディアマンテスだ。イリスの
二の舞に陥る者が現れないとは限らない。その時に、
厳しい判断を下せるのはわたしだけだろう
column2:
In The Third Ark, Leo chose the path Klaus desired. I understand that it was not planned in advance, but I can't help but feel the changes of the times. 
My opinion is outdated; I have simply grown old. I suppose I should step back from the front lines. 
The White Dragon comes and goes between dreams and reality, and there is no longer a shrine maiden to interpret its intentions. Our hearts, with no place to rely on, can only scatter and drift apart. 

There is a faint glimmer of hope in Leo's message that reached me. It seems he told the young ones to respect me. 

To respond to Leo's feelings, what should I do? Suddenly, my mind cleared as if being doused in cold water. 

My role is to step back and make objective and cold judgments. The enemy is Diamantes. It's not guaranteed that someone won't meet the same fate as Iris. At that time, I alone will be able to make harsh judgments.

column1:
フィンダムの中でも特に自然の美しさに恵まれた水林
大半の水がエランより湧き出でているとされており
良質な水を守るために周辺の森林についても厳重に
管理されている
column2:
In Phindym, the water forest is particularly blessed with natural beauty. 
Most of its water is said to spring forth from Elan, and to protect the high-quality water, 
the surrounding forests are carefully managed.

column1:
フィンダムの中でも特に自然の美しさに恵まれた水林
大半の水がエランより湧き出でているとされており
良質な水を守るために周辺の森林についても厳重に
管理されている
column2:
In Phindym, the water forest is particularly blessed with natural beauty.

the surrounding forests are carefully managed.

column1:
アッカーシェランでは竜は、すなわち、王でもある
離宮は竜となった王が人々と交流する神殿として
有史以前に造られた。以降、時々の王によって
改修、改装が行われて現在の姿になっている
column2:
In Acre Selund, the dragon is also the king.
The palace was built as a temple for the king who became a dragon to interact with the people in prehistoric times. Since then, it has been renovated and refurbished by occasional kings and has become its current form.

column1:
瀕死状態中、物理防御力と魔法防御力が増加する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に物理/魔法防御力がより増加</COL>
column2:
Improves your Defense and Magick Defense
when you stand at death's door.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Defense and
Magick Defense further.</COL>

攻撃時フォースゲージ1本以上なら消費し技性能上昇

Immediately after blocking, either attack
the enemy to increase enmity or dodge backwards.
Will consume 1 Force Gauge to increase effects if available.

attack surrounding enemies.

刃に魔力を帯び、ノーマルスキルの剣技に残像を追加する

<COL ffdc78>LV UP Reduces magick drain during activation.

column1:
まだ無い――だと
この先、２階中央が《水流制御室》だ
column2: If you still haven't found it, then ahead, the central area of the second floor is the "Water Flow Control Room"

column1:
戦いでもクラフトでも、要望があれば
何でもおっしゃってね
column2: If you have any requests, whether it's fighting, crafting, or anything else, please let me know.

column1:
ここでも見つからなければ
右手通路か――
column2: If you don't find it here, try the right-hand passage.

column1: 私なら、貴方の善き盾となれると信じる
column2: If you believe in me, I can be your good shield.

column1:
どこまでも尽くす従者なら、
ほら、ここに――
column2:
If you are searching for a servant who will serve diligently,.
Look, right here――

column1:
敵の攻撃を受け流し、瞬時に背後に回り込んで
致命の一撃を与える
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃ヒット数増加／受付時間延長／
攻撃アクション中であればいつでも発動可能</COL>
column2:
If used to correctly parry an enemy's attack,
instantly climb behind them, and deliver a lethal blow in response.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases number of hits in the counter.
LV.6: Extends counter window duration and can be activated anytime
during attacks.</COL>

column1:
このままでは、ベンジャミン様のご友人を弔うはずが
我々自身の弔い旅になってしまうかもしれません
帰還し、ゆっくり休養いただけるまであと少し――
column2: If this continues, our journey to mourn Master Benjamin's late friend might turn into our own mourning journey. We'll have to return and rest a little while longer until Master Benjamin can recuperate.

column1: 私への用命あらば、ただちに取りかかる
column2: If there is an order for me, I will immediately get to work.
If there is a chance, let's go to the battlefield together.

column1: 忠誠の心なら、誰にも負けません！
column2:
If the loyalty of the heart is tested,
I will not lose to anyone!

column1:
この辺りに無いとなると――
《中央大水廊》の辺りだろうか
column2: If it's not in this area-- it's probably around the "Central Flood Corridor".

column1: 雇用ならば、しかるべき手順で
column2: If it's employment, then follow the proper procedure.

column1:
「全て」がすなわち宝を意味するならば
盗賊を警戒して巧妙に隠す意図も理解できる
――物に執着があるとは、少々意外だったが
column2:
If by everyhing he means "treasure",
you can understand his intention to hide it from any would-be thieves.
...It's still a bit surprising that there is an obsessed with such
things though.

column1:
私の記憶が正しければ
まずは、入口左の階段を下りた辺りが怪しい
column2:
If I remember correctly...
First of all, the area down the stairs to the left of the entrance is suspicious.

column1:
まともに相手をしていたら、今頃命は無かっただろう
今こうして日記を書いている手も、震えが止まらない
column2:
If I did not have a decent partner, I would not currently be alive.
Even as I write this, my hands cannot stop trembling.

column1:
貴方のもとで力が尽くせるのなら――！
それに勝る喜びはありません
column2:
If I can devote my strength under your leadership...!
There is no greater joy than that.

column1: 氷の傀儡フロスト・マキナ
アイスキューブの欠片
向かう所敵無し、これほどの絶好調だと言うのに――
column2: I'm unbeatable though, and would say this is going to go perfectly well...

column1:
今までろくに話もしなかったことを後悔しそうだ
身体がひどく弱っているせいで
精神が落ち込みやすくなっているのだろうか
column2: I'm starting to regret not having spoken much until now. Could it be that my spirit is easily downcast because my body is in such a weakened state?

column1: ごめんなさい、もうこんな失敗しないから
column2: I'm sorry, I won't make this kind of mistake again.

column1:
ごめんなさい！
ぼく、失敗しちゃって――、今度こそ！
column2:
I'm sorry!
I messed up—this time, I'll get it right!

column1:
こっちの準備ぁできてます
戦いにクラフトに、何でも言って下さい
column2: I'm prepared over here. Whether it's for battle or crafting, please let me know what you need.

column1: いますごく調子が良くて、いいのができそう！
column2: I'm in really good shape and it seems like I can do something great!

column1:
弔いをしてやれるような――
生涯で友と言える相手は、彼くらいだろう
column2:
I'm going to mourn...
The partner that would be known as a friend in his life, they would not be able to.

column1: 暇だなあ――ぼくもお仕事したい！
column2: I'm bored - I want to work too!

column1:
少しだけ退屈だわ――
あたしもマスターのお役に立ちたいのに
column2:
I'm a little bored...
I also want to be of help to Master.

column1: 我が力、貴方のもとでも発揮したいものです
column2: I would like to demonstrate my power under you as well.

column1: こんな無様を――許していただきたい
column2: I would like to ask for your forgiveness for such a disgraceful display.

column1:
部屋の前までは鍵を持っていたはずだが
通路の宝箱に手を伸ばしたときに床が崩れ――
column2: I would have had a key to the front of the room, but when I reached for the treasure chest in the corridor, the floor collapsed--

column1:
セシリーの容態は一進一退ということだろうか。こ
のような事態に陥った顛末を記しておく
　ロイグの赤色病は快癒したが、旧知との対話も、セ
シリーの記憶を呼び戻すことはなかった。しかし、ロ
イグは、侵食魔の島に関する新たな情報をもたらした
　記憶が戻らず焦るセシリーは、わたしの反対意見を
退け覚者たちとともに島に渡った
　島はセシリーをつけ狙う黒騎士の本拠地だ、そこへ
乗り込もうなどとは、罠に飛び込むゴブリンのような
もの
　案の定、黒騎士が現れ、セシリーは生死の境を彷徨
うことになった
　セシリーの回復を祈る気持ちに偽りはないが、もっ
と強く引き止めるべきだったという思いと、これで黒
騎士は目的を果たしたのではないかという、淡い期待
の両方が我が胸中にある
column2:
I wonder if Cecily's condition is in a state of fluctuation. I will record the details of the situation she has fallen into.
Loeg's Red Blight has been cured, but it did not bring back Cecily's memories of her past acquaintances. However, Loeg brought new information regarding the Island of the Corruption.
Unable to regain her memories and feeling anxious, Cecily disregarded my objections and went to the island with the Arisen.

The island is the base of the Black Knight who is targeting Cecily. It is like jumpin straight into a trap, like a goblin.

As expected, the Black Knight appeared, and Cecily found herself on the verge of life and death.

I truly pray for Cecily's recovery, but I have both the feeling that I should have held her back more strongly and the faint hope that the Black Knight has achieved its objective within me.

column1:
戻られたあの方を暖かく迎えるため
一体何をすべきか、ベンジャミン様と交わした言葉を
思い起こしながら考えてみようと思います
column2: I will think about what we should do to warmly welcome them back based on the words exchanged with Master Benjamin, with the aim of greeting them upon their return.

column1:
反省します――
もっと、――もっと精進せねばっ！
column2:
I will reflect on this --
I need to be more -- more diligent!

column1:
ホットスポットの数を15箇所増やします
他の遠征隊支援の効果と重複します
column2: I will increase the number of hotspots by 15. This effect overlaps with the Expedition Support.

column1:
ホットスポットの数を10箇所増やします
他の遠征隊支援の効果と重複します
column2:
I will increase the number of hotspots by 10.
This effect overlaps with the Expedition Support.

column1:
クラフトかあ――いろいろ試してみたいな
試したい戦技もあるんです！
column2: I want to try various crafts. There are also techniques I want to try!

column1:
わたしは一同にアークの破壊を提言し、その方法を
検討することを約束した
　レオが賛成したせいかクラウスも表向きは従ってい
る。レオはどちらかと言えばクラウスにくみすると想
像していたので意外ではあったが、ありがたいこと
だ
　まだ知る者は少ないがクラウスは錬金術師の末裔
だ。ちょっとした誤解が誤解を呼び、神殿での立場を
失う可能性がある
　まだ未熟とはいえ、わたしの次にここに立つのはク
ラウス以外に考えられない。今は反感しかないだろう
が、いつか真意が伝わると信じよう
　追記：レオはイリスをどこかに匿っているらしい。
胸騒ぎがしたが、わたしとてあの子を憎く思っている
わけではない。この件に関しては知らないふりが賢明
だろう
column2:
I proposed the destruction of The Ark to the assembly and promised to consider the methods. Thanks to Leo's agreement, Klaus seems to be following suit, at least on the surface. It was surprising because I imagined Leo would side with Klaus. Nonetheless, I am grateful for it.
Not many people know yet, but Klaus is a descendant of alchemists. A small misunderstanding could lead to losing his position in the temple.

Although still inexperienced, I can't think of anyone other than Klaus who could stand here after me. There may be only resentment for now, but I believe that someday the true intentions will be understood.

Addendum: It seems Leo is hiding Iris somewhere. I had a bad feeling, but I don't hate that child. It would be wise to pretend not to know about this matter.

column1:
先日立ち寄った拠点で耳に入って来たのですが――
フィンダムには、偉大な人物が亡くなった際
装具や装飾品を副葬品として埋葬する文化が
あるそうなのです
column2: I overheard at a stopover the other day-- that there is a tradition in Phindym where when great men die, they are buried with ornaments and ornaments as burial accessories.

column1:
我ながら、なかなかの一品が
仕上がりそうですよ
column2: I must say, it's turning out to be quite a masterpiece.

column1:
ぼくはこう見えて強いんです！
いつかはお声を掛けてくださいね！
column2: I may not look like it, but I am strong! Please feel free to reach out to me someday.

column1:
とんだ失態やらかしちまいました
申し訳ねぇ――！
column2:
I made a terrible mistake.
I'm so sorry!

column1: 完成品をお見せするのが楽しみです
column2: I look forward to showing you the finished product!

column1: 遠くから悲鳴が聞こえた――
column2: I heard a scream in the distance--

column1: どこからか剣戟の音が聞こえる――
column2: I hear the sound of a swordfight coming from somewhere--

column1: まだ、作業を承っておりません
column2: I have not yet accepted a crafting request.

column1: まだ、作業を承っておりません
column2: I have not yet accepted a crafting request.

column1:
私の力不足、恥じる他はない――
この経験を次の糧に――
column2:
I have no other choice but to be ashamed of my own inadequacy.
Let this experience be my stepping stone for the future.

column1:
次こそご期待を――
この経験を生かします
column2: I have learned from this experience. Next time I will not fail you.

column1:
次こそご期待を――
この経験を生かします
column2: I have learned from this experience. Next time I will not fail you.

column1:
少々無茶が過ぎました――
もう下手は打ちませんよ
column2:
I have gone a little too far ――
I won't make any more mistakes.

column1:
どうも、後ろ向きなことばかり考えてしまいます
「弔い」という目的を果たした時
あの方はどうなってしまわれるのでしょう
最悪の場合を想像してしまう私を、お許しください
column2: I find myself constantly dwelling on negative thoughts. When we achieve the "mourning" purpose, I wonder what will become of that person. Please forgive me for imagining the worst-case scenario.

column1: 精霊竜から竜力の波動を感じる――
column2: I feel a surge of Spirit Dragon from the Spirit Dragon--

column1:
セシリーとロイグが話し合えば事変の全容が明らか
になると期待していたのだが、得られた情報は、ごく
断片的なものであった
　セシリーはフィンダムに生きる種族のひとつで、族
長を務めるガラダなる男の娘であり、理由は不明なれ
ど、黒騎士の執拗な追撃を受けている
　また、セシリーを追って現れ、覚者によって討伐さ
れたズールが残した言葉によれば、この事変は全て黒
騎士が関与したものであり、レスタニアへの攻撃はセ
シリーを確保あるいは無き者にするまで続くとのこと
だ
　セシリーの保護は白竜をはじめとする神殿の総意、
となれば、黒騎士との総力戦は避けられぬさだめだ
column2:
I expected that if Cecily and Loeg talked, the full details of the incident would become clear, but the information obtained was only fragmented.
Cecily is one of the races that live in Phindym and she is a girl who serves as the leader of the Gearóids. However, she is being relentlessly pursued by the Black Knight for reasons unknown.

Furthermore, according to the words left behind by Zuhl, who appeared to chase Cecily and was defeated by the Arisen, this incident is all related to the Black Knight, and the attacks on Lestania will continue until Cecily is captured or eliminated.

If protecting Cecily is the consensus of the temple, including the White Dragon, then a full-scale battle with the Black Knight is inevitable.

column1: 仕事でヘマはやりませんよ、お任せを
column2: I don't screw up on the job. You can count on me.

column1:
なんとか手に入れたこのおぞましい貴重素材――
見た目はひどいものだが、
祈祷師や好事家あたりが見れば大喜びするだろう
column2:
I did manage to acquire this valuable and hideous material somehow...
Although it's a terrible sight to behold, you would be delighted to see the prices the
shamans and dilettantes have offered for it.

column1:
数多の魔物を打ち倒し、
実力をつけていく手応えは確かに感じていた――
だからこそ、慢心があったのかもしれない
column2:
I certainly felt the way to put my skills to the test,
was to defeat a multitude of monsters...
Perhaps I was too overconfident in my ability.

column1: ご指示をお待ちしています
ご指示をお待ちしています

覚者さま、お力添えの機会
お待ちしています
column2: I await the opportunity to lend you my strength, Arisen.

column1:
覚者さま、お力添えの機会
お待ちしています
column2: I await the opportunity to lend you my strength, Arisen.

column1:
申し訳ありません
あのようなところで倒れてしまうとは
不覚でした――
column2:
I apologize.
I never expected to collapse in a place like that.
I am truly sorry.

column1:
申し訳ありません、覚者さま
精進いたします
column2: I apologize, Arisen. I will devote myself to this task.

column1:
申し訳ありません、覚者さま
精進いたします
column2: I apologize, Arisen. I will devote myself to this task.

column1: 冒険の手助けなら、いつでもいたします
column2: I am ready whenever you should need assistance.

column1: 冒険の手助けなら、いつでもいたします
column2: I am ready whenever you should need assistance.

column1:
旅かクラフトのご用命あらば
いつでも動きます
column2: I am ready for crafting or an expedition whenever you wish.

column1:
旅かクラフトのご用命あらば
いつでも動きます
column2: I am ready for crafting or an expedition whenever you wish.

column1: 只今作業中ですので、お待ちください
column2: I am crafting now. Please wait a while.

column1: 只今作業中ですので、お待ちください
column2: I am crafting now. Please wait a while.

column1:
俺も腕には自信があるつもりだが、
正直言って今回はヒヤリとさせられた――
侵食されたグリフィンとは、これほど凶暴なものか
column2:
I am confident in my weapons, but if I am honest,
this time I may have made a mistake...
Is this Infected Griffin as ferocious as they say?

column1:
白竜の前に集う覚者のひとりであるイリスの様子が
気にかかる
　よく笑う娘で時に気に触るほどだった。だが、アー
クの調査から帰還してからはまるで気性が変わってし
まったかのようだ
　このところ姿を消していたのはキノザの鉱泉へ行っ
ていたためらしい。案じたクラウスが人を送って連れ
戻したが、はて、やはり、どこか以前とは違う気がし
てならない
　危うさを感じているのはわたしだけではないはず
だ。覚者は心臓を竜に預けている。心臓と情の動きは
密接に関係しているはずだ。胸に空虚を抱える覚者に
精神的な落ち着きを期待するのは間違っているのだろ
うか
　さて、クラウスにも問題がある。アークの調査報告
執筆に加えて、レオから古文書の解析も依頼されてい
るはず。加えて他人の心配
　これではすべてが中途半端なままだ。未熟故に時間
の案配がわからないのだろう。指導の必要がありそう
だ
column2:
I am concerned about the appearance of Iris, one of the Arisen who has gathered before the White Dragon.
She used to be a cheerful girl who would sometimes irritate people. However, ever since returning from the Ark investigation, it seems like her temperament has completely changed.
It seems that she had been disappearring because she went to the Kinoza hot springs. Klaus, who was worried, sent someone to bring her back. Yet, I can't help but feel something is different compared to before.

I am not the only one who feels this uneasiness. The Arisen entrust their hearts to the dragon. The movement of their heart and emotions should be closely related. Is it wrong to expect emotional stability from the Arisen who carry an emptiness in their chest?

Now, Klaus also has a problem. In addition to writing a report on the Ark investigation, he was also asked by Leo to analyze ancient documents. In addition to worrying about others.

Everything remains unfinished like this. Perhaps they don't understand how to manage their time due to their immaturity. It seems that guidance is necessary.

column1: 集中力を要しますので、会話はまた後ほど
column2: I am concentrating now. I will speak with you later.

column1: 集中力を要しますので、会話はまた後ほど

しかし、このような土地で侵食されず生息するとは
移り住んだばかりなのか、抗体があるのか――
column2:
However, to live in a land like this without being infected...
Is it because they just moved in, or do they have antibodies?

column1:
だが、フィンダムでの無理が祟り
咳は酷くなる一方で、従者どもに心配された
column2:
However, this cursed land of Phindym has given me
an unnatural cough, which has made my pawns worried.

column1:
しかし、我々の知っていた倒し方が通用したせいか

column2:
However, it seemed that Benjamin was a bit excited
because the method of killing we knew had worked.

column1:
しかしこの魔物からも、レスタニアでは見る事の無い
希少な素材を回収できました
これで、水路に降りた目的を達成したはずです
column2:
However, from this demon we were able to recover
one of the rare materials that did not exist in Lestania.
With this, we should have achieved the purpose of why we came into this waterway.

column1:
攻撃を受け流しつつ剣で斬り抜ける。<PADM>左スティック<KEYM>移動キー</KEYM>により
後方への斬り抜けも可能。攻撃を受ける瞬間の発動で威力上昇
攻撃アクション中であればいつでも発動可能
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃範囲拡大／受付時間延長</COL>
column2:
Hold your shield in wait, deflecting and seamlessly
countering enemy attacks. Use the <PADM>left stick<KEYM>move key</KEYM> to move
forward or back. Perfect blocks deal more damage.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases range. Increases counter duration.</COL>

column1:

空中でも発動可能
column2:
Hold the bow forward.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column1:
大剣を構えて待機、敵の攻撃を弾き返した後、
連続動作で反撃する
敵の攻撃を弾き返したときのみ、連続行動を行う
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃ヒット数増加／受付時間延長</COL>
column2:
Hold the blade in wait. Upon deflecting an
enemy's attack, the user will unleash a series of blows.
Only a successful counter will perform multiple blows.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases number of hits. Increases counter duration.</COL>

Hill of the Dead, a gloomy garden in front of the cemetery.

To avoid being mistaken for a grave desecrator, it would be wise to avoid passing through the area.

テルの東にあるハイデル教会地下墓地
以前は祈りの場として訪れる者も多かったが
廃屋化して後、扉が開かれたことはない
夜間徘徊する亡者の目撃談もあり、今では誰も
教会に近づかなくなっている
column2:
Hidell Church's subsurface cemetery east of
Tel. Previously, many visited as a place of
prayer, however, its doors were never opened
again after it was abandoned. Stories say you
can see the dead wander at night.
Nobody dares go near it.

column1:
テルの東にあるハイデル教会地下墓地
以前は祈りの場として訪れる者も多かったが
廃屋化して後、扉が開かれたことはない
夜間徘徊する亡者の目撃談もあり、今では誰も
教会に近づかなくなっている
column2:
Hidell Chapel catacombs located to the east of Tel
village. Previously visited by many as a place of
prayer, the doors to the catacombs have not been
opened since the chapel's abandonment.
Eyewitnesses report sighting the deceased wandering
the grounds at night; nobody has approached chapel
since.

メガド居住層の奥に造られた野ざらしの牢屋
魔軍の襲撃から逃げられず、また不幸にも生け捕りに
された人々がドワーフオークから無残な拷問を受けた
であろうことは、その場に生々しく残る痕跡から容易
に察することができる
column2: Hidden prison exposed beyond the depths of the Megado residential layer; it is easy to deduce from the vivid traces left behind that the unfortunate individuals who were unable to escape the onslaught of the Demon Army have fallen into the hands of the Orcs and likely suffered gruesome torture.

column1:
用心深い彼のことだ、たやすく見つかる場所に
あるとは思っていないが――
日記によると、全てをそこに置いてきたのだとか
column2:
He's very cautious, so I don't think he's in a place
that can be easily found...
According to the diary, he says everything has been placed there?

自然洞窟を利用したゴブリン族のねぐら
《貪欲のギルスタン》を王とし、多くのゴブリンが
洞穴に出入りしている。王の蒐集癖のせいか
生き残りのためか、洞穴に住まうゴブリン達は
人間との対立を避けているようだ
column2:
Goblin tribe's lair, utilizing a natural cave.
With Gilstan, the King of Greed, leading, many goblins come and go from the cave. 
Perhaps due to the king's hoarding habit or for the sake of survival, the goblins living in the cave seem to avoid confrontation with humans.

column1:
自然洞窟を利用したゴブリン族のねぐら

column2:
Goblin tribe's lair, utilizing a natural cave.
With Gilstan, the King of Greed, leading, many goblins come and go from the cave. 
Perhaps due to the king's hoarding habit or for the sake of survival, the goblins living in the cave seem to avoid confrontation with humans.

column1:
丘の上を縄張りとするゴブリン族の住処
一際凶暴なグレーターゴブリン《小鬼殺しのオジナ》
がリーダーとなっている。オジナは仲間をも攻撃
する残虐さで群れを支配しており、手下たちは
恐怖からか異常なまでの興奮状態にある
column2:
Goblin territory on top of the hill.
Led by the exceptionally vicious Greater Goblin, Ogina, known as the "Kobold Killer".
Ogina dominates the pack with his cruelness, attacking even his own allies, and his subordinates are in an abnormally excited state, perhaps out of fear.

column1:
地理的に《王家の墓》の反対側に位置する墓場
入り口は厳重に閉ざされ、その位置から
“王家ゆかりではあるが、正しく葬られる価値の無い
行き場の無い人物らの亡骸”を安置する場所で
あったのではないかと推測されている
column2: Geographically located on the opposite side of the Royal Tombs, the entrance is tightly closed, and its location suggests that it may have been a place where "the corpses of not worthy of a proper burial, with nowhere else to go" were laid to rest.

column1:
解放軍の天才参謀官
作戦の立案だけでなく
自らもソーサラーとして戦う
column2:
Genius Staff Officer of the Liberation Army.
Not only does he plan operations, he also fights as a Sorcerer himself.

column1:
自身を中心に高速に旋回する魔球を生成
受けた攻撃を魔球の数だけ無効化する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に持続時間延長
LV.６で魔球数増加（３→５）</COL>
column2:
Generates magick spheres that revolve
around oneself. The spheres will each
nullify one attack.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of the effect.
LV.6: Increases number of magick spheres (3→5).</COL>

column1:
味方へのダメージを無効化し、敵へエリクシルの
状態異常を付与する支援エリアを生成する
タイミングよくボタンを押すと展開時間が延長する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に状態異常値上昇
LV.６で最大入力回数が増加し、展開時間が延長</COL>
column2:
Generate an area that nullifies damage for all allies inside.
Enemies within the area are affected by your chosen Elixir.
The duration is greatly increased with correct timing.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases debilitation rate.
LV.6: Number of inputs increased, extending the duration.</COL>

column1:
錬成物質で罠を生成する。この罠に敵が
近付くと自動的に棘が放出され、対象を貫く
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に錬成罠の起動回数増加
LV.６で棘の本数が増加（１→３）</COL>
column2:
Generate a trap from an alchemical substance.
When enemies approach the trap, pillars spike out
from it and penetrate them.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases number of trap activations.
LV.6: Increases the number of pillar spikes (1→3).</COL>

column1:
空中に錬成式で足場を生成し

column2:
Generate a temporary foothold while in the air
and propel yourself by kicking off of it.

column1:
フェルヤナ地方の外れにある門。そこを抜けると
魔軍の拠点に繋がるらしく、魔軍側も警戒を
強める最近では大門の前にまで野営地が拡がり
見張りの魔物が日夜目を光らせている
column2:
Gate located at the outskirts of Feryana region. 
It seems to connect to the demon army's base, and recently, the demon army has been increasing their vigilance. 
The encampment has expanded all the way to the front of the main gate, and the guarding monsters keep their eyes shining day and night.

フェルヤナ荒原の山壁側からメガドシス高地
中心部を繋ぐ通路。かつては頻繁に使われていたが
渓谷を渡る船や家畜を使っての山越えが主流となって
からは、たまに狩人らが利用するのみとなっていた
メガド周辺が魔軍に包囲された際、徒歩での脱出を
試みる者にはこの古道しか残されていなかった
column2:
From the mountain wall side of the Feryana Wilderness to the center of the Megadosys Plateau, there is a pathway. 
It used to be frequently used, but now crossing the mountains using livestock or ships to cross the valley has become the mainstream. 
Only occasionally do hunters use it now. 
When the area around Megado was surrounded by the Demon Army, those who attempted to escape on foot had no choice but to use this ancient path.

column1:
ブリア海岸で保護された娘が意識を取り戻してから
語った内容、加えて、セシリーと名乗るその娘を巡っ
て起こった事件から判明した事実を以下に記しておく
　セシリーは黒い鎧を着た騎士に追われ逃走中であっ
た。意識を失い、気づいた時にはすでに我々の保護下
にあったのであるが、ブリア海岸で発見されるに至る
経緯は不明だ。セシリーの記憶は大部分欠損している
らしい
　また、あの忌まわしき怪物ズールが現れ、目的はセ
シリーを捕らえることにあると表明した。ズールは長
くディアマンテスの手下だと思われていたが、自ら語
るところによると黒き鎧の騎士のポーンであるらしい
　となれば、ズールの意志は黒騎士の意志であろう
し、同時に、ズールがポーンであることから黒騎士は
覚者ということになるであろう
　問題は、黒騎士はいかなる竜の覚者なのかズールの
言動は、その竜の意志なのか
　どうやらあの嵐が運んできた厄災は、人智を超えた
竜の領域の変事らしい。我々にできることは、はて、
なんであろうか
column2:
From the moment the girl protected on the Breya Coast regained consciousness, she recounted what had happened and the information that came to light from the incident involving Cecily. Cecily was being chased by a knight in black armor while she was fleeing. She lost consciousness and when she realized it, she was already under our protection, but the circumstances leading up to her discovery on the Breya Coast are unknown. Cecily's memory seems to be mostly missing.
Furthermore, that dreaded monster Zuhl appeared and declared that his objective was to capture Cecily. Zuhl had long been thought to be a subordinate of Diamantes, but according to his own account, he seems to be a pawn of the black-armored knight.

In that case, Zuhl's will would be the will of the black knight, and at the same time, since Zuhl is a pawn, the black knight would be an Arisen.

The question is, what kind of dragon's is the black knight, and are Zuhl's words and actions the will of that dragon?

Apparently, the calamity brought by that storm seems to be a disturbance in the realm of dragons that surpasses human understanding. What can we do, I wonder?

column1:
暗闇の先から、盗賊たちの息遣いが聞こえる
この緊張を破るきっかけがあれば、
飢えた狼のように一斉に飛びかかる気なのだろう
column2:
From the darkness, you can hear the thieves breathing as
they wait for a chance to break the tension in the air.
Perhaps they're going to jump out and strike in unison like starving wolves.

column1:
オークの被害を受けた少女から聞いた
街に増加するオークについての目撃証言
“ 近頃急速に街中で目撃数が増加している
　オークたちは何かを探している様子
　人なのか物なのか、任務なのかは不明 ”
という旨の内容で、出没し始めた時期は
<NPC 586>の死亡・オークの尋問開始と
重なっている模様
column2:
From a girl who was affected by the Orcs' rampage, an eyewitness account about the increasing number of sightings of Orcs in the city.
"The number of sightings in the city has been rapidly increasing lately. The Orcs seem to be looking for something. Whether it's a person or an object, or if it's a mission, is unknown."
It seems that their appearance coincides with the death of <NPC 586> and the start of Orc interrogations.

オーク軍が根城とする旧時代の大砦
かつては立派な外堀を持つ騎士団の砦だったが
白竜が墜ちて後オークに占領され、恐ろしい魔物の
城と化した。首領モゴックが手勢を率い、この砦を
起点にハイデルへの侵略を企てている
column2:
Formerly a fortress of the knight's order that had an impressive moat.
It has now been occupied by orcs after the fall of the White Dragon, transforming into a terrifying stronghold of monstrous creatures. 
The leader Mogok leads his forces from this fortress, plotting an invasion of Heidell.

フィンダムに続き、アッカーシェランにも滅びの渦
が出現した
　渦は、大地に刺された黒剣を通じ、大地の竜力を吸
い上げて大陸を滅ぼそうとしていることは、先のフィ
ンダムの状況と変わりはないそうだ
　我々レスタニアもフィンダムの時と同じく、アッカ
ーシェランに現れた滅びの渦の直下、闇に覆われた王
都メガドを救うべく騎士団を派遣した
　ネド王子とレスタニアの騎士団の協力の元に、覚者
隊は渦の中へと突入し、渦の力を弱めることに成功し
た。しかし、渦から戻った覚者隊とそれを迎い受けた
ネド王子たちを嘲るように、黒騎士の声が天を衝き響
き渡ったという
　ネド王子から火竜の竜力を託された我が白竜の覚者
が、今や闇の陣営の障害となったことを認めた黒騎士
は、我が覚者と全てのレスタニアの覚者を抹殺すると
宣言したそうだ
　未だフィンダムとアッカーシェランの奮戦が続く深
刻な状況の中で、いよいよこのレスタニアに滅びの渦
が現れる事態に備えねばならないようだ
column2:
Following Phindym, a vortex of stagnation has appeared in Acre Selund as well.
The vortex is sucking up the dragon force from the earth through the black sword plunged into the ground, just like the situation in Phindym.
Just like during the Phindym incident, we sent a knight order to the capital city of Megado, which is directly beneath the vortex of stagnation that appeared in Acre Selund, enveloped in darkness, in order to save it.

Under the cooperation of Prince Nedo and the Lestania knight order, the Arisen squad successfully penetrated into the vortex and weakened its power. However, as the Arisen Corps returned from the vortex and were welcomed by Prince Nedo and the others, the voice of the Black Knight resounded throughout the heavens, mocking them.

The Black Knight, who acknowledged that the Arisen of our White Dragon, who had been entrusted with the dragon force of the Fire Dragon by Prince Nedo, had now become an obstacle for the forces of darkness, declared that he would exterminate our Arisen and all the Arisen of Lestania.

Amidst the dire situation of the ongoing fierce battle in Phindym and Acre Selund, it seems that we must now prepare for the appearance of a vortex of stagnation in Lestania as well.

まず、亡きご友人について
フィンダム人唯一の友人であること――
彼の志に敬意を表し、弔いの旅を続けていること――
column2: First and foremost, I pay my respects to my late comrade, the only friend of a Phindymian. I continue my journey in tribute to his aspirations and in mourning.

column1:
複数の矢を同時に扇状に放つ
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で矢の発射数増加（３→５）</COL>
column2:
Fires three arrows in a wedge pattern.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases arrows fired (3→5).</COL>

column1:
敵のガードを崩す爆音火薬を巻いた矢を放つ
爆音に巻き込むことで周囲の敵をも怯ませる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に吹き飛ばし力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃範囲拡大</COL>
column2:
Fires an arrow that produces a deafening
blare on impact, breaking enemy guard.
Will also launch nearby enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases blow power.
LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.</COL>

column1:
貫通力のある矢を放つ
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で貫通時のヒット間隔が短縮し
連続ヒットしやすくなる</COL>
column2:
Fires a shot capable of piercing multiple targets.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Shortens the interval between hits,
increasing the likelihood of hitting more times.</COL>

column1:
氷属性の複数の魔矢を一点に集中して放つ

Fire multiple magickal arrows with
the Ice attribute at a single point.

column1:
複数の矢を連続で放ち
敵を大きくのけぞらせる

column2:
Fire multiple arrows in quick succession.
Staggers large enemies.

LV.6: Increases arrows fired (3→5).</COL>

column1:
杖から魔法球を放つ
ボタンの長押しで弾数、威力が上昇する
空中でも発動可能（ボタン長押しは地上のみ）
column2:
Fire magickal bolts from the tip of the cane.
Holding the button down will increase the number and damage of bolts.
Can be activated even while in the air, but can only charge on the ground.

column1:
体力回復に加え、物理攻撃力と魔法攻撃力の
強化効果のある魔矢を放つ（対不死には攻撃）
味方に接触させれば魔法球が吸着する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に回復力上昇／展開エリア拡張
LV.６でターゲット数増加（３→７）</COL>
column2:
Fire magickal arrows that emit an area of health
restoration at the impact point (inflicts damage to undead).
The field will attach to an ally if the arrow makes contact.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases healing power. Increases size of the effect.
LV.6: Increases number of targets (2→4).</COL>

column1:
一部の状態異常回復に加え、物理防御力と魔法防御力の
強化効果のある魔矢を放つ（対不死には攻撃）
味方に接触させれば魔法球が吸着する

LV.６でターゲット数増加（３→７）</COL>
column2:
Fire magickal arrows that emit an area of debilitation
recovery at the impact point (inflicts damage to undead).
The field will attach to an ally if the arrow makes contact.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Reduces Stamina cost.
LV.6: Increases number of targets (2→3).</COL>

column1:

Fire magickal arrows that emit an area of Stamina

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration. Increases size of the effect.

column1:
聖属性の魔矢を放ち、着弾場所に魔法球を
展開する。敵に接触させた場合魔法球が付着し
継続して体力を奪う
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で魔法球継続時間が延長／攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
Fire magickal arrows of the Holy attribute. The arrows
will emit a magickal sphere upon impact. Enemies in
contact with the sphere will continously take damage.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases duration of spheres. Increases number of hits.</COL>

column1:
魔法のアンカーを射出し、捕らえた敵から攻力を
吸収することでフォースゲージを溜める
ヒット中、<PADM>左スティック<KEYM>移動キー</KEYM>で任意方向へ移動可能
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にヒット中のスタミナ消費減少
LV.６で射程距離延長</COL>
column2:
Fire a magickal anchor towards a foe, and gradually
fill the force gauge and aggression meter if it hits.
While the anchor is active, you can move in any direction
with <PADM>the left stick.<KEYM>the movement keys.</KEYM>
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases stamina consumption for each additional
hit while the anchor is active.
LV.6: Increases range of the skill.</COL>

The element is the same as the current selected.

ついにメルゴダの深淵の空に、黒竜自らがこの世界
を滅ぼすためにくぐり抜ける渦が現れた
　もはやレスタニアで動ける騎士と覚者は一握りとな
った今、黒剣の発見には、クラウスがいちはやく亡都
メルゴダに目星をつけ、錬金術師たちの中心となり動
いてくれた
　亡都メルゴダで錬金術師たちの協力のもとに黒剣を
全て破壊した我が覚者は、最後の滅びの渦へ渡るた
め、メルゴダ護政区にあるメルゴダの深淵へと向かっ
た
　メルゴダの深淵の淵に開いた、滅びの渦へのゲート
の前でミシアルが現れ、黒竜を倒すことが世界を滅び
から救う唯一の道だと告げたと言う
　滅びの渦の中では、レオが我が覚者を待ち受けてい
た。レオは、黒竜を倒し得る唯一無二の存在となるた
めにすべてを、そう、自らをも犠牲にして動いていた
ようだ。世界を救える存在は、自身、または我が白竜
の覚者のいずれなのかを問うたのだ
　レオは、世界の命運を賭けて我が覚者と果し合いを
し、すべての力と未来を託して消え去ったという
　かくて黒竜の元へ辿り着いた我が覚者は、竜の理の
破壊を目論む黒竜を討ち破り、そして誰もが想像だに
しなかった新たな理のかたち、人と竜が等しく生きる
時代が幕を上げた
　この物語の続きは、次なる神官であり、錬金術師で
もある愛すべき我が不逞の弟子、クラウスに託すとし
よう
　白竜の神官長ジョゼフ、ここに記す
column2:
Finally, in the sky above the Mergoda Abyss, the black dragon itself appeared, bringing with it a vortex to destroy this world.
Now that only a handful of knights and Arisen remain in Lestania, Klaus quickly identified the location of the Black Sword, Mysial, in the capital city of Mergoda, and rallied the alchemists to assist.
With the cooperation of the alchemists in the Mergoda Ruins, our Arisen, who had destroyed all the Black Swords, set off towards the Mergoda Abyss in the Mergoda Security District to cross into the final vortex of destruction.
At the gate to the vortex of destruction, Mysial appeared and proclaimed that defeating the black dragon is the only way to save the world from ruin.

Within the vortex of destruction, Leo awaited our Arisen. It seemed that Leo had sacrificed everything, even himself, to become the one and only being capable of defeating the black dragon. He questioned whether the savior of the world would be himself or our white dragon's Arisen.

Leo engaged in a final battle with our Arisen, staking the fate of the world. He entrusted all his power and the future to our Arisen before disappearing.

And so, our Arisen who reached the black dragon, planning to destroy the order of the dragons, finally defeated it. 
And thus, a new era, one where humans and dragons live equally, unfolded, something no one had ever imagined.

The continuation of this story will be entrusted to Klaus, the next priest, and also, the lovable disciple of our rogue ways, an alchemist.

Joseph, the High Priest of the White Dragon, writes it here.

ザンドラ東部、《死者の丘》と呼ばれる地にある
地下礼拝堂。冥界の王を奉るための場所であり
深部には亡霊騎士が守る呪われた秘宝があると
墓荒らしの間でまことしやかに囁かれている
挑んだ者全てが帰らなかったため、封鎖された
column2:
Eastern Zandora, a underground chapel referred to as the "Hill of the Dead". 
It is a place dedicated to the king of the underworld, and deep within, it is rumored that a cursed treasure guarded by a ghost knight can be found. 
Due to the fact that everyone who has challenged it has never returned, it has been sealed off.

今回の探索で、侵食には重度なものになると
より凶暴化し、感染力が上がる事が分かりました
相貌も変化し、正視に耐えられぬ姿になることも――
column2:
During this investigation, I've learned that the corruption
seems to become more of an issue when it reaches a severe level. Upon which,
the infectivity increases, and the appearance changes to form a figure that one
could not bear to look at...

column1:
ボルド大坑道で採掘が盛んだった頃
鉱員がダウ渓谷との連絡用に使っていた坑道
使われなくなって久しいものの、南壁谷の
道がなんらかの事情で塞がった場合は
唯一の交通路となる
column2:
During the time when mining was thriving in the Volden Large Tunnels, miners used this tunnel as a means of communication with Dowe Valley.
Although it has been unused for a long time, it serves as the only passage if the Southern Wall Gorge road becomes blocked due to any circumstances.

column1:
メルゴダ繁栄期、都の一部だった地域
都喪失の後は凶悪な魔物が跋扈し、墓地群は
不死者の彷徨う呪われた地と化した。しかし
数多く残された家屋遺跡は訪れた者に再利用
され、探検拠点として賑わいを見せている
column2:
During the flourishing period of Mergoda, it was a part of the capital city. 
After the loss of the capital, brutal enemies ran rampant, and the group of graveyards became a cursed land where the undead wander. 
However, many remaining house ruins have been repurposed by visitors and have become lively exploration bases.

アーク調査隊が予定を過ぎても戻らなかったため覚
者のひとりが派遣された
　負傷者はあったが、全員帰還することができてまず
は胸を撫で下ろしている。調査団長に任命されたクラ
ウスが好奇心に負けたことが原因だ。その結果、団員
と護衛隊を危険に晒してしまったようだ
　クラウスの性格からして悪意などなかったことはわ
かっている。厳重注意ということで関係者の理解を得
られたことと考えている
　さて、正式な報告書に先駆けて聞いたところによる
と、アークは明らかな人工物であり、内部には不可思
議な装置が設置されていたとのこと
　アーク及び装置の目的は不明だが、人工物とあれ
ば、作った者がいるはずだ。とある名前が頭に浮かん
だが、今しばらく黙っていよう。まだ謎が多い
　その者の名を出すことは謎を増やすだけで解明の足
しにはならないだろう
column2:
Due to the fact that the Ark exploration team did not return even after exceeding the scheduled time, one of the Arisen was dispatched.
Although there were injuries, everyone was able to return safely, and they are relieved. Klaus, who was appointed as the leader of the investigation team, was driven by curiosity, which resulted in endangering the members and the escort team.
Considering Klaus' personality, there was no malice involved. It is believed that understanding was obtained through strict warning.

Now, according to preliminary information before the formal report, it appears that the Ark is clearly an artificial object, and there were mysterious devices installed inside.

The purpose of the Ark and the devices is unknown, but if it is an artificial object, there must be someone who created it. A certain name came to mind, but let's stay silent for now. There are still many mysteries.

Mentioning the name of that person will only increase the number of puzzles and will not contribute to solving them.

column1: 協力者たちと親交を深める

心の奥底で、凶暴な衝動が
揺らめくのも感じるのだ
今まで見てきたおぞましい魔物のように
私も変わってしまうのだろうか――
column2: Deep in my heart, I can feel the flickering of a violent impulse. Just like the hideous enemies I have seen before, will I also end up changing—transforming into something horrifying?

Decoration that celebrates the first anniversary.

column1: ディケイドイビルアイ
ディケイドイビルアイ
ディケイドイビルアイ
ディケイドイビルアイ
ディケイドイビルアイ

数十年以上昔に魔物に襲われ、廃村と化した集落
白竜の力が弱まって後、恐ろしい魔物の襲撃にあい
抵抗の術もないまま一夜にして滅んだらしいが、
現在は当時の本当の経緯を知る者はいない
column2:
Decades ago, the village was attacked by monsters and turned into an abandoned village. 
After the power of the White Dragon weakened, the village suffered a terrifying monster raid. 
It was said that the village was destroyed overnight without any means of resistance. 
Currently, there is no one who knows the true circumstances of that time.

column1:
憲兵が落とした日々の巡回記録
複数の憲兵により異なる筆跡で書かれているが
どれも書式は共通している
“ ＜22時　対象を確認＞
　　場所：メガド居住区東小門前
　　人数：5名
　　報告：通報のあった結社集会の現場を発見
　　　　　構成員は全て市民のため
　　　　　その場で拘束・連行し、任務完了 ”
以下、同じような記録が淡々と続いている
column2:
Daily Patrol Records Dropped by the Military Police.
Written in different handwriting by multiple military policemen,
but all the formats are the same.
"<22:00 Confirm target>
Location: Megado Residential Area, East Gate
Number of people: 5
Report: Discovered the site of a reported association gathering
 All members are citizens
 Arrested and taken into custody on the spot, mission complete"
Following that, similar records continue in a steady manner.

蛇翼のカースシューター

今、この瞬間にも白竜の傷口から竜力が漏れ出して
いる。我々はこの惨事を防ぐことはできなかったの
か？
　事の次第を記しておこう。解放軍、メガドで合流し
た兵たち、北方から来た盗賊たちは陽動作戦よろし
く、分散して王都に潜入。混乱するオークたちを尻目
に、内部に入り込んだ
　丁度その頃の出来事であった。この神殿が一瞬闇に
落ちたように思われた。そして聞こえた鎧鳴り。やが
て気配は濃密な形となり、我々は罠にかかったことを
思い知らされた
　黒騎士が現れ、剣で白竜を深く刺し、傷を負わせた
のだ。しかも黒騎士は覚者たちの反撃も空しく悠然と
姿を消した
　見よ、この白竜を求める大勢の人々を。彼らの不安
げな問いかけに、白竜もわたしも今はまだ答える術を
知らない
column2:
Currently, Dragon Force is leaking out of
the White Dragon's wounds. Was there no
way we could have prevented this tragedy?
 I will record exactly what has transpired.
The Liberation Army, the soldiers from
Megado, and the Norther Bandit's diversionary
tactics ended in a success and they scattered
into the capital. The orcs were in chaos,
and they managed to infiltrate inside.
 At that time, the White Dragon temple fell
in an instant. I then heard the sound of
armor clanking. Finally, he appeared, and I
realized it was a trap.
 The Black Knight arrived, and pierced the
White Dragon with his sword, gravely
wounding him. He ignored the arisen's
retalitation, and calmly disappeared.
 Look at the people seeking answers from
the White Dragon. The White Dragon nor I
know how to answer their concerns.

橋を渡り、王家の墓へと侵攻しようとする
ドワーフオークを、王家の兵士たちが命を賭して
食い止めてきた場所。兵士、ドワーフオーク両者の
亡骸が無造作に転がっており、静かな場所ながら
激戦の痕跡を残す
column2:
Crossing the bridge, soldiers of the royal family risked their lives to stop the Dwarf Orcs from invading the Royal Family Mausoleum. 
The corpses of both soldiers and Dwarf Orcs lay scattered haphazardly, leaving behind traces of a fierce battle in this quiet place.

column2: Creating things can be so fascinating.

column1:
自身を中心に聖属性の巨大な魔法エリアを展開し
侵入してきた敵に攻撃を与える
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃範囲拡大</COL>
column2:
Creates a wide magick area of the Holy attribute
centered on yourself, dealing damage to enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.</COL>

column1:
急速に体力を回復させる魔法エリアを発現させる
（最大回復量は治癒上限値）（対不死には攻撃）
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に設置持続時間が延長
LV.６で展開エリアのサイズ拡張</COL>
column2:
Creates a magick area that rapidly regenerates health.
(Maximum healing limited to grey health)
(Inflicts damage to undead)
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of the effect.
LV.6: Increases the size of the effect.</COL>

column1:
急速にスタミナを回復させる魔法エリアを
発現させる（対不死には攻撃）
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に設置持続時間が延長
LV.６で展開エリアのサイズ拡張</COL>
column2:
Creates a magick area that rapidly regenerates Stamina.
(Inflicts damage to undead)
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of the effect.
LV.6: Increases the size of the effect.</COL>

column1:
一部の状態異常を瞬時に治療する魔法エリアを
発現させる（対不死には攻撃）
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に設置持続時間が延長
LV.６で展開エリアのサイズ拡張</COL>
column2:
Creates a magick area that instantly
cures debilitations.
(Inflicts damage to undead)
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of the effect.
LV.6: Increases the size of the effect.</COL>

column1:
大盾に広範囲を防御できる魔法の壁を付加する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に効果持続時間延長
LV.６で防御範囲が全方位化</COL>
column2:
Create walls of magick that increase the range
of your shield's ability to block.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of the effect.
LV.6: Makes the effect protect all of your sides.</COL>

column1:
炎、氷、雷の主要３属性を纏った
錬成式を地面から生成し空中に配置する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に錬成式の継続時間が延長
LV.６で聖・闇の２属性追加</COL>
column2:
Create an elemental orb that bestows one of the
three main attributes of fire, ice, or lightning,
from the ground and place it in the air.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of the skill.
LV.6: Unlocks the final two elements, Holy and Darkness.</COL>

column1: 空中で錬成物質を生みだし前方に放つ
column2:
Create an alchemical substance while in the air,
and launch it spinning forward.

column1: 空中で錬成物質を生みだし下方に放つ
column2:
Create an alchemical substance while in the air,
and fire it downward.

column1:
錬成物質を一点集中して成長させる
タイミングよくボタンを押すと攻撃回数が増加
空中でも発動可能
<COL ffdc78>LV UPで攻撃回数が増加し、錬成物質を
より成長させる＜クラスター・マギス＞に進化</COL>
column2:
Create an alchemical substance that expands outward.
Pressing the set button with correct timing increases number of attacks.
Can be activated even while in the air.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Becomes Cluster Magis, increasing maximum number
of attacks and expansion radius.</COL>

column1: 錬成物質を生みだし前方に放つ
column2:
Create an alchemical substance
and fire it forward.

column1: 錬成物質を生みだし広範囲に放つ
column2:
Create alchemical substances
and release them over a wide area.

column1:
魔力を収束させ、聖・打属性の魔力の渦を発生させる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
Lv.6で攻撃ヒット回数が増加</COL>
column2:
Create a vortex that deals Holy and Impact damage.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Increases damage of skill
LV.6 Increases number of hits.</COL>

column1:
幻影を作り出し、前方へ瞬間移動する魔法
移動中に接触した敵に対して、魔力の斬撃を浴びせる
空中での連続発動は2回まで可能
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に再発動禁止時間が短縮
LV.6で攻撃アクション中であればいつでも発動可能</COL>
column2:
Create a phantom and teleport forward.
If user comes into contact with enemy
while teleporting, deal magick damage.
Can use twice while mid air.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Reduce cooldown between activation.
LV.6 Can be used at any time during attack.</COL>

column1:
錬成物質を生みつつ、素早く後方に身を逸らす
錬成物質に敵の攻撃が接触すると、自動で
攻撃が繰り出される
column2:
Create a mass of alchemical substances that
quickly propels you backward. When an enemy's attack comes into
contact with the mass, it will explode outward and damage them.

column1:
自身の前方に魔力の盾を一定時間展開する
純魔法発動時は展開時間が減少しない
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に展開時間延長
LV.6で敵の攻撃に合わせて発動した際、展開時間延長</COL>
column2:
Create a magickal barrier in front of you for a certain amount of
time. Barrier duration does not decrease when using pure magick.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of the barrier.
LV.6 When invoked just before an enemy's attack connects,
duration is further increased.</COL>

column1:
敵の＜物理攻撃力上昇＞に合わせて
物理攻撃のダメージを無効化するバリアを展開する
バリア展開中は筋力／魔力／疲労攻力／チャンス攻力が増加するが
物理攻撃を受けるか時間経過によりバリアの耐久値は減少する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にステータスアップ効果／バリアの耐久値がより上昇</COL>
column2:
Create a barrier to disable the "Physical Attack Increase" buff
from enemy. While inside the barrier, Strength/Magick/
Chance Attack/Exhaust Attack are increased. The durability of the
barrier deteriotates over time and physical damage taken.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Further increases the stat bonus and duration
of the barrier.</COL>

column1:
敵の＜魔法攻撃力上昇＞に合わせて
魔法攻撃のダメージを無効化するバリアを展開する
バリア展開中は筋力／魔力／疲労攻力／チャンス攻力が増加するが
魔法攻撃を受けるか時間経過によりバリアの耐久値は減少する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にステータスアップ効果／バリアの耐久値がより上昇</COL>
column2:
Create a barrier to disable the "Magick Attack Increase" buff
from enemy. While inside the barrier, Strength/Magick/
Chance Attack/Exhaust Attack are increased. The durability of the
barrier deteriotates over time and magick damage taken.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Further increases the stat bonus and duration
of the barrier.</COL>

column1:
風を纏った錬成物質を生成し配置する
後退後に風の錬成球を叩くと、風圧が発生する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に錬成球の継続時間が延長
LV.６で叩いた時に発生する風圧範囲が拡張</COL>
column2:
Create a ball of wind-wrapped alchemical substances.
Wind pressure is generated when striking the ball
after placement.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of the skill.
LV.6: Increases range of wind pressure generated
when struck.</COL>

column1: コバルトヘリオトロープ
コバルト合金のインゴット

自身の体を金で覆い、敵の攻撃を遮断する
さらに攻撃した敵に対し黄金化の異常値を与える
空中でも発動可能
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に黄金化の異常値上昇
LV.６でダウン、拘束中を除きいつでも発動可能</COL>
column2:
Coat yourself in gold and deflect enemy attacks. Enemies
that attack will build up the "Gilded" status abnormality.
Can be activated even while in the air.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases rate of Gilding build-up.
LV.6: Can activate the skill at anytime except when grabbed.</COL>

大剣の切っ先を前方に構え、
敵を押しこみながら突進する
<PADM>左スティック<KEYM>移動キー</KEYM>で任意方向へ移動できる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で移動距離が延長／攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
Charges forward with the blade extended,
knocking down any caught in its path.
Use the <PADM>left stick<KEYM>move key</KEYM> to control the direction.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases movement distance. Increases
number of hits.</COL>

column1:
自身の体に魔力を溜め込み、体力が尽きると同時に
大爆発を起こし、周囲の敵に大ダメージを与える
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に発動中のスタミナ消費減少
LV.６で攻撃威力の上昇／攻撃範囲拡大</COL>
column2:
Charge magick within your body. When your health is
exhausted, create a wide explosion dealing
large damage to enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases Stamina consumption.
LV.6: Increases the damage and range of the effect.</COL>

column1: キャラエディット部屋(st0160)

振り上げた大剣に力を溜め、振り下ろす
溜め満了の瞬間にボタンを離すと威力大幅上昇
リベンジゲージ蓄積量に応じて、さらに威力が増加
<COL ffdc78>LV UPでさらに攻撃威力が上昇する
＜真・魔人斬り＞に進化</COL>
column2:
Channel energy into the blade, and slam it down.
When the button is released the moment the charge finishes, the damage
increases significantly.
Increases in damage as the Revenge Gauge rises.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of the skill.
Becomes (Indomitable Lash).</COL>

column1:
振り上げた大剣に力を溜め、渾身の力で振り下ろす
溜め満了の瞬間にボタンを離すと威力大幅上昇
リベンジゲージ蓄積量に応じて、さらに威力が増加
column2:
Channel energy into the blade, and slam it down with
the force of the entire body. When the button is released the moment the charge
finishes, the damage increases significantly.
Increases in damage as the Revenge Gauge rises.

column1:
ロッドの放射光を敵に照らしつづけることで
敵に遅延の状態異常値を蓄積させる
フォースゲージ１本以上の時、消費して技性能上昇
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に遅延の異常値上昇
LV.６で照射範囲拡大</COL>
column2:
Channel a light from your rod towards the enemy.
Slowly accumulates the Torpor debilitation over time.
With more than 1 Force Gauge, the effect will increase.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases the rate of Torpor accumulation.
LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.</COL>

column1:
ロッドの放射光を敵に照らしつづけることで
敵に睡眠の状態異常値を蓄積させる
フォースゲージ１本以上の時、消費して技性能上昇
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に睡眠の異常値上昇
LV.６で照射範囲拡大</COL>
column2:
Channel a light from your rod towards the enemy.
Slowly accumulates the Sleep debilitation over time.
With more than 1 Force Gauge, the effect will increase.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases the rate of Sleep accumulation.
LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.</COL>

column1:
属性防御の低下異常値を敵に蓄積させる放射光を放つ
（ロッドに付与した炎・氷・雷・聖・闇のいずれか）
フォースゲージ１本以上の時、消費して技性能上昇
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に選択中属性の異常値上昇
LV.６で照射範囲拡大</COL>
column2:
Channel a light from your rod towards the enemy.
Slowly accumulates a debilitation that decreases attribute
defense of enemies (determined by element granted to rod).
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases the rate of debilitation accumulation.
LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.</COL>

column1:
大量の魔力を剣に込め
射属性を持つ魔力の矢として敵に放つ
着弾するまでの飛距離が長い程、威力が上昇する
column2:
Channel a large amount of magick to your sword
and launch your sword to an enemy. The longer distance
it travels, the more damage increases.

column1: ハイセプターへの転職

モロー樹林地域とエラン水林地域を跨ぐ洞窟
距離としてはそう長い洞窟ではないが
野狼が潜んでいることが多いため
通行時には多少の注意が必要である
column2:
Cave spanning both the Morrow Forest and Elan Water Grove. 
It is not a particularly long cave in terms of distance. 
However, since wild wolves often lurk inside, some caution is required when passing through.

column1: 憩いの坑洞 最深部
冥府下りの洞穴 深層部
column2: Cave of Hell's Descent Inner Depths

column1: 冥府下りの洞穴 奥底

魔赤島・絶崖側の西端に見つかった洞窟
入口付近にも大きく成長した菌胞が張り付き
内部の侵食が激しく進んでいることが一目見て
わかるほどになっている。危機に対処可能な
実力を持つと認められた者のみが調査を許される
column2: Cave found on the western edge of Bloodbane Isle Precipice, known for its intense corruption and infected fungal growth covering the entrance. Only those recognized as having the ability to handle the crisis are permitted to investigate it.

column1:
魔赤島東部の海岸沿いに発見された洞窟
入口付近を調査した斥候隊により、微動だにしない
多数の人影を見たという報告が寄せられている
恐らく何らかの魔物による犠牲者の姿かと思われる
ため、軽率に足を踏み入れることは禁じられている
column2:
Cave discovered along the coast in the eastern part of Bloodbane Isle
Reports have been received from the scouting party who investigated the entrance area, saying that they saw numerous figures that didn't move even a bit.
It is likely that these are the victims of some kind of enemy.
Therefore, it is forbidden to step inside without caution.
