待ちきれないの？　マスター
完成するまでもう少し我慢してね
column2: Can't wait, Master? Just be patient a little longer until it's finished.

column1:
モルフォールの裏手にあるピクシーたちの野営地
家畜や農作物をこっそり盗むのが元々の目的だった
のだろうが、侵食されたピクシーたちには最早
そういった知性は無く、恐らく侵食前の習慣に従い
辺りをうろついているのだと推測されている
column2:
Camp of Pixies behind Morfaul.
Originally, their purpose was to secretly steal livestock and crops.
However, the Pixies who have been corrupted no longer possess such intelligence, and it is speculated that they are simply wandering around based on their habits before corruption.

column1:
自身がブラストビットで放った魔法球と
同数の魔法球を放つ砲台を一定時間生成する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に魔法砲台の出現時間延長
LV.６で魔法球の威力上昇／魔法砲台増加（１→２）</COL>
column2:
Call forth a magickal orb that acts as a turret and when hit
by Blast Bit, will generate additional Blast Bits from itself.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of the magickal orb.
LV.6: Increases the damage of the magickal orb, and the amount
that are placed (1→2).</COL>

column1: Cダンジョンボスドロップ

ところで――
最近は侵食されている魔物と対峙することが多く
ベンジャミン様はよく咳き込み
どこか苦しそうなご様子です
column2:
By the way -
Recently, Master Benjamin has been facing many infected enemies, and often coughs with a somewhat painful appearance.

column1:
河の流れによって様々なものが漂着する河岸
上流から流されてきたものの中には、解放軍の戦士
たちだけでなく魔軍の獣の死骸も多数存在する
流れ着いた骸から出でたものか、死臭に惹かれて
きたものか、骨になっても徘徊する魔物が徘徊する
column2:
By the flow of the river, various things drift and accumulate on the riverbank. 
Among the things carried downstream, there are not only soldiers of the Liberation Army, but also many carcasses of the enemy's animals. 
Whether they emerged from the washed-up corpses or were attracted by the stench of death, wandering monsters continue to wander even in their skeletal forms.

column1: 召喚された魔物を一掃したことで、骸の将の力が弱まっていく――
column2: By eliminating the summoned Enemies, the power of the Necro Master weakens —

column1:
しかし、金にするのが本当に正しい用途なのか？
もっと集めることで、何か作り出せるのかもしれない
column2:
But, is this really the right way to use it; making money?
Perhaps by gathering more, something useful might be made from it.

column1:
力を溜め、刀身で敵を叩きつける
敵を気絶させやすい
溜め満了の瞬間にボタンを離すと威力大幅上昇
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で溜め段階拡張（１→２）</COL>
column2:
Build up strength before striking enemies with the side
of your blade. Has high stunning power. Release the attack
as the charge finishes to increase power significantly.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.

ブリア海岸地域の漁村
比較的おだやかな環境に恵まれ、海が近く人々も
おおらか。しかし、海が村にもたらすものは魚や貝
だけではない。座礁船や、時には海竜といった脅威
が姿を現すこともある
column2:
Breya Coast region's fishing village.
It is blessed with a relatively calm environment and a close proximity to the sea, making the people easy-going. 
However, what the sea brings to the village is not just fish and shellfish.
There are also threats such as stranded ships and sometimes even sea dragons that appear.

column2:
Blow power increases in response to "Armor Harden" state triggered
by enemy, making it easier to break through their armor. When the
enemy is in the staggered state, Strength/Magick/Exhaust Attack/
Chance Attack increase.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP Further increases the stat bonus.</COL>

廃村デニスィルの裏手にある古い地下水路
魔軍のオークが見張りについていることから
内部に何かが隠されているか、あるいは重要な
通路の一つとして見なされていると推測される
また、ティネス砦に繋がっているという説もある
column2:
Behind the deserted village of Denisyr, there is an old underground waterway. 
The fact that orc soldiers from the Demon Army are stationed there suggests that something is hidden inside or that it is considered an important passage. 
There is also a theory that it connects to Fort Thines.

column1:
ゾマのすぐ裏手にある枯れ井戸
死者の丘から迷い込み、井戸に入り込んだまま
出られなくなった亡者がいるらしく、不気味な
声が周囲に漏れることがある
column2:
Behind Zoma, there is a dried-up well.
It is said that there are spirits who got lost from the Hill of the Dead and ended up trapped in the well, unable to escape.
Sometimes, eerie voices leak out into the surroundings.

精霊竜が棲む、《芯なる樹》の頂上部
フィンダム大陸中で最も竜力に満ちた
清浄な空間であったが、精霊竜が毒に
侵されたことにより、苦痛と禍々しさに
溢れる場所となった
column2:
At the top of the "Core Tree," where the "Spirit Dragon" resides.
The place most filled with "Dragon Force" in the entire continent of Phindym.
It was once a pure space, but due to the Spirit Dragon being tainted by poison, it has become a place filled with pain and malevolence.

column1:
城塞都市メガドの最上部に位置する王宮
王族とそれに連なる限られた者のみが居住する
ことを許された場所であり、厳重に守られている
一般市民がこの場を直に目にすることは
人生の中で恐らく一度も無いだろう
column2:
At the top of Fortress City Megado stands the royal palace, a place allowed only to the royal family and a select few.
It is heavily guarded and unlikely for ordinary citizens to ever lay eyes upon in their lifetime.

column1:
リベンジゲージ最大時に防御力が増加し、
攻撃を受けても体勢を崩されにくくなる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に物理防御力/耐久力がより増加</COL>
column2:
At max revenge gauge, your defense increases
and you do not stagger from enemy attacks.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases defense and poise.</COL>

column1:

column1:
一見よくある洞窟だが高低差が激しい
箇所があったり、より奥へ進んだ者がことごとく
戻らなかったという経緯から、近辺で育った
者はこの洞穴に近寄らないよう厳しく教え
込まれるという
column2:
At first glance, it appears to be a typical cave, but there are steep variations in height, and those who venture further inside never return. 
People who grew up in the vicinity are strictly instructed not to approach this cave.

column1:
イニアス湖南側、《霧幻のテラス》付近にて
霞んだような人影に声をかけられたという噂が
続出するようになった。声に応じようとしても
返答が返ってくることはなく、その不気味さ故に
近くを通る者はさらに減少したという
column2:
At Lake Inias on the southern side, near the Misty Illusion Terrace, rumors have been spreading that people have been approached by a figure that seems to be shrouded in mist. 
Despite trying to respond to the voice, there is no reply, which has only increased the eerieiness and caused even fewer people to pass by.

column1:
<SPOT 964>にある木立
土壌の侵食が進み、木々も草花も
立ったままの姿で色褪せ、枯れかかっている
辺りに住んでいた小型の魔物たちも
残らず侵食が進んだ状態となっている
column2:
At <SPOT 964>, the surrounding trees are fading away and withering, with the soil being corrupted. 
Even the small creatures that once inhabited the area have been completely infected.

メガド王宮層の周辺には王宮層を取り囲むように
複数の建造物が円形に立ち並び、それぞれ左右に
伸びた通路で繋がっている。元は回廊であったため
現在もそれらの建造物の総称として≪メガド回廊≫
という呼称が用いられている
column2:
Around the Megado Palace on the Megado Royal Layer, multiple buildings are arranged in a circle, connected by corridors extending left and right. 
Originally a corridor, they are still collectively referred to as the "Megado Corridor."

調べてみる価値はあるな――
column2:
Are there others like this?
It may be worth investigating further...

column1:
メガドを縄張りにする子供から聞いた目撃証言
“ <NPC 691>は数度にわたって彼らの縄張りに
　踏み込み、覚者たちを尾行するための
　事前調査を行っていた ”
という旨の内容
column2:
Approximate eyewitness testimony from a child in the Megado's territory:
"<NPC 691> trespassed into their territory several times, conducting preliminary investigations to tail the Arisen Corps members."

column1:
城塞都市メガドを臨み、振り返れば悠然たる
火垂れ山がよく見える眺望スポット。しかし今や
肉食動物や魔物が徘徊し、腐肉や死骸が
転がる殺伐とした広場となっている。メガドに
これほどまでに近い場所に魔物が現れるように
なったのはごく最近のことだ
column2:
Approaching the fortress city of Megado, when I turned around, I saw a serene view of Firefall Mountain. 
Nowadays, it has become a grim plaza where carnivorous animals and monsters roam, with rotting flesh and corpses scattered around. 
It is only recently that monsters have started to appear in a place so close to Megado.

巻きつけ強化する

LV.６で攻撃範囲拡大</COL>

arrows loaded. Increases damage inflicted.

持ち歩くにも動きづらいため
ひとまとまりにして保管しておくことにしよう
column2:
Anyway, my collection has recently grown in size...
I've decided to keep it all in one place, as it is getting hard
to carry it around everywhere with me.

column1:
ともあれ、希少素材は入手した
せめてメドゥーサの犠牲となった人々に
安らかな眠りが与えられるよう――祈るしかない
column2:
Anyway, as soon as we collect the rare material from it,
we have to say a prayer for the souls that have fell victim at the hands of the Medusa...
I have no choice but to pray...

その一端を担わせてくださるということ――
ポーンでありながら、仲間として
認められたような気さえしました
column2: And what moved me the most was that we were allowed to play a part in it as well. Even as pawns, it felt like we were recognized as companions.

謎の魔物が持っていたものと同じ物のようだが――？
column2:
Ancient relics from Dreed Castle's that had been kept underground
Strikingly similar to various relics that demons have.

リンウッドほど近くにある地下水路
魔物が巣くい使われなくなって久しいが、以前は
この水路で河川の水位を調整し水害に備えていた
リンウッドが水路を閉鎖した後も魔物は増え、
時に凶暴な大猿が出没することもある
column2:
An underground waterway near Lynwood. 
Although it has been abandoned by monsters for a long time, in the past, this waterway was used to adjust the water level of the river and prepare for floods. Even after Lynwood closed the waterway, the number of monsters increased, and sometimes ferocious apes would haunt the area.

column1:
リンウッドほど近くにある地下水路
魔物が巣くい使われなくなって久しいが、以前は
この水路で河川の水位を調整し水害に備えていた
リンウッドが水路を閉鎖した後も魔物は増え、
時に凶暴な大猿が出没することもある
column2:
An underground waterway near Lynwood. 
Although it has been abandoned by monsters for a long time, in the past, this waterway was used to adjust the water level of the river and prepare for floods. Even after Lynwood closed the waterway, the number of monsters increased, and sometimes ferocious apes would haunt the area.

column1:
ドリード城内、《地下通用口》から繋がる水路
もとはドリード城と河川の運搬路を繋ぐ連絡路
であったようだが、城の牢で獄死した者の骨や
入りこんだ魔物、瘴気が溜まり本来の機能は
失われて久しい
column2:
An underground waterway connected to the "Underground Side Entrance" within Dreed Castle.
Originally, it served as a passage linking the castle and the river for transportation purposes. However, it has long lost its original function due to the accumulation of bones of those who died in the castle's prison, as well as the presence of invading monsters and miasma.

column1:
ドリード城内、《地下通用口》から繋がる水路
もとはドリード城と河川の運搬路を繋ぐ連絡路
であったようだが、城の牢で獄死した者の骨や
入りこんだ魔物、瘴気が溜まり本来の機能は
失われて久しい
column2:
An underground waterway connected to the "Underground Side Entrance" within Dreed Castle.
Originally, it served as a passage linking the castle and the river for transportation purposes. However, it has long lost its original function due to the accumulation of bones of those who died in the castle's prison, as well as the presence of invading monsters and miasma.

column1:
バートランド北部からセラー湖の岸辺に繋がる
地下道。ガルドノック砦がオークに占領される前
騎士団が通り道や保管庫として作ったものである
らしい。もちろん、現在利用している人間はいない
column2:
An underground passage from the northern part of Betland to the shores of Lake Cera. 
It seems that the knight order built it as a thoroughfare and storage facility before Gardnox Fortress was occupied by orcs. 
Of course, there are no humans currently using it.

column1:
バートランド北部からセラー湖の岸辺に繋がる
地下道。ガルドノック砦がオークに占領される前
騎士団が通り道や保管庫として作ったものである
らしい。もちろん、現在利用している人間はいない
column2:
An underground passage from the northern part of Betland to the shores of Lake Cera. 
It seems that the knight order built it as a thoroughfare and storage facility before Gardnox Fortress was occupied by orcs. 
Of course, there are no humans currently using it.

column1:
ロスギルにほど近い開けた高台
まだ拠点として使われている様子は
見られないが、魔狼たちがなわばりとして
警戒し続けていることから、ロスギルへ
攻め込む際の足掛かりとされる可能性がある
column2:
An open plateau, not far from Rothgill. 
Although it doesn't appear to be currently used as a base, there is a possibility that it serves as a stepping stone for an attack on Rothgill, as the demon wolves continue to guard it territorially.

column1:
《森の隠れ村》にほど近い古い祠
アッカーシェランの大地に満ちた炎の気が滞留し
内部に足を踏み入れるとじっとりとした熱さを感じる
悪意を秘めたままに落命した者は、その悪意
を忘れ去るまで魂を焼かれながら祠を徘徊するという
column2:
An old shrine near the "Forest's Hidden Village".
It is filled with the lingering flame in the land of Acre Selund.
Once you step inside, you can feel the damp heat.
It is said that those who died with malice in their hearts will roam the shrine, their souls burning until they forget their malice.

column1:
未完成状態の素材錬魔が暴走し、研究室に踏み
入った者に攻撃を加えるようになった
完成前とはいえ、監視索敵用に特別開発されるはず
だった魔物のようだ
小型の未完成品と侮ってはいけない
column2: An incomplete material-altering creature has gone berserk and started attacking anyone who enters the laboratory. It was supposed to be specially developed for surveillance and reconnaissance, even though it is not yet complete. Do not underestimate this small unfinished product.

column1:
相当古い時代の難解な文書
複雑な図とともに記された古語は、ほぼ読みとれない
column2:
An esoteric document of considerable age.
Ancient words written with complicated figures, too damaged to read.

column1:
魔赤島中央部の海岸を辿った先に入口が発見された
地下施設。内部では水のせせらぎが絶えず響き
神聖さを感じさせる造りになっていることから
聖堂であると判断された。彫刻などの人工物が多数
残されており、異郷の文化を感じることができる
column2:
An entrance was discovered at the coast in the central part of Bloodbane Isle. 
Inside the underground facility, the sound of flowing water constantly echoes, giving a sense of holiness. 
It was determined to be a sanctuary due to its construction. 
Many artificial objects, such as sculptures, have been left behind, allowing one to experience a foreign culture.

column1:
細長くうねった川と切り立った崖で構成された峡谷
古代からの遺跡が多くのこる地域であり、文化的に
重要な地帯である。この辺りに住む人々も、伝承や
習慣などを重視した生活を送る傾向にある
column2:
An area composed of a narrow, winding river and steep cliffs, forming a gorge. 
It is a region with many ancient ruins remaining, making it culturally significant. 
The people living in this area tend to prioritize traditions and customs in their way of life.

column1:

The people living in this area tend to prioritize traditions and customs in their way of life.

column1:
ヒット＆アウェイのかく乱戦を得意とする軽業師
ロープワークで死角に回り込み、瞬時に巨大敵の
頭上に迫り連撃を加える様は戦場の疾風
column2:
An acrobat who excels at hit and run tactics.
Uses a rope to instantly move to the blind
spot of large enemies.
The Gale of the Battlefield.

退治した大型魔物に侵食の気配は無く
今まで同様強敵だったものの、少し安心しました

Although the land was highly corrupted and dangerous -
there was no sign of infestation in the large demons that we eliminated.
And although they were as powerful as ever, we were a bit relieved.

頼もしき従者と共に
どうか、辿り着かせてくれ――竜よ
column2: All that remains is the tower in the distance. Please, with my reliable attendants, guide me to reach it, oh, Dragon.

column2: Ah... I was feeling so helpless...

column1:
あぁ、何ということだ――
貴方に異界まで足を運ばせてしまうなど――！
この失点、必ずや取り返してご覧に入れます
column2:
Ah, what a turn of events...
To make you travel even to the other world...
I will definitely make up for this loss and show you.

column1: ああ――これこそ運命的な出会いというもの
column2: Ah, this is indeed what you would call a fateful encounter.

column1: あぁ、覚者様の幻が見える――

タッチアクションで
状態異常を回復したパーティメンバーの
スタミナを一定時間上昇させる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に効果時間がより上昇</COL>
column2:
After using the Touch action
to assist a party member out of a status abnormality.
Their maximum stamina is increased for a certain period of time.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration further.</COL>

column1:
タッチアクションで
状態異常を回復したパーティメンバーの
物理防御力と魔法防御力を一定時間上昇させる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に効果時間がより上昇</COL>
column2:
After using the Touch action
to assist a party member out of a status abnormality.
Their Physical and Magick Defense is increased for a period of time.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases effect duration.</COL>

column1:
タッチアクションで
状態異常を回復したパーティメンバーの
物理攻撃力と魔法攻撃力を一定時間上昇させる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に効果時間がより上昇</COL>
column2:
After using the Touch action
to assist a party member out of a status abnormality.
Their Physical and Magick Attack is increased for a period of time.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases effect duration.</COL>

column1:
山頂の小堂が無人化して後、グリフィンが居付き
巣を作ってしまった。そこには、レスタニア各地から
巨鷲の「目に適ったモノ」が集められており、その
多くは人力では撤去できないが、主の不在を狙えば
思わぬ宝物が手に入る――かもしれない
column2:
After the summit chapel became unmanned, a Griffin settled in and made its nest there. 
The nest contains various items suitable to the Griffin's eyes, collected from all over Lestania. 
Many of these items cannot be removed by human force, but if one were to take advantage of the absence of the owner, they might unexpectedly obtain a treasure.

column1: セットボタンで構え後、セットボタンを連続して押す
column2:
After pressing the assigned button,
repeatedly press the assigned button.

column1:
矢を放った後、次の矢をつがえる速度が速くなる
空中でも発動可能
column2:
After landing a hit with an arrow, the speed
of the next arrow is increased.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column1:
魔力を十分に溜めた後、特大威力の聖属性魔矢を放つ
<PADM>左スティック<KEYM>移動キー</KEYM>で軌道操作可能。威力はスタミナ依存
なお当たった部位は暫く自動的に魔矢の標的になる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力／魔力増加速度の上昇
LV.６で攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
After gathering sufficient magickal power, let loose
an extraordinarily powerful Holy arrow.
The arrow can be controlled mid-flight with the <PADM>Left Stick<KEYM>Movement Keys</KEYM>.
The power of the skill depends on the stamina available.
The hit spot will automatically be targeted by the magickal
arrows for a while.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage and cast speed of the skill.
LV.6: Increases number of hits.</COL>

column1:
魔力を溜めた後、杖を振って追尾性能を持つ
聖属性の魔法球を複数放つ
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で魔法球増加（３→５）</COL>
column2:
After charging, launch tracking projectiles.
Fires magick spheres of Holy attribute.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases number of magick spheres (3→5).</COL>

column1:
魔力を溜めた後、広範囲に向けて
聖属性の強い光を放射する魔球を展開する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃範囲拡大</COL>
column2:
After charging, fire a magick sphere that emits
an intense light of the Holy attribute in a wide area.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.</COL>

column1:
魔力を溜めた後、敵の頭上に落雷を発生させる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で落雷数が増加（３→５）</COL>
column2:
After charging magick, smite the enemy
from above with tongues of lightning.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases number of lightning strikes (3→5).</COL>

column1:
魔力を溜めた後、地を揺らし岩塊を隆起させ、
闇・打属性によるダメージを与える
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で岩塊数が増加（１→２）</COL>
column2:
After charging magick, shake the earth,
sending eruptions of stone high into the air.
Inflicts damage with Darkness and Impact attributes.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases number of rocks (1→2).</COL>

column1:
魔力を溜めた後、闇の霧を発生させる
霧は敵にまとわりつき、継続ダメージを与える
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で継続時間延長／攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
After charging magick, generate a dark fog.
The fog will cling to enemies, dealing damage over time.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases duration of the effect.
Increases the number of hits.</COL>

column1:
魔力を溜めた後、氷の槍を発現させ前方に放つ
氷・射属性によるダメージを与える
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃範囲拡大</COL>
column2:
After charging magick, conjure a twisting spike
of ice that thrusts forward from the ground.
Inflicts damage with Ice and Shot attributes.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.</COL>

column1:
魔力を溜めて凝縮し、無属性の魔球を発現させる
周囲に魔力を解放し大ダメージを与える
爆発範囲は調節可能で、狭いほど高威力
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で爆発範囲の限界幅が拡張</COL>
column2:
After charging magick, conjure a non-elemental magick orb.
The magickal power stored within the orb is released over
an adjustable area, dealing a great deal of damage to foes
within its range. Power increases as the orb becomes smaller.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of the skill.
LV.6: Expands the range of the explosion.</COL>

column1:
魔力を溜めた後、氷の矢を放つ氷塊を発現させ、
任意のタイミングで矢を高速射出する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で矢の数が増加／溜め攻撃が可能</COL>
column2:
After charging magick, conjure a giant snowflake
that calls forth and fires arrows of ice at high velocities.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of the skill.
LV.6: Increases number of arrows formed and allows the skill
to be charged.</COL>

column1:
魔力を溜めた後、上空に濃い闇の霧を発生させる
霧に侵入した全ての敵に継続ダメージを与える
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃範囲拡大</COL>
column2:
After charging magick, conjure a dense
dark fog overhead that deals continous
damage to enemies within.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.</COL>

column1:
魔力を溜めた後、
敵の頭上に燃え盛る隕石を落下させる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で隕石弾数が増加（４→７）</COL>
column2:
After charging magick, call meteors down from
the heavens to land around the enemy.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases number of meteors (4→7).</COL>

column1:
魔力を溜めた後、大杖を振りかざして
雷・斬属性を持つ円月状の衝撃波を放つ
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で衝撃波が３方向化</COL>
column2:
After charging magick, brandish your archistaff,
releasing a blade-shaped shockwave.
Inflicts damage with Lightning and Slash attributes.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Shockwave will fire in 3 directions.</COL>

column1:
魔力を溜めた後、
広範囲に向けてブレス状の炎を放つ
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で動作終了間際に追加入力することで
往復攻撃可能</COL>
column2:
After charging magick,
release a breath-like flame in front of you.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Press the button right before the end
to repeat the spell.</COL>

column1:
魔力を溜めた後、
高い炎の壁を作り出す
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で攻撃範囲拡大</COL>
column2:
After charging magick,
generate a towering wall of flame.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.</COL>

column1:
魔力を溜めた後、
敵の足元から巨大な氷の塊を出現させる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で術始動時に範囲攻撃追加</COL>
column2:
After charging magick,
generate a giant spire of ice at the enemy's feet.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage.
LV.6: Adds an additional attack at the start
of the effect.</COL>

column1:
力を十分に溜めた後、渾身の一撃を繰り出す
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６で剣に風圧が追加／攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
After channeling enough energy, release
a devastating slash with your body's entire might.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of skill.
LV.6: Adds wind pressure to the blade and increases number
of hits.</COL>

column1: バックリープ発動後に<KC SKILL_NORMAL1>を押す
column2: After activating Back Leap, press <KC SKILL_NORMAL1>.

column1:
長きに渡り閉ざされてきた大橋の門が開いた
この先は、禁じられた地・ザンドラへと続いている
禁域へ足を踏み入れるのであれば
相応の覚悟と実力が必要となる
column2:
After a long time of being closed, the gates of the bridge have opened.
Beyond this point lies the Forbidden Land of Zandora.
If you wish to step foot into this forbidden territory, you will need the appropriate resolve and strength.

column1:
大盾を構え、防御方向を固定する
固定中は攻力吸収量が上がり、スキが減少
ロッドの選択属性と受けた攻撃が同属性だと
吸収量増加。空中でも発動可能
column2:
Affix your greatshield towards the enemy, increasing
the rate of gauge gain. Gauge increase is larger
if the attack matches the element on your rod.
Can be activated in the air.

レスタニアとフィンダムの迷宮を巡り
希少素材を回収する旅も、もう長くなりますが――
column2:
Adventures through the labyrinths of Lestania
and Phindym to collect rare materials, have only gotten longer...

状態異常【凍結】【氷防低下】【水濡れ】
を付加する
※【凍結】は攻撃時や、ステータス適用の
魔法属性と一致する場合、効果を発揮する
column2:
Adds the status abnormality [Frozen Solid], [Ice Resist Down], [Drenched]. 
*[Frozen Solid] is effective when attacking or when the status applies the attribute of ice.

column1:
状態異常【延焼】【炎防低下】【油濡れ】
を付加する
※【延焼】は攻撃時や、ステータス適用の
魔法属性と一致する場合、効果を発揮する
column2:
Adds status abnormalities [Caught Fire], [Fire Resist Down], [Tarred].
*[Caught Fire] is effective when attacking or when the status applies the attribute of fire.

column1:
状態異常【感電】【雷防低下】【水濡れ】
を付加する
※【感電】は攻撃時や、ステータス適用の
魔法属性と一致する場合、効果を発揮する
column2:
Adds debilitations [Shocked], [Thunder Resist Down], and [Drenched].
*[Shocked] is effective when attacking or when the status applies the attribute of lightning.

column1:
状態異常【聖吸】【聖防低下】【スキル封印】
を付加する
※【聖吸】は攻撃時や、ステータス適用の
魔法属性と一致する場合、効果を発揮する
column2:
Adds debilitations [Holy Drain], [Holy Resist Down], [Skills Stifled].
*[Holy Drain] is effective when attacking or when the status applies the attribute of Holy.

column1:
状態異常【闇霧】【闇防低下】【毒】
を付加する
※【闇霧】は攻撃時や、ステータス適用の
魔法属性と一致する場合、効果を発揮する
column2:
Adds debilitations [Blinded], [Dark Resist Down], [Poison]. 
*[Blinded] is effective when attacking or when the status applies the attribute of dark.

increase the gauge by a large amount. Gauge increase
is larger if the attack matches the element on
your rod. Consumes no Stamina on block.

column2: According to a book found in the ruins, there is a beautiful underground waterway built by the elves somewhere.

column1:
意識を取り戻したガラダが語ったところによると、
原始の雫を奪ったのは、あのロイグと、ロイグが使役
する魔物だったとのこと
　行動を予想し、その結果、目的地で再会できたもの
の、半ば覚悟していたとおり話し合いで解決というわ
けにはいかず、戦闘と相成った
　自分の親の病気と、死を見て見ぬふりでやり過ごし
たフィンダムの風潮と、人々を恨んだロイグのその憎
しみを黒騎士に利用されたというのがおおよその経緯
らしい
　ともあれ、原始の雫はセシリーたちの手に戻った。
事変の終結まであと少し――そろそろ期待してもいい
だろう
column2:
According to Gearóid, who regained consciousness, it was Loeg and the enemies he commanded who stole the Primeval Drops. Despite predicting their actions and hoping for a peaceful resolution upon reaching their destination, it ended up escalating into a battle.
The approximate background was that Loegs's resentment towards the people of Phindym, who ignored his parent's illness and death, was exploited by the Black Knight. In any case, the Primeval Drops have been returned to Cecily and her companions.

With just a little more time until the end of the incident, it may be safe to start hoping.

column1:
精密な射撃で遠距離から先制するスナイパー役
特殊矢による多様な支援力も魅力
強敵の弱点を正確に射ぬき戦況を優位に導く
column2:
Able to deal precise damage from
long distances.
Has a variey of support abilities by the use of
special arrows.
The Sniper of the Battlefield.

column1: アブレイズツインスペル
アブレイズスクトゥム
アブレイズパルチザン
アブレイズガントレット
アブレイズファルシオン
アブレイズドルイドワンズ
アブレイズコンポジット
アブレイズクレイモア

海辺にある朽ちた廃屋の地下倉庫
魔物やならず者の溜まり場になりやすい
ことから封鎖されたが、何者かが侵入
したらしい形跡や物音が最近しばしば
確認されている
column2:
Abandoned underground storehouse within a decaying shack by the seaside. 
It tends to become a gathering place for monsters and rogues, which is why it was sealed off. 
However, recently there have been frequent sightings of signs of someone or something trespassing and strange noises.

column1: ハイデル街道の枯れ井戸
ハイデル街道の枯れ井戸
ハイデル街道の枯れ井戸
AP【バートランド平原北部】

ポーン郷からリンウッド方面に繋がる
木造の橋。南ハイデル大橋と同時期の水害で
破損したが、住民の手が回らず復旧が遅れていた
放置された理由は、ポーン郷へ行く覚者の多くが
リム転移を用いるためらしい
column2:
A wooden bridge that connects from Pawn Cathedral to Lynwood. 
It was damaged during the same flood as the South Hidell Bridge, but restoration was delayed as the residents were unable to handle it. 
The reason for its abandonment seems to be because many Arisen who go to Pawn Cathedral use Rift Teleport.

column1:
バートランド平原北部、ガルドノック砦に
近い井戸。長らく放置されているため
雨風にさらされ朽ちかけている
column2:
A well near Gardnox Fortress in the Northern Betland Plains.
It has been left untouched for a long time, exposed to wind and rain and on the verge of decay.

column1:
精霊槍を振るい森羅の加護を得た槍士
霊の加護は一時的に戦闘能力を引き上げるだけ
でなく、自身や仲間を癒し導く守護にもなる
column2:
A warrior blessed and protected by
the spirits.
With their spirit spear they can heal, lead and
support the party.
The Druid of the Battlefield.

column1:
ファーラナ平原に位置する戦士の村
武勇を最も尊ぶ部族が住まい、住人たちは
日々鍛錬と戦いに明け暮れている
力に裏付けされてか、地理的な理由に寄るものか
比較的侵食の影響を受けずに生活している
column2:
A village of warriors located in the Farana Plains.
The inhabitants, who hold valor in the highest regard, spend their days immersed in training and battles. 
Whether supported by their strength or due to geographical reasons, they live relatively unaffected by corruption.

column1:
ファーラナ平原に位置する戦士の村
武勇を最も尊ぶ部族が住まい、住人たちは
日々鍛錬と戦いに明け暮れている
力に裏付けされてか、地理的な理由に寄るものか
比較的侵食の影響を受けずに生活している
column2:
A village of warriors located in the Farana Plains.
The inhabitants, who hold valor in the highest regard, spend their days immersed in training and battles. 
Whether supported by their strength or due to geographical reasons, they live relatively unaffected by corruption.

column1:
ミスリウ森林中部にある、狩人と木こりの村
獣革や木材、薬草類など森は資源が豊富なため
素材を扱う者にとって重要な村である
ただし森には遺跡や自然洞窟も多く、そこをねぐら
とする魔物への警戒は常に必要だ
column2:
A village of Hunters and Woodcutters.
Located in the central part of the Mysree Forest, this village is important for those who handle materials such as animal hides, lumber, and medicinal herbs, as the forest is abundant in resources. However, the forest is also filled with ruins and natural caves, which serve as lairs for enemies, so caution is always necessary.

column1:
ミスリウ森林中部にある、狩人と木こりの村
獣革や木材、薬草類など森は資源が豊富なため
素材を扱う者にとって重要な村である
ただし森には遺跡や自然洞窟も多く、そこをねぐら
とする魔物への警戒は常に必要だ
column2:
A village of Hunters and Woodcutters.
Located in the central part of the Mysree Forest, this village is important for those who handle materials such as animal hides, lumber, and medicinal herbs, as the forest is abundant in resources. However, the forest is also filled with ruins and natural caves, which serve as lairs for enemies, so caution is always necessary.

column1:
ハイデル平原南部に位置する村
ワインなど果実酒造りが盛んだったが、近年は不作
と原因不明の病により活力が落ちつつある
この異変には、廃屋化したハイデル教会が何らか
の形で関わるのではと噂されている
column2:
A village located in the southern part of the
Hidell plains. Wine and other beverages used to
be plentiful, but in recent years, bad crops
and blights have been common due to
unknown diseases. Due to this, the Hidell
church was abandoned.
It is rumored to be involved somehow.

column1:
ハイデル平原南部に位置する村
ワインなど果実酒造りが盛んだったが、近年は不作
と原因不明の病により活力が落ちつつある
この異変には、廃屋化したハイデル教会が何らか
の形で関わるのではと噂されている
column2:
A village located in the southern part of Hidell Plains.
Wine-making, such as fruit wines was a thriving trade,
but in recent years, trade and health have declined
from bad crop harvests and a mysterious disease.
After rumors about the nearby Hidell Chapel's
involvement surfaced, the chapel has since been
abandoned.

column1:
戦禍を逃れてきた人たちが、森の中で
息を潜めるように、しかししたたかに支え合って
暮らしている非常に小さな集落
避難民の中に統率力に優れる者がいるらしく
今のところ比較的安定した生活を送っている
column2:
A very small settlement where people who have escaped from the ravages of war live hidden in the forest. 
They support each other cunningly yet quietly, living together. 
Among the refugees, there seems to be someone with exceptional leadership skills, and they are currently leading a relatively stable life.

column1:
戦禍を逃れてきた人たちが、森の中で
息を潜めるように、しかししたたかに支え合って
暮らしている非常に小さな集落
避難民の中に統率力に優れる者がいるらしく
今のところ比較的安定した生活を送っている
column2:
A very small settlement where people who have escaped from the ravages of war live hidden in the forest. 
They support each other cunningly yet quietly, living together. 
Among the refugees, there seems to be someone with exceptional leadership skills, and they are currently leading a relatively stable life.

column1:
レスタニア南部の広大な森林
多くの動植物、人、そして魔物が住み、それを可能
にするだけの恵みに満ちている。また、森のいたる
所に自然洞窟や旧時代の遺跡なども存在するため
探索には事欠かない地域である
column2:
A vast forest in southern Lestania.
Abundant with a wide variety of animals, plants, people, and creatures, thanks to its bountiful blessings. Moreover, the forest is adorned with natural caves and ancient ruins scattered throughout, making it an ideal region for exploration.

column1:
レスタニア南部の広大な森林
多くの動植物、人、そして魔物が住み、それを可能
にするだけの恵みに満ちている。また、森のいたる
所に自然洞窟や旧時代の遺跡なども存在するため
探索には事欠かない地域である
column2:
A vast forest in southern Lestania.
Abundant with a wide variety of animals, plants, people, and creatures, thanks to its bountiful blessings. Moreover, the forest is adorned with natural caves and ancient ruins scattered throughout, making it an ideal region for exploration.

column1:
二つのアーチ状の岩壁に囲まれた谷。そこを
メルゴダを守り続ける錬魔兵団が巡回している
今や、その巡視命令を解ける者はいないため
亡都へ向かうには彼らとの交戦もやむないだろう
まれに、恐るべき女守官が帯同することも
column2: A valley enclosed by two arched rock walls. The Mergoda Patrol Corps, dedicated to guarding Mergoda, conducts regular patrols there. At present, there is no one capable of revoking their patrol orders, so it may be inevitable to engage in combat with them in order to proceed towards the capital. Occasionally, a formidable female commander accompanies them.

column1:
旧時代、白竜の座であったと伝えられる神殿
セラー湖の水を制御する水門を備えたこの神殿は
ドリード城と同時代、竜と人を繋ぐ場であったと
されている。すでにここを守る神官はおらず
老朽化も進んでいるが、その威容は健在
column2:
A temple said to have been the seat of the White Dragon in ancient times. 
This temple, equipped with floodgates to control the waters of Lake Cera, was believed to be a place that connected dragons and humans, just like Dreed Castle. 
Although there are no longer priests protecting this place and it is deteriorating, its majestic presence remains.

column1:
旧時代、白竜の座であったと伝えられる神殿
セラー湖の水を制御する水門を備えたこの神殿は
ドリード城と同時代、竜と人を繋ぐ場であったと
されている。すでにここを守る神官はおらず
老朽化も進んでいるが、その威容は健在
column2:
A temple said to have been the seat of the White Dragon in ancient times. 
This temple, equipped with floodgates to control the waters of Lake Cera, was believed to be a place that connected dragons and humans, just like Dreed Castle. 
Although there are no longer priests protecting this place and it is deteriorating, its majestic presence remains.

column1:
メガド周辺を警備する目的で使われる監視塔
すでに地上階は魔軍により占拠されているが
魔物たちは地下階の存在には気付かなかったようだ
地下階には、メガド陥落の折に逃げ延びた兵士たちが
救援を信じ、息を殺すように潜んでいる
column2:
A surveillance tower is used to secure the surroundings of Megado. 
The ground floors have already been occupied by the demon army, but it seems like they were unaware of the existence of the underground floors. 
Soldiers who managed to escape during the fall of Megado are hiding in the underground floors, holding their breath as they believe in the possibility of rescue.

column1:
メガド周辺を警備する目的で使われる監視塔
すでに地上階は魔軍により占拠されているが
魔物たちは地下階の存在には気付かなかったようだ
地下階には、メガド陥落の折に逃げ延びた兵士たちが
救援を信じ、息を殺すように潜んでいる
column2:
A surveillance tower is used to secure the surroundings of Megado. 
The ground floors have already been occupied by the demon army, but it seems like they were unaware of the existence of the underground floors. 
Soldiers who managed to escape during the fall of Megado are hiding in the underground floors, holding their breath as they believe in the possibility of rescue.

column1:
ガルドノック砦の南、哨戒地に頑丈な鱗ととりわけ
するどい牙を持つ地竜が出現した。どうやら
オーク軍が、次なるグリッテン砦への一手として
用意した軍竜のようだ
放置すれば本格的な脅威となるだろう
column2:
A strong Earth Dragon with durable scales and especially sharp fangs has appeared in the southern part of Gardnox Fortress, in the patrol area. 
It seems that the Orc army has prepared this dragon unit as their next move towards Fort Gritten. 
If left unattended, it will become a significant threat.

column1:
ハイデル南部、テル村に近い石造りの橋
ダウ渓谷方面との往来が盛んだった頃、この橋を通る
行商人が多かったことから、その襲撃に味を
しめたゴブリンにより度々占拠されるようになった
退治する者と小鬼のイタチごっこは現在も続いている
column2:
A stone bridge near Tel Village in Southern Hidell.
When traffic to and from Dowe Valley was thriving,
there were many peddlers passing through this
bridge, which led goblins to occasionally occupy it.
Those who exterminate the small demons on the
bridge may still continue to do so.

column1:
元々はフィンダムの大地へ、そして竜のために季節
ごとの舞踊が奉納されていた広場。侵食によって
フィンダム全域での危険度が増したことでこれらの
行事は中止され、以来本来の使い方をされることは
無くなった
column2:
A square originally dedicated to seasonal dances dedicated to the dragon. 
Due to the increase in danger throughout Phindym caused by the Corruption, these events were canceled and have since ceased to be used for their original purpose.

column1:
元々はフィンダムの大地へ、そして竜のために季節
ごとの舞踊が奉納されていた広場。侵食によって
フィンダム全域での危険度が増したことでこれらの
行事は中止され、以来本来の使い方をされることは
無くなった
column2:
A square originally dedicated to seasonal dances dedicated to the dragon. 
Due to the increase in danger throughout Phindym caused by the Corruption, these events were canceled and have since ceased to be used for their original purpose.

column1:
《精霊竜のねぐら》へと続くらせん状の階段を
有した空間。空気中に満ちた竜力の加護か、
これだけの長い階段を上ってもまるで足の痛みを
感じることが無いという
column2:
A spiraling staircase leading to the "Spirit Dragon's Roost." 
Perhaps due to the divine protection of the Dragon Force permeating the air, one can ascend this long staircase without feeling any pain in their feet.

column1:
侯爵家を出入りしていた戦士が
偶然入手した謎の帳簿
かなり使い込まれているようで
几帳面な字で文字と数字が羅列されている
“オーク”という言葉が頻出している
column2:
A soldier who frequented the Marquis' household happened to come across a mysterious ledger. 
It appears to have been heavily used, with neat handwriting and a series of characters and numbers listed. 
The word "Orc" is frequently mentioned.

column1:
魔赤島中央部にそびえる海を臨む小塔
外壁の様子から、かなり古くも丁寧に手入れをされ
てきたことがうかがえる。用途は不明だが、すぐ傍に
井戸があることから塔内部あるいはその地下にも水が
流れている可能性がある
column2:
A small tower overlooks the sea towering in the central part of Bloodbane Isle. 
From the appearance of the outer wall, it can be inferred that it has been quite old but carefully maintained. 
The purpose is unknown, but there is a well nearby, suggesting that there may be water inside the tower or underground.

column1:
かつてはフィンダム中から学者たちが集う学研の場で
あった小塔。魔物の襲撃を受けて放棄されたのち
ピクシーの大きな群れが移住した。位の高い
ピクシーは高所を好むため、小塔の上階には群れ
の長もしくは準ずる個体が生息していると思われる
column2:
A small tower in the midst of Phindym, where scholars gathered in the past. 
After being abandoned due to enemy raids, a large group of Pixies migrated there. 
Pixies of high rank prefer high places, so it is believed that the leader or a similar individual of the group resides on the upper floor of the tower.

column1:
かつてはフィンダム中から学者たちが集う学研の場で
あった小塔。魔物の襲撃を受けて放棄されたのち
ピクシーの大きな群れが移住した。位の高い
ピクシーは高所を好むため、小塔の上階には群れ
の長もしくは準ずる個体が生息していると思われる
column2:
A small tower in the midst of Phindym, where scholars gathered in the past. 
After being abandoned due to enemy raids, a large group of Pixies migrated there. 
Pixies of high rank prefer high places, so it is believed that the leader or a similar individual of the group resides on the upper floor of the tower.

column1:
蝶の細工があしらわれた小さな銀の鍵
エルフ族の文字が刻まれている
column2:
A small silver key with a butterfly design.
Elven characters are inscribed.

column1:
水辺に面した小さな洞穴
霧の森から漏れ出でたものが留まりやすい
風の音が何事かを囁いているように聞こえる
ことから、以前より不気味な噂が立っている
column2:
A small cave facing the water's edge where things leaking out of the Forest of Mist tend to stay.
The sound of the wind seems to whisper something, which has led to eerie rumors for some time now.

column1:
ローテスに近い岸壁裏の小さな浜
人目に付きにくく、村や街道にも近いため、ならず者
が野宿をしたり盗品の一時保管に使う事も多い
覚者がローテスに立ち寄った際は、浜に異変がないか
確認しておいたほうがいい
column2:
A small beach behind the quay near Rotes.
It is hidden from view and close to the village and the road, so it is often used by rogues to camp out and temporarily store stolen goods.
When Arisen stop by Rotes, they should check the beach to see if there is anything unusual.

column1:
ファーラナ平原とエラン水林を繋ぐ谷あい
の道、中ほどにある少し拓けた場所
周囲を崖に囲まれているため、大型の魔物が
身を隠して羽根を休めるための巣として
利用している
column2:
A slightly open place in the middle of the road connecting the Farana Plains and the Elan Water Grove. 
The surrounding cliffs make it a nest for large monsters to hide and rest their wings.

column1:
不気味な庭を持つ祠。夜な夜な生者か死者か
判別できぬ怨嗟の声が聞こえると言われ
一帯でも特に不吉な場所とされている
近寄れば、冥府の執行者により魂を奪われる
という噂がある
column2: A shrine with a creepy garden. It is said that eerie voices of unknown origin can be heard at night, whether they come from the living or the dead. This place is considered particularly ominous in the entire area. If you approach it, it is rumored that the executor of the underworld will take away your soul.

column1:
廃墟の地下食糧庫。腐った食べ物を求めて
不死者がぞろぞろ入り込んだという噂があり
ジンゲンの民は気味悪がっている
column2:
A ruined underground supply store.
Rumors have circulated that undead creatures have swarmed in, seeking rotten food. 
The people of Jingen are feeling uneasy about it.

column1:
グリンメル遺跡の近くにある川岸
以前は遺跡への参道だったが、土が水に削られてゆき
現在は完全に川の中に沈んでしまっている
見かけより水深はないため、子供でも歩いて
渡ることが可能である
column2:
A riverside near the Grinmel Ruins.
It used to be a pathway to the ruins, but the soil was eroded by water and now it has completely sunk into the river. 
Despite appearing treacherous, the water depth is not significant, so even children can walk across it.

column1:
オークの根城に近い辺境の村
人がハイデル平原以南での防衛を決めてからこれ
まで、外部との交流はほとんど途絶えていた
厳しい環境ながら、故郷に残ると決めた者達により
村は守られ、細々と営みは続けられている
column2:
A remove village, located near the orc stronghold.
Has had little contact with the outside world since the people decided to defend themselves in the southern Hidell Plains. Despite the harsh conditions, the villagers who chose to stay in their homeland have managed to protect the village and continue their modest livelihood.

column1:
オークの根城に近い辺境の村
人がハイデル平原以南での防衛を決めてからこれ
まで、外部との交流はほとんど途絶えていた
厳しい環境ながら、故郷に残ると決めた者達により
村は守られ、細々と営みは続けられている
column2:
A remove village, located near the orc stronghold.
Has had little contact with the outside world since the people decided to defend themselves in the southern Hidell Plains. Despite the harsh conditions, the villagers who chose to stay in their homeland have managed to protect the village and continue their modest livelihood.

column1:
盾を構えながら素早く踏み込む
<PADM>左スティック<KEYM>移動キー</KEYM>により特定方向に移動できる
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に防御性能の上昇／スタミナ消費減少
LV.６で移動速度上昇／移動方向に左右追加</COL>
column2:
A quick forward lunge while guarding with a shield.
Use the <PADM>left stick<KEYM>move key</KEYM> to dash in a specific direction.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases Stamina cost to block.
LV.6: Able to dash left and right. Increases speed.</COL>

column1:
霊泉のテラス深部に純白の獅子が現れた
その姿は大理石のように淡く輝き、瞳と口は血と
魔力で赤く濡れているという。フォレストゴブリン
が聖獣として崇めるこの白獅子が村に出てゆく前に
何とか対処しなければならない
column2:
A pure white lion appeared in the depths of the Sacred Spring Terrace. 
Its figure was pale and radiant like marble, and its eyes and mouth were said to be wet with blood and magic, creating a red hue. 
This white lion, revered by the Forest Goblins as a sacred beast, must be dealt with before it leaves for the village.

column1:
ドラワン教会の地下に作られた富裕層向け公共墓地
だが死体を貪る悪鬼が司祭を襲い、墓地に侵入
するという事件以降、地下への扉は固く施錠された
それ以来、教会を訪れる者はほとんどいない
column2:
A public cemetery for the wealthy was built in the basement of Drawan Church. 
However, after an incident where a greedy demon attacked the priest and invaded the cemetery, the door to the basement has been firmly locked. 
Since then, very few people have visited the church.

column1:
アンセスターオークたちが棲息する、とても
原始的な拠点のようなもの。実際には集団で
生活しているだけの縄張りのようなものかと
思われているが、ヘルハウンドを家畜のように
飼い慣らしている節が見受けられる点には
今後も警戒が必要だろう
column2:
A primitive base-like habitat where Ancestor Orcs dwell. 
It is believed to be a territory where they simply live in groups, but caution will be necessary in the future, as there seems to be a tendency to tame Hellhounds like livestock.

column1:
《<SPOT 931>》の傍にある、大きな滝に
面した広場。地名の由来は滝に虹がかかる
ことからという説の他に、色鮮やかな鳥達が
辺りを舞うからだという説もある
column2:
A plaza facing a large waterfall beside<SPOT 931>. 
The origin of the name of the place is said to be the rainbow over the waterfall as well as the brightly colored birds dancing around the area.

column1:
《<SPOT 931>》の傍にある、大きな滝に
面した広場。地名の由来は滝に虹がかかる
ことからという説の他に、色鮮やかな鳥達が
辺りを舞うからだという説もある
column2:
A plaza facing a large waterfall beside<SPOT 931>. 
The origin of the name of the place is said to be the rainbow over the waterfall as well as the brightly colored birds dancing around the area.

column1:
ファーラナ平原の川中に浮かぶ陸地
周辺は水深が浅く、水没してはいるものの
歩き回ることが可能。ただし、汚泥が流れ着く
ことも多いらしく、不浄の魔物がさ迷っている
こともある
column2:
A piece of land floating in the middle of the river in the Farana Plains. 
The surrounding waters are shallow, allowing for exploration on foot, despite periodic submersion. 
However, it appears that mud and debris often accumulate here, leading to the presence of foul creatures wandering about.

column1:
ファーラナ平原の川中に浮かぶ陸地
周辺は水深が浅く、水没してはいるものの
歩き回ることが可能。ただし、汚泥が流れ着く
ことも多いらしく、不浄の魔物がさ迷っている
こともある
column2:
A piece of land floating in the middle of the river in the Farana Plains. 
The surrounding waters are shallow, allowing for exploration on foot, despite periodic submersion. 
However, it appears that mud and debris often accumulate here, leading to the presence of foul creatures wandering about.

column1:
バートランド北部に繋がる谷間の橋に、オークの
一隊が侵入し南下を企てている
グリッテン砦やハイデル方面への侵入を防ぐため
発見し次第早急に討伐し、食い止める必要がある
column2:
A party of Orcs has invaded the bridge in the valley leading to northern Bartland, attempting to push southward towards Fort Gritten and the Heidell region. 
It is necessary to promptly discover and subdue them to prevent their advance.

column1: レジスタンスに新たな仲間が加わった！
column2: A new friend joins the resistance!

column1:
かつて森の民が使っていたディナン深層林と
ミスリウ森林を繋ぐ自然洞窟
長らく閉ざされていたため、内部が
どうなっているか知る者はいない
column2:
A natural cave that connects the deep forests of Deenan and Mysree, which were once used by the people of the forest. 
It has been closed off for a long time, so no one knows what it looks like inside.

column1:
魔赤島における調査のために自然洞窟を
整備して駐屯地とした
侵食が進む魔赤島において、状態が良く
広さも申し分ない洞窟を発見できたことは
調査隊にとってまさに奇跡的な幸運であった
column2:
A natural cave developed and turned into a base camp for the investigation of Bloodbane Isle.
In the rapidly deteriorating island plagued by Corruption, it was truly a miraculous stroke of luck for the research team to discover a cave that was not only in good condition but also spacious enough to meet their needs.

column1:
魔赤島における調査のために自然洞窟を
整備して駐屯地とした
侵食が進む魔赤島において、状態が良く
広さも申し分ない洞窟を発見できたことは
調査隊にとってまさに奇跡的な幸運であった
column2:
A natural cave developed and turned into a base camp for the investigation of Bloodbane Isle.
In the rapidly deteriorating island plagued by Corruption, it was truly a miraculous stroke of luck for the research team to discover a cave that was not only in good condition but also spacious enough to meet their needs.

column1:
大地の陥没からなる自然豊かな洞窟
目立たない場所に位置することと、陽の光が差し込む
構造から内部には緑が生い茂り、野生動物たちが棲む
今となっては、悪しき竜と魔軍の所業によって荒廃する
前の“アッカーシェランの自然”が残る貴重な場所
column2:
A natural and abundant cave formed by the collapse of the surface. 
Located in an inconspicuous place, it is filled with greenery and inhabited by wild animals, thanks to the structure that allows sunlight to penetrate it. 
It is now in a state of ruin due to the deeds of the evil dragon and the demon army. 
This is a precious place where the remnants of the previous "Self" of Acre Selund remain.

column1:
ザンドラ東部、人獣を問わず屍が放置された
ままとなり死臭が染みついた小路
屍は盗賊の襲撃を受けた犠牲者とも、魔物に
喰らわれた獲物とも推測されているが
この地においてそれを追及する者はいない
column2: A narrow path in Eastern Zandora where corpses of both humans and animals are left unattended, permeating the air with the stench of death. It is speculated that these corpses are the victims of bandit raids or prey devoured by enemy creatures. However, there is no one here who investigates such matters.

column1:
大樹の意匠が彫られた壮麗なパネル状の鍵
かなり大きな扉の施錠に使われていたようだ
column2:
A magnificent panel-shaped key in which the design of the big tree was carved.
It seems that it was used to lock quite a large door.

column1:
エルフ族が築いた壮麗なる都
しかし、エルフ族が姿を消して以降美しさはその
ままに、ゆっくり時と共に森に呑まれつつある
彼らの神秘的で精緻な技は、今なおエルテ・ディナン
のいたるところに遺されている
column2:
A magnificent city built by the Elves.
Even after the disappearance of the Elves, the beauty remains, gradually being swallowed by the forest with the passing of time.
Their mystical and exquisite craftsmanship is still left everywhere in Erte Deenan.

column1:
エルフ族が築いた壮麗なる都
しかし、エルフ族が姿を消して以降美しさはその
ままに、ゆっくり時と共に森に呑まれつつある
彼らの神秘的で精緻な技は、今なおエルテ・ディナン
のいたるところに遺されている
column2:
A magnificent city built by the Elves.
Even after the disappearance of the Elves, the beauty remains, gradually being swallowed by the forest with the passing of time.
Their mystical and exquisite craftsmanship is still left everywhere in Erte Deenan.

column1:
魔道剣で敵の魔力を我が物とする魔法剣士
魔力を攻守に長けた魔法へと変化させ
様々な状況で戦況を覆す事で輝きを放つ
column2:
A magical swordsman who uses his sword to take his enemy's magic into his own hands.
Transforms magic into offensive and defensive magic.
He shines by overturning the battle situation in various situations.

column1:
平原と山岳地帯の中ほどに位置する大渓谷
渓流と針葉樹林の茂る美しい景観が最大の魅力
自然だけではなく、旧白騎団の古城、見張り塔
など遺構も数多く存在し、かつてここが繁栄の地で
あった事を偲ばせる
column2:
A large valley located in the middle of a plain and mountainous region.
The most significant charm of this place lies in its beautiful landscape with flowing streams and lush coniferous forests. It's not only the natural beauty but also the numerous remnants of the old White Knights' castle, watchtowers, and other structures that evoke memories of the past prosperity of this area.

column1:
平原と山岳地帯の中ほどに位置する大渓谷
渓流と針葉樹林の茂る美しい景観が最大の魅力
自然だけではなく、旧白騎団の古城、見張り塔
など遺構も数多く存在し、かつてここが繁栄の地で
あった事を偲ばせる
column2:
A large valley located in the middle of a plain and mountainous region.
The most significant charm of this place lies in its beautiful landscape with flowing streams and lush coniferous forests. It's not only the natural beauty but also the numerous remnants of the old White Knights' castle, watchtowers, and other structures that evoke memories of the past prosperity of this area.

column1:
レスタニア中部に広がる大平原
白竜が墜ちた地として神殿が築かれ、人々が集った
ことから、全ての民にとって寄り所と言える地域に
なった。そのため、比較的魔物の勢力は弱いが
オークなど強力な魔物の侵入は脅威となる
column2:
A large plains located in central Lestania.
A temple was built here, for this was the place
the White Dragon fell, and so people gathered,
and therefore became citizens.
Although weak, monsters can be found here.

column1:
レスタニア中部に広がる大平原
白竜が墜ちた地として神殿が築かれ、人々が集った
ことから、全ての民にとって寄り所と言える地域に
なった。そのため、比較的魔物の勢力は弱いが
オークなど強力な魔物の侵入は脅威となる
column2:
A large plain spread across central Lestania.
A temple was built where the White Dragon fell, and it
became an area that can be said to be a stronghold
for all people. Therefore, although nearby monsters
are relatively weak, the intrusion of more powerful
demons such as Orcs pose a threat.

column1:
ブリア海岸、岬に近い断崖地帯の大岩群
多数のハーピーが棲息しており、彼女らの巣が
密集していることから、村人達からその名で呼ばれて
いる。灯台に用がある時以外、鳥寄せ岩の付近を
通らぬよう村人は子供の頃から教えられている
column2:
A large group of rocks in the cliff area near the cape ofThe Breya Coast.
It is inhabited by numerous Harpies, and their nests are densely clustered there. 
Because of this, the villagers have given it the name "Birdcall Rock". 
The villagers have been taught since childhood not to pass near Birdcall Rock unless they have business at the lighthouse.

column1:
ガルドノック砦のどこかの鍵
金属部には血色の錆びが浮いている
column2:
A key used somewhere in Gardnox Fortress.
Blood is rusting the metal.

column1:
ドリード城地下、最深部《監獄牢》の鍵
収監された者がどうなったかは不明
column2:
A key to the prison underneath Dreed Castle.
You don't know what happened to the prisoners.

column1:
禊の神殿、セラー湖対岸にある離殿の鍵
白竜の紋章が彫られている
column2:
A key to the Purification Temple, located across Lake Cera.
It is engraved with the White Dragon.

column1:
禊の神殿、《水流制御室》の鍵
竜の細工が施されている
column2:
A key to the "Water Current Control Room" somewhere in the Shrine.
Draconic markings are apparent.

column1:
ドリード城離れにある《宝物殿》の鍵
かつては貴重資料が集められていた
column2:
A key that opens the treasury in Dreed Castle.
Various tresures were gathered there.

column1:
ドリード《城主の間》の扉を開く鍵
白竜と盾を模した文様が刻まれている
column2:
A key that opens the master chamber in Dreed Castle.
A shield and the White Dragon are engraved.

column1:
火垂れ山から飛来した巨大な噴石とその周辺
岩は鳥が羽根を休め、獣が身を隠すのに
ちょうどよかったらしく様々な獣たちが住処として
いるようだ
column2:
A huge volcanic rock from the Firefall Mountain and its surrounding rocks were perfect for birds to rest their feathers and for animals to hide. 
It seems that various animals have made this place their habitat.

column1:
ボルド鉱山ふもとに広がる温泉町
湯あみ場《キノザ鉱泉》を中心に、古くから採掘者や
武具職人になじみの強い地として有名だった
近年鉱山に強力な魔物が出現したことで、
坑道の開発に支障をきたすようになった
column2:
A hot spring town at the foot of Volden Mines.
It is famous for its strong connection to miners and weapon craftsmen from ancient times. In recent years, powerful enemies have appeared in the mines, causing disruptions to the development of the tunnels. The heart of this town is the Kinoza Mineral Springs, where people come to relax and soak.

column1:
ボルド鉱山ふもとに広がる温泉町
湯あみ場《キノザ鉱泉》を中心に、古くから採掘者や
武具職人になじみの強い地として有名だった
近年鉱山に強力な魔物が出現したことで、
坑道の開発に支障をきたすようになった
column2:
A hot spring town at the foot of Volden Mines.
It is famous for its strong connection to miners and weapon craftsmen from ancient times. In recent years, powerful enemies have appeared in the mines, causing disruptions to the development of the tunnels. The heart of this town is the Kinoza Mineral Springs, where people come to relax and soak.

column1:
高威力の剣舞を広範囲に繰り出す
初段を敵に接触させれば連撃に移行する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６でモーション変化／攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
A high-powered sword dance that covers a wide area.
If the first hit is successfully landed, it will become a full on
combo attack.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of the skill.
LV.6: Increases the number of hits in the attack, and changes
the motion of the skill.</COL>

column1:
強力な攻撃を広範囲に繰り出す
初段を敵に接触させれば連撃に移行する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇
LV.６でモーション変化／攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
column2:
A high power skill that covers a wide area.
If the first hit is successfully landed, it will become
a full on combo attack.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of the skill.
LV.6: Increases the number of hits in the attack, and
changes the motion of the skill.</COL>

column1:
一部では“南の盗賊”と呼ばれる大盗賊ベルタ
率いる盗賊団の隠れ里。湖に流れ込む川に
よって浸食されてできた洞窟でもある
並の人間では辿り着くことができない場所に
あるといわれている
column2:
A hidden village of a notorious bandit group led by the great bandit Bertha, also known as the "Bandit of the South." 
It is said to be located in a cave formed by erosion from a river that flows into the lake, in a place that cannot be reached by ordinary people.

column1:
バートランドのどこかにあるという
オーク達の隠れアジト
大将モゴックの腹心、戦鬼ゲソムが指揮する
部隊の潜伏地であるらしい
column2:
A hidden orc hideout somewhere in Betland.
It seems to be the hideout of General Mogok's trusted warrior, Gesomu the War Demon, and their troops.

column1:
バートランドのどこかにあるという
オーク達の隠れアジト
大将モゴックの腹心、戦鬼ゲソムが指揮する
部隊の潜伏地であるらしい
column2:
A hidden orc hideout somewhere in Betland.
It seems to be the hideout of General Mogok's trusted warrior, Gesomu the War Demon, and their troops.

column1:
古い時代の謎に魅せられ、世俗を捨てた隠者が
一人で住む家。隠者はたびたび依頼の品や
問題について、祠に依頼を寄せているようだ
column2: A hermit who was captivated by the mysteries of ancient times, and who abandoned the secular world, lives alone in a house. The hermit often sends requests to the shrine for items or issues that need attention.

column1:
連絡が途絶えた一人息子を想う父の
愛情が詰まった手作りのお守り
息子を憲兵隊に送り出す際に
渡し損ねたことを悔やむ日々が
傷だらけの表面に現れている
column2: A handmade amulet filled with a father's love, yearning for his son who he lost contact with. The days of regret for not being able to hand it over when sending his son off to the Military Police are evident on its scarred surface.

column1:
モルフォール周辺にある巨岩群
いずれかの巨岩の下に高名な賢者ティルカンが
眠ると言われている。残念ながら、墓となる岩を
特定するための情報は失われている
column2:
A group of giant rocks in the vicinity of Morfaul. 
It is said that a renowned sage named Tilkan sleeps under one of the rocks. 
Unfortunately, the information to identify the specific rock that serves as his grave is lost.

column1:
突如現れた不気味な竜族の魔物が巣食う広間
アッカーシェランではこれまでその姿を見た者や
存在を知る者は誰一人としておらず、恐らく
悪しき竜によって造り出されたか、召喚された魔物
だろうと推測される
column2:
A grand hall infested with creepy dragonkin creatures that suddenly appeared. 
No one in Acre Selund has ever seen or known of their existence. 
It is presumed that they were either created by or summoned by the evil dragon.

column1:
エラン水林とファーラナ平原を繋ぐ
経路上にある大きな門。以前は簡単な
検問所を備え、エラン水林へ立ち入る
旅人の数を管理していた
column2:
A grand gate stands on the route that connects Elan Water Grove and Farana Plains. 
It used to have a simple checkpoint to manage the number of travelers entering Elan Water Grove.

column1:
600年ほど前に建造された砦
アッカー家が並み居る地方豪族を倒して
大陸統一を果たした後に、対オーク用に強化されて
現在に至る。長く役目を果たしていたが“悪しき竜”
出現直後にオーク軍に占拠された
column2:
A fort that was built about 600 years ago. 
After the Acre family defeated the local feudal lords, they strengthened it to fend off the Orcs and it has remained that way to this day. 
It had served its purpose for a long time, but was occupied by the Orc army shortly after the appearance of the "Evil Dragon."

column1:
600年ほど前に建造された砦
アッカー家が並み居る地方豪族を倒して
大陸統一を果たした後に、対オーク用に強化されて
現在に至る。長く役目を果たしていたが“悪しき竜”
出現直後にオーク軍に占拠された
column2:
A fort that was built about 600 years ago. 
After the Acre family defeated the local feudal lords, they strengthened it to fend off the Orcs and it has remained that way to this day. 
It had served its purpose for a long time, but was occupied by the Orc army shortly after the appearance of the "Evil Dragon."

column1:
《ノーザナス侵林》入口のある崖の下に
広がる平地。封鎖されている侵林に
引き寄せられているのか、侵食が進んだ
有翼の魔物たちがしきりにこの辺りを
さまよう姿が確認されている
column2:
A flat area of land spreading out under the cliff where the entrance to the Northerners Infected Woods is
located. 
It is confirmed that winged beasts, infected by corruption, are frequently wandering around this area.

column1:
《ノーザナス侵林》入口のある崖の下に
広がる平地。封鎖されている侵林に
引き寄せられているのか、侵食が進んだ
有翼の魔物たちがしきりにこの辺りを
さまよう姿が確認されている
column2:
A flat area of land spreading out under the cliff where the entrance to the Northerners Infected Woods is
located. 
It is confirmed that winged beasts, infected by corruption, are frequently wandering around this area.

column1:
監修ガクシャ・制作セリンで捏造した
オーク軍の手配書

“ 人間に寝返った伝令兵を捜索中 ”

という旨の内容になっており
尋問で使用すれば
裏切りに対する報復を恐れるオークを
騙すことが出来るかもしれない
column2:
A fabricated wanted poster created by Supervisor Raksha and produced by Serine, 

"Searching for a defected messenger soldier"
It contains a message that may deceive the Orcs, who fear retaliation for their betrayal, when used for interrogation.

column1:
テル村の裏手にある枯れ井戸
使われなくなって久しいが、たまに妙な物音
や悪臭が中から漂ってくることがある
column2:
A dried up well behind Tel village. It has been
unusable for a long time, but occasionally strange
sounds and bad odors may drift out from inside.

column1:
キノコをメインに使った料理
食べると様々な良い効果がある
column2:
A dish using mushrooms as the main ingrediant
Bestows various buffs upon eating

column1:
キノコをメインに使った料理
食べると様々な良い効果がある
column2:
A dish using mushrooms as the main ingrediant
Bestows various buffs upon eating

食べると様々な良い効果がある
column2:
A dish using mushrooms as the main ingrediant
Bestows various buffs upon eating

column1:
いつ存在し、いつ滅びたかも不明な廃村。村の
跡地は緑に覆われ、今や完全に人の気配はない
だが、付近で人のすすり泣きのような声を聞いた、
怪しい人影を見た、といった噂が狩人の間で
囁かれているらしい
column2:
A deserted village whose existence and demise are uncertain. 
The site of the village is now covered in greenery, and there is no trace of human presence whatsoever. 
However, there are rumors circulating among hunters that they have heard voices resembling a person crying and have seen suspicious figures nearby.

column1:
オーク軍の将軍《獣の将》が支配する魔獣を
放している危険な区画が発見された
うろついている魔獣は獣の将が特に気に入って
いる個体であるとも、強化実験のために何らかの
特別な処理を施された個体だとも推測されている
column2:
A dangerous zone where the Beast Master of the Orc army controls the beasts has been discovered. 
It is speculated that the roaming demon beasts are individuals that the Beast Master particularly favors or individuals that have undergone some special treatment for strengthening experiments.

column1: 装着した防具の重量が減少するクレスト
column2:
A crest that reduces the weight of armor
when equipped.

column1: 装着した防具の重量が減少するクレスト
column2:
A crest that reduces the weight of armor
when equipped.

column1: 装着した武器の重量が減少するクレスト
column2:
A crest that reduces the weight of
weapons when equipped.

column1: 装着した武器の重量が減少するクレスト
column2:

column1:
魔赤島の北西部、最も高い断崖に近い一帯
何層にも崖が重なったような複雑な地形を
しており、滑落には特に注意が必要
column2:
A complex terrain resembling layers of overlapping cliffs found in the northwestern part of Bloodbane Isle.
Special attention must be paid to the risk of falling.

column1:

しており、滑落には特に注意が必要
column2:
A complex terrain resembling layers of overlapping cliffs found in the northwestern part of Bloodbane Isle.
Special attention must be paid to the risk of falling.

column1:
本人が生前に希望、もしくは身寄りがないなど
特殊な事情を背負って散った戦士たちが葬られている
集団墓地。国が乱れる前までは専属の衛士によって
警備されていたが、現在は封鎖。内部がどのような状況
かもわからず、不気味な噂のみが広まっている
column2:
A collective graveyard where warriors who perished under special circumstances, such as having no kin, or expressing their desire for it before their death, are buried. 
Before the country fell into chaos, it was guarded by dedicated soldiers, but now it is sealed off. 
The interior's condition is unknown, and only eerie rumors have spread.

column1:
レスタニア西部の海岸地帯
白い砂浜が続く景色は美しいが、時には思いも
よらぬものが浜辺に流れ着くことも。温暖で湿った
気候から、乾燥しがちのハイデル平原とは植生や
生息する魔物も異なる
column2:
A coastal zone in western Lestania.
The view of the white sandy beach is beautiful.
With its dry climate, the fauna and flora living
in the Hidell Plains is different.

column1:
レスタニア西部の海岸地帯
白い砂浜が続く景色は美しいが、時には思いも
よらぬものが浜辺に流れ着くことも。温暖で湿った
気候から、乾燥しがちのハイデル平原とは植生や
生息する魔物も異なる
column2:
A coastal zone in western Lestania.
The view of the white sandy beach is beautiful.
With its dry climate, the fauna and flora living
in the Hidell Plains is different.

column1:
霧の森の中にある焼け野原
忌まわしい考えに取り付かれたある女が
多数の犠牲者を洗脳し、自ら炎の中へと
飛び込ませたという事件が起こった場所
事件から何十年と経過しているが、未だに
土は焼けたままであり草木も回復していない
column2:
A burnt field in the Forest of Mist. 
This is where a woman obsessed with abominable thoughts brainwashed numerous victims and forced them to jump
into the flames themselves.
Decades have passed since the incident, yet the soil remains burned and the grass and trees have not recovered.

column1:
霧の森の中にある焼け野原
忌まわしい考えに取り付かれたある女が
多数の犠牲者を洗脳し、自ら炎の中へと
飛び込ませたという事件が起こった場所
事件から何十年と経過しているが、未だに

column2:
A burnt field in the Forest of Mist. 
This is where a woman obsessed with abominable thoughts brainwashed numerous victims and forced them to jump
into the flames themselves.
Decades have passed since the incident, yet the soil remains burned and the grass and trees have not recovered.

column1:
ブリア海岸、南部に広がる浜辺
かつてはここも漁民にとって生活の場であったが
今や完全に魔物が徘徊する危険地帯となっている
特に近頃は大型の魔物が居付いてしまったようだ
column2:
A beach that stretches out in the southern part of Breya Coast.
Once, this place was also a living place for fishermen, but now it has become a dangerous area where monsters roam freely.
Especially recently, it seems that large monsters have settled here.

column1:
広場に
クリスマスツリーが設置できます
column2: A Christmas tree can be set up in the square.

広場に

column1: <PADM>闘波の構え<KEYM>構えの変更（闘波の構え）

<PADM>空中で左スティックを倒しながら<KC ATTACK1>を押す<KEYM>空中で移動キーを押しながら<KC ATTACK1>を押す</KEYM>
アタックブーストで強化可能
column2:
While in the air, press <PADM><KC ATTACK1> while
moving the left stick<KEYM><KC ATTACK1> while
holding movement keys</KEYM>.
Further enhanced with Attack Boost.

column1: <PADM>空中で左スティックを倒しながら<KC ATTACK1>を押す<KEYM>空中で移動キーを押しながら<KC ATTACK1>を押す</KEYM>
column2:
While in the air, press <PADM><KC ATTACK1> while
moving the left stick<KEYM><KC ATTACK1> while
holding movement keys</KEYM>.

While in the air, press <PADM><KC ATTACK1> while
moving the left stick<KEYM><KC ATTACK1> while
holding movement keys</KEYM>.

column1: <PADM>空中で壁に対して逆に左スティックを倒しながら<KC JUMP>を押す<KEYM>空中で壁に対して逆に移動キーを押しながら<KC JUMP>を押す
column2:
Press <PADM><KC JUMP><KEYM><KC JUMP></KEYM> while holding the <PADM>left stick<KEYM>movement key</KEYM>
opposite a wall while in the air.

column1: <PADM>矢の装填中、特定のタイミングで<KC TOUCH>を押す<KEYM>矢の装填中、特定のタイミングで<KC RELOAD>を押す
column2:
While reloading arrows, press <PADM><KC TOUCH><KEYM><KC RELOAD></KEYM>
with perfect timing.

column1:
<PADM>爆薬矢をつがえ弓を上方に構える<KEYM>通常の弓構えか、上方に向ける
爆矢構えかを選択する</KEYM>
空中でも発動可能
column2:
<PADM>Hold an explosive arrow, and keep the bow pointed upwards.
<KEYM>Point the bow upwards while in a normal bow stance,
and decide the destination of the explosive arrows.</KEYM>
Can be activated even while in the air.

column1: <PADM>助真の構え<KEYM>構えの変更（助真の構え）

<PADM>セットボタンを押し、左スティックを倒して５属性を選択<KEYM>セットボタンを押し、マウス移動で５属性を選択</KEYM>
再度セットボタンを押して属性決定
column2:
Press <PADM>the assigned button<KEYM>the assigned button</KEYM>, then select from <PADM>5<KEYM>5</KEYM>
elements using <PADM>the left stick<KEYM>mouse movement</KEYM>.
Press <KC ATTACK1> or <KC ATTACK2> to confirm element choice.

<PADM><KC ATTACK2>を押して属性決定<KEYM><KC ATTACK1>または<KC ATTACK2>を押して属性決定
column2:
Press <PADM><KC ATTACK2><KEYM><KC ATTACK2></KEYM>, then select from <PADM>5<KEYM>5</KEYM> elements
using <PADM>the left stick<KEYM>mouse movement</KEYM>.
Press <PADM><KC ATTACK2><KEYM><KC ATTACK1> or <KC ATTACK2></KEYM> to confirm element choice.

column1:

<PADM><KC ATTACK2>を押して属性決定<KEYM><KC ATTACK1>または<KC ATTACK2>を押して属性決定

using <PADM>the left stick<KEYM>mouse movement</KEYM>.
Press <PADM><KC ATTACK2><KEYM><KC ATTACK1> or <KC ATTACK2></KEYM> to confirm element choice.

column1:
<NPC 681>侯爵が描かれた肖像画
高価な貴族画ではなく
個人が安価に所有できる量産品である
雑な取扱いによる傷みはあるが、
顔かたちは十分に確認できる状態
column2:
Portrait depicting <NPC 681>, a marquis.
Not an expensive aristocratic painting, but a mass-produced item that individuals can afford.
There may be some damage due to rough handling, but the facial features are clearly discernible.

column1:
<NPC 586>と密通していたオークが
持っていた文書
オークの暗号文字で書かれており
読むことはできない
column2:
The document was in the possession of an Orc who was in secret communication with <NPC 586>.
It is written in Orc code letters and cannot be read.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【財宝】の扉あり</COL>
ザンドラ東部、《死者の丘》ふもとの崖から
近年発掘された旧時代の地下墓地
発見した墓荒らしによると、侵入直後に恐ろしい
までの悪寒に襲われ、命からがら逃げ出したという
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Treasure】Door</COL>
Located at the foot of the Hill of the Dead in Eastern Zandora.
A recently discovered underground tomb from ancient times. 
According to the grave robber who was found, they were attacked by a terrifying cold moment after entering and narrowly escaped with their lives.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【財宝】の扉あり</COL>

近年発掘された旧時代の地下墓地
発見した墓荒らしによると、侵入直後に恐ろしい

column2:

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【財宝】の扉あり</COL>
《ボルド大坑道》の内部で発見された旧坑道
地熱の影響で坑内の気温が非常に高くなることが
あり、鉱員により早期に封鎖されていた
内部で希少な鉱石が採れるのではと推測されている
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Treasure】Door</COL>
Inside the "Volden Large Tunnels," an old tunnel was discovered.
Due to the influence of geothermal energy, the temperature inside the tunnel becomes extremely high,
and it was sealed off by miners early on.
It is speculated that rare minerals can be mined inside.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【財宝】の扉あり</COL>
《ボルド大坑道》の内部で発見された旧坑道
地熱の影響で坑内の気温が非常に高くなることが
あり、鉱員により早期に封鎖されていた
内部で希少な鉱石が採れるのではと推測されている
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Treasure】Door</COL>

Due to the influence of geothermal energy, the temperature inside the tunnel becomes extremely high,
and it was sealed off by miners early on.
It is speculated that rare minerals can be mined inside.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【財宝】の扉あり</COL>
南部の海岸沿いの小道の先に発見された地下通路
内部の気温は地上と比べて数度低めである
単なる通路ではなく、遺跡のような造りになっており
崩れた人工物からは文化の一端が垣間見える
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Treasure】Door</COL>
An underground passage was discovered at the end of a small path along the southern coast. 
The temperature inside is a few degrees lower compared to the surface. 
It is not just a simple passage but is constructed like a ruin, and glimpses of a culture can be seen from the collapsed artifacts.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【財宝】の扉あり</COL>
《南ザンドラ遺跡群》の一角にある旧時代の井戸
これまではその存在すら忘れられていたが
恐ろしい咆哮が奥から遺跡群一帯に響くようになった
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Treasure】Door</COL>
An ancient well in a corner of the "South Zandora Ruins".
Its existence had been forgotten until now, but a terrifying roar began to echo throughout the entire ruins.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【財宝】の扉あり</COL>

<COL ffdc78>【Treasure】Door</COL>
An ancient well in a corner of the "South Zandora Ruins".
Its existence had been forgotten until now, but a terrifying roar began to echo throughout the entire ruins.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
バートランド平原の西側、山腹の高台にある牢を
兼ねた地下墓地。旧時代、大罪を犯した者が送られ
死してなお外界に出さぬよう秘密裏に葬られたという
近年調査が入るまで長く閉鎖されたままになっていた
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Jewelry】Door</COL>
Located on the western side of the Bartland Plains, on a hillside, is an underground tomb that also serves as a prison. In ancient times, those who committed great sins were sent here and secretly buried to prevent them from returning to the outside world. It remained closed for a long time until recent investigations were carried out.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>

column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Jewelry】Door</COL>

In ancient times, those who committed great sins were sent here and secretly buried to prevent them from returning to the outside world. It remained closed for a long time until recent investigations were carried out.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
《ガルドノック砦》の奥から続き、テゴル川の水を
堀へと引き込むための水廊。未だオークが根城とする
この場所に、侵食の影響を受けた個体が存在している
らしい。脅威が拡散する前に、芽を摘む必要がある
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Jewelry】Door</COL>
Continuing from the depths of Gardnox Fortress, this water corridor is used to draw the water from the Tegor River into the moat. 
It seems that there are infected individuals affected by corruption still inhabiting this place, which the orcs still use as their stronghold. 
It is necessary to nip this threat in the bud before it spreads.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
《ガルドノック砦》の奥から続き、テゴル川の水を
堀へと引き込むための水廊。未だオークが根城とする
この場所に、侵食の影響を受けた個体が存在している
らしい。脅威が拡散する前に、芽を摘む必要がある

It is necessary to nip this threat in the bud before it spreads.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
深いディナンの森で新たに発見された森民の遺跡
鳥の鳴き声や羽ばたきが四方から響いている
内部はかなり複雑な構造になっているらしく、元は
エルテ・ディナンに次ぐ規模の居住区だったようだ
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Jewelry】Door</COL>
A recently discovered forest dwelling of the forest people in the depths of Deenan.
The sounds of birds chirping and wings flapping echo from all directions.
The interior seems to have a quite complex structure, and it appears that it was once a residential area of considerable size, second only to Erte Dinan.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
深いディナンの森で新たに発見された森民の遺跡
鳥の鳴き声や羽ばたきが四方から響いている
内部はかなり複雑な構造になっているらしく、元は
エルテ・ディナンに次ぐ規模の居住区だったようだ
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Jewelry】Door</COL>
A recently discovered forest dwelling of the forest people in the depths of Deenan.
The sounds of birds chirping and wings flapping echo from all directions.
The interior seems to have a quite complex structure, and it appears that it was once a residential area of considerable size, second only to Erte Dinan.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
ミスリウ森林から深部へ続く洞穴に埋もれていた古い
地下墓地。夜間、どこからともなく森に現れる不死者
達はこの墳墓から彷徨い出たものらしい。長く封じら
れていたため、あまり見ない魔物が潜む可能性が高い
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Jewelry】Door</COL>
A hidden underground cemetery that was buried deep within the caves leading from the Mysree Forest. The undead that appear in the forest at night seem to have emerged from this tomb. Since it had been sealed for a long time, there is a high possibility that unseen enemies lurk within.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
ミスリウ森林から深部へ続く洞穴に埋もれていた古い
地下墓地。夜間、どこからともなく森に現れる不死者
達はこの墳墓から彷徨い出たものらしい。長く封じら
れていたため、あまり見ない魔物が潜む可能性が高い
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Jewelry】Door</COL>
A hidden underground cemetery that was buried deep within the caves leading from the Mysree Forest. The undead that appear in the forest at night seem to have emerged from this tomb. Since it had been sealed for a long time, there is a high possibility that unseen enemies lurk within.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
ダウ渓谷の北にある関所のすぐ裏手にある井戸
何年も前に井戸としての機能を失い、不便な場所に
あったこともあって、修理もされずに放置されていた
いつしかその存在すら忘れられていた
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Jewelry】 Door</COL>
There is a well located just behind the Checkpoint to the north of Dowe Valley. 
It lost its function as a well many years ago and was left unattended due to its inconvenient location. 
Its existence had been forgotten over time.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
キンガル峡谷にある遺跡
当時の覚者を導いたとされる巫女が祀られている遺跡
周りを山脈に囲まれているせいか、元は大地を巡る
竜力の恩恵を受けやすい立地であった
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Jewelry】 Door</COL>
An Arisen is said to have been guided by a maiden who is enshrined in the ruins of Kingal Canyon. 
The ruins are surrounded by mountains, making it a location that was easily influenced by the blessings of Dragon Force, which once circulated the land.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【昌石】の扉あり</COL>
ミスリウ深部、イニアス湖の南で新たに発見
された森民の遺跡。湖からくる湿気のせいか
白く靄がかかっている。靄は遺跡の外にまで
漏れ出し、全ての輪郭を朧にしている
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Gemstone】Door</COL>
A newly discovered forest tribal ruin in the depths of Mysree, located south of Lake Inias.
Perhaps due to the moisture from the lake, a white mist hangs in the air, obscuring the outlines of everything, even leaking beyond the boundaries of the ruin.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【昌石】の扉あり</COL>
ミスリウ深部、イニアス湖の南で新たに発見
された森民の遺跡。湖からくる湿気のせいか
白く靄がかかっている。靄は遺跡の外にまで
漏れ出し、全ての輪郭を朧にしている
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Gemstone】Door</COL>
A newly discovered forest tribal ruin in the depths of Mysree, located south of Lake Inias.
Perhaps due to the moisture from the lake, a white mist hangs in the air, obscuring the outlines of everything, even leaking beyond the boundaries of the ruin.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【昌石】の扉あり</COL>
ファーラナ平原中で最大規模の遺跡
多少崩壊している箇所もあるが全体の作りは堅固
であり、魔物に侵入されるまでは過去の貴重な
文献などを保管する書庫として活用されてきた
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Gemstone】 Door</COL>
The largest archaeological site in the Farana Plains, with some areas showing signs of collapse, but the overall structure is solid.
It was once used as a repository for valuable historical documents, storing them until it was invaded by enemies.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【昌石】の扉あり</COL>
女性錬金術師ペトラネアが、自宅の地下に密かに
併設した実験場。秘術によって錬魔や不死者に
特殊なエレメントを付与する研究や、人間を
魔物に変える残酷な実験がここで繰り返し行われた
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Gemstone】 Door</COL>
Petranea, a female alchemist, secretly established an experimental facility in the basement of her home.
Research of bestowing special elements to alchemized demons and immortals through secret arts, as well as cruel experiments that transform humans into monsters, were repeatedly conducted here.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【昌石】の扉あり</COL>
元は船頭たちが休憩所として使っていた洞窟
居心地が良く、動物も訪れる癒しの場であったが
それゆえに獲物を求めた魔物に狙われることとなり
現在は魔物に乗っ取られた状態にある
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Gemstone Door】</COL>
Originally a cave used by boatmen as a resting place, it was a soothing place where even animals visited. 
However, it became the target of monsters seeking prey, and it is currently under the control of these monsters.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【竜力】の扉あり</COL>
魔赤島の絶崖側と山頂側を繋ぐ橋の付近にある坑道
橋から見える滝の裏側に、ひっそりと隠れるように
存在していたため、発見と初期調査が遅れた
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Dragon Force】Door</COL>
There is a tunnel near the bridge that connects the cliff side and the summit side of Bloodbane Isle.
It was hidden quietly on the back of the waterfall visible from the bridge, which caused the discovery and initial investigation to be delayed.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【竜力】の扉あり</COL>
以前は旅商人たちが頻繁に利用していたらしいが
少し前からピクシーたちに乗っ取られた状態にある
奥へ行くほど侵食が進んでいるため、内部に
入り込もうとした者も途中で引き返してきたという
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Dragon Force】Door</COL>
It seems that in the past, it was frequently used by traveling merchants, but for a while now, it has been taken over by Pixies.
The further you go inside, the more the corruption is apparent.
Those who tried to enter have turned back halfway.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【竜力】の扉あり</COL>
ブリア海岸傍の灯台下の井戸の中に入口が発見された
忘れられた古代の水路遺跡。長く閉鎖され未踏の地
であったため、独自の生態系を保持した環境と
なっているようだ
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Dragon Force】Door</COL>
An entrance has been discovered within a well beneath the lighthouse near the Breya Coast. It is a forgotten ancient aqueduct relic that has long been closed off and unexplored. It appears to have maintained its own unique ecosystem.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【竜力】の扉あり</COL>
ブリア海岸傍の灯台下の井戸の中に入口が発見された
忘れられた古代の水路遺跡。長く閉鎖され未踏の地
であったため、独自の生態系を保持した環境と
なっているようだ
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Dragon Force】Door</COL>
An entrance has been discovered within a well beneath the lighthouse near the Breya Coast. It is a forgotten ancient aqueduct relic that has long been closed off and unexplored. It appears to have maintained its own unique ecosystem.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【竜力】の扉あり</COL>
《侵食魔の巣窟》のさらに奥に存在する空間
侵食魔は日光を避ける傾向にあることが判明
しているため、光の届かない内部にはさらに
侵食の進んだ魔物が潜んでいる可能性がある
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Dragon Force】Door</COL>
A space that exists further inside the Infected Den.
It has been determined that the Infected creatures tend to avoid sunlight.
Therefore, there is a possibility that further inside the area where light does not reach, there are more infected enemies lurking.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【竜力】の扉あり</COL>
魔赤島・絶崖側に発見された小聖堂
入口の扉は開閉されるごとに施錠される仕組みと
なっており、特殊な鍵を用いることでしか
開くことができない
column2:
<COL ffdc78>【Dragon Force】Door</COL>
A small chapel discovered on the Bloodbane Isle - Cliffside.
The entrance door is equipped with a locking mechanism that locks every time it is opened and closed, and can only be opened by using a special key.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【財宝】の扉あり</COL>
大量の水を湛えた自然の地下洞窟を元に作られた
集水路。今まで水が枯れたことは無く、手入れが
必要無かったことから最低限しか手が入れられて
いない。最近は水竜が棲みついているとの噂もある
column2:
<COL ffdc78>[Treasure] Door</COL>
A canal that was built based on a natural underground cave filled with a large amount of water. 
The water has never dried up before and minimal maintenance has been carried out because it has not been necessary. 
There have been rumors recently that water dragons have made it their habitat.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【竜力】の扉あり</COL>
元は採掘場として人でにぎわっていた洞窟
侵食による影響が発見されてからの進行がはやく
人々は採掘道具すら回収しきらぬままに撤退したが
情報が行きわたらず取り残された者もいた
column2:
<COL ffdc78>[Dragon Force] Door</COL>
Originally, the cave was bustling with people as a mining site. 
However, the progress since the discovery of the effects of corruption has been rapid. 
People withdrew without even fully recovering their mining tools, but there were some who were left behind without receiving any information.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>胞子の広がりを阻止――！
クリア時のボーナス報酬が追加されます</COL>
column2: <COL ffdc78>Stopped the spread of spores! Additional bonus rewards for clearing the site</COL>

column1:
<COL ffdc78>迅速な救助に成功しました
クリア時のボーナス報酬が追加されます</COL>
column2:
<COL ffdc78>Quick Rescue successful!
Bonus Rewards gained!</COL>

column1:
<COL ffdc78>迅速な救助に失敗しました
クリア時のボーナス報酬は追加されません</COL>
column2:
<COL ffdc78>Quick Rescue has failed!
Bonus Rewards are lost.</COL>

column1:
<COL ffdc78>パーティーメンバーが死亡状態になりました
クリア時のボーナス報酬が下がります</COL>
column2: <COL ffdc78>Party member is now dead. Bonus reward for clearing will be lowered</COL>.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>敵との戦闘で一度も死亡状態になりませんでした
クリア時のボーナス報酬が多くなります</COL>
column2: <COL ffdc78>Never went into a death state in combat! More bonus rewards for clearing</COL>

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
モロー樹林北部に位置する封鎖された森林
グリフィンの飛来を理由に立ち入りを制限されていた
確認しに行った者はいないが、恐らくこの場にいた
グリフィンも侵食されてしまったものと思われる
column2:
<COL ffdc78>Jewelry Door</COL>
A sealed forest located in the northern part of Morrow Forest.
Access was restricted due to the arrival of a griffin.
No one has confirmed it, but it is likely that the griffin present in this area has also been corrupted.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
テルの西に落下したアークの裏側から続く別階層
表側とは異なり、こちらには恐るべき危険性を
秘めた大型の錬魔も確認されたという。後に神殿を
攻める足がかりとして準備されていた可能性がある
column2:
<COL ffdc78>A door requiring a "Jewelry" key. </COL>
Another layer that continues from the back of
the ark that fell west of Tel.
This passage is far more dangerous than the
front. A strange odor is present here as well.
It's possible that this location was prepared as
a foothold in case of attack.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【財宝】の扉あり</COL>
エラン水林西部にある自然洞窟
陽光の差し込む場所がいくつかあり、小さな虹が舞う
ような幻想的な光景が見られることがあるという
かつては周辺住人にも親しまれた場所であった
column2:
<COL ffdc78> 【Treasure】Door</COL>
A natural cave located in the western part of Elan Water Grove. 
There are several places where sunlight filters through, creating a fantastical scene with small rainbows dancing in the air. This place used to be beloved by the local residents.

column1:
<COL ffdc78>【財宝】の扉あり</COL>
エラン水林西部にある自然洞窟
陽光の差し込む場所がいくつかあり、小さな虹が舞う

column2:
<COL ffdc78> 【Treasure】Door</COL>
A natural cave located in the western part of Elan Water Grove. 
There are several places where sunlight filters through, creating a fantastical scene with small rainbows dancing in the air. This place used to be beloved by the local residents.

column1:
300年の昔に地上から失われた都
旧王都として錬金術師により統治され、栄華を
極めた。だが、白竜によりレスタニアから
切り離されて後、異界を漂い続けている
今なお僅かな民が生存している
column2:
300 years ago, the ancient capital that disappeared from the earth's surface was ruled by alchemists and flourished. 
However, after being separated from Lestania by the White Dragon, it continues to drift in the otherworld. 
Even now, only a few people survive.

――ベンジャミン様は
ご友人の遺体と日記を発見してから
以前にも増して寡黙になられたようです――
column2:
...Master Benjamin seems to become more withdrawn
the more we stumble upon the diaries of his acquaintances who have likely
fallen...

column1:
――それを考えれば、集めると
“良くない運命”を引き寄せるという
いつか聞いた話も頷けるように思う
column2:
...Given that, if one collects things like these
they say it will invite a "bad fate".
I think the stories I've heard will someday become true...

column1:
――くっ
より技術を磨き、さらに生産効率を
上げなければ
column2: --We need to refine our technology and further improve our production efficiency.

column1:
――ここにも無いとなれば
この階段を登った先、２階に違いない！
column2: -- If it's not here either, it must be on the second floor at the top of these stairs!

"Note:
If you've come all this way to find me,
I want to see you.
I'll be waiting at the ruined church on top of the hill."

4部位それぞれで行う――
ということは、残るはあと2ヶ所
真意は分かりかねますが、我々は付き従うのみです
column2:
"Do this in each of the four sites"...
That means there are two sites still remaining.
We may not understand the intention behind this, but we tag along regardless.
